Description_x: A mysterious ship has sailed into Pippi's hometown and the Captain turns out to be her father. So it's off with her friends for a wild and wonderful, wind-blown adventure on the South Seas.
A series of mysterious events and the pestering motor gang 'The Red Vampires' turns the idyllic holiday of Blinker and his friends into a thrilling adventure.
Growing up neurotic in a Hollywood family.

Title_x: Sally Marshall Is Not an Alien

Description_x: A formerly successful man dies then his semi-crazy daughter makes arrangements while his street thug friends take the corpse out for one last night.
"Wake up! I'm a Prince!" 'Sleeping Bride' or 'Glass Brain' is teenage love-story of a girl who sleeps for 17 years, her only hope, a young boy...
Cabby Robby drives in and around St.Pauli, Hamburg, from sunset to sunrise. He is surrounded by stories of the night.

A celebrated Flemish writer, occupying a small apartment in a big Belgian city, which he uses as a working-place, witnesses how the inhabitants of a dead-end street try to fight the injustice of expropriation.
The film tells of the memories and feeling of loss of an Irish immigrant who eventually winds up doing construction work in the anonymous cities of England.

Copenhagen over century ago: a mother sees her sisters getting ahead in life while she's stuck due to her husband's long stays at a mental hospital. At a picnic with her sisters and families, she dances Klinkevals with a handsome stranger.
A teenage girl makes a new friend at her school who tells her that she has the ability to travel between worlds.
When a major bank is caught paying off a corporate extortionist, the media and prosecutors begin to dig, breaking open a money-and-favors scandal to its core.
Margot is back in Parma, her hometown. She's coming back to seek revenge. Indeed, she was raped by several notables of the city when she was younger.
Marco has a great passion for tropical fish and plan go to Delhi with the task of building a large aquarium.
The life of a paraplegic painter is shattered when an old girlfriend comes back into his life and accuses him of raping her 15 years earlier.
The dark and harsh reality of life for the urban poor and how the weak become prey for the stronger.
A naive guy, passionate cinemaddict, believes that his minor extras role is a first step to a shining star career.
A tax collector is sent to a small region where he starts to differ with the unusual way of the local to exercise power.
Struggling writer, Danny, must cope with the unexpected arrival of a corpse.
The story of four implausible young rebellious in the Italy of the 90's.
A young boy must come to terms with the events surrounding the death of his father.

Berlin, 1937. Marion von Kammer performs forbidden songs in a small theater that the Nazis are quick to destroy. Faced with the rise of fascism, Marion decides to leave for Zurich with her sister Tilly and their mother.
A tabloid photographer is given the assignment to follow a politician suspected to have sexual relations with an underage girl.

In the midst of a midlife crisis, writer Simon Polaris no longer wants to write. One day, his psychoanalyst told him that he had the watch that John F Kennedy would have worn on the day of his death. This watch becomes a fixation for Simon
A young woman neglected by her mother, who prefers her dog, plunges into a totally crazy dream. She imagines herself getting rid of this unwanted dog in the company of her bizarre driver.

Jean and Paddy haven't recovered from Ben's death. Ben was Paddy's lover but also Jean's. Their threesome filled their existence. Today, while they still love each other, Jean and Paddy are torn apart.
A brother and sister in west London and their search for love.

Title_x: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Description_x: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.
Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.
A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.
A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

Title_x: The Man in the Iron Mask
Description_x: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?
A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.
Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.
Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman
Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Martin is a philosophy teacher in the midst of a mid-life crisis. Lacking direction or purpose in his life, he initiates an affair with Cécilia, a young artist's model who might have killed her former lover.
A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.
A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.
A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.
In the "flower houses" (upscale brothels) of Shanghai, various interweaving stories of love, loyalty, and deceit play out subtly.
The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
Two young boys, both social outcasts in their small town, form an unlikely friendship.
A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.
Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.
In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.
An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Title_x: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
Description_x: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.
A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.
A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a major company responsible for causing several people to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.
The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.
Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.
A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.
A British writer pursues a young actress to Hollywood and needs all the help he can get to win her love.
A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader.

The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.
A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.
Gory remake of the Gaston Leroux classic story, only this time, the phantom is not disfigured, but a man who was raised by rats deep under the Paris Opera House.

Russell, single father balances his work as a lawyer with the care of his five-year-old son, after his wife abandoned them. When she reappears creating turmoil, he must deal with his new love interest and a job opportunity of a lifetime.
An indolent artist in Portland, Oregon becomes addicted to marijuana, prompting his girlfriend to flee to New York City with a heroin addict.

A young pathologist seeks answers to the mysterious death of a friend and soon comes into contact with the same cursed videotape that caused the death of the friend's wife and son, which is haunted by the curse of Sadako, a relentless spirit.

Based on the classic novel by Louisa May Alcott. When two homeless boys from Boston find themselves at Plumfield, a rural boarding school run by Jo and her husband, the boys learn both academic and life lessons they won't ever forget.
Three twisted tales of abuse, drugs, displaced personalities, and insect life by Scottish writer Irvine Welsh.
A straight-A teen explores Portland's rock scene.

Olof lives alone on a farm after the death of his mother. Unable to read and write, he is dependent on his younger friend, Erik. Olof advertises for a housekeeper, and Ellen arrives. During summer Olof's heart and Erik's desires develops.
A 19 year old Greek Australian youth struggles with his sexual identity and has one clumsy heterosexual and several homosexual encounters.

Three young women from very different walks of life join the women's land army during World War II, and are sent to work together on a farm in Dorset, where the experience changes their lives forever.
A nuclear armed SS20 will be smuggled from Russia via Finland to Sweden unless Swedish agent Hamilton +5 stop them with "no loose ends". What about the other stolen SS20?
A lonely young aristocrat in turn-of the century England stuggles to meet the approval of his over-bearing, class-conscious father while trying to please the selfish woman he loves.

When her sister dies in 1846, Bette moves from the château to Paris to work as a theater seamstress. She helps a handsome, starving artist. When her niece lures him away from her, she plans a devious revenge.
A young woman attempts to end her criminal career. But she needs love to make it.
Two cowboys have their friendship tested when they fall for the same girl.

It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl witnesses tragedy as her ayah (nanny) is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.
A high class wife falls for a small town butcher.Its all lust.Its all desire.
A high school girl engages in compensated dating in order to buy an expensive ring before the day ends.
Black romantic comedy set around the troubled "peace process" and its effect on a cynical Belfast hack.
A cold-blooded killer provokes a legendary gunslinger into coming out of retirement to see who's really the fastest gun in the West.
In 1930s Mexico, a young boy falls in love with his elementary-school teacher.
An eccentric drifter claiming to be Elvis Presley hitches a ride with a young man and they find themselves on an adventurous road trip to Memphis.
Louis Gossett, Jr. stars in this re-telling of Bram Stoker's "Jewel of the Seven Stars", in which an ages-old mummy is awakened and takes revenge on everyone in an old, gothic mansion.
Against a background of holocaust memories, a liberal Jewish girl becomes a nanny to a young Jewish boy with a disability and grows fond of him.
A scientist discovers dinosaurs on a remote plateau in Mongolia.
Comedy about teachers and students at a high school in a small provincial town. Mihailo tries to win the heart of a girl his brother is also chasing.

Recovering alcoholic, ex-LAPD, private detective Fritz Brown, is hired by caddie "Fat Dog" to follow his kid sister, who is holed up with an old sugar daddy. The trail leads to his old police boss Cathcart, and the bodies start to pile up.
Robert's wife is divorcing him for gambling etc. A strip club owner offers him work redesigning his club. Robert befriends a dancer there, who has premonitions.

A young Irishwoman becomes governess to 3 daughters of a rich family in Spain in 1936, just before the civil war. The mom likes Franco - the dad doesn't. She becomes family. She befriends 5 Irishwomen.
A salaryman and yakuza are each sent by their bosses to a remote Chinese village but discover more then they expected.
A Belfast, Northern Ireland housewife takes up the peace cause, which causes her family trouble with I.R.A. sympathizers.
A married author (Parker Posey) tries to stimulate her imagination for an erotic novel with hands-on research.
As an 11-year-old boy struggles to cope with a disability, he finds a pony who gives birth to a unicorn which he takes care of.
An extra-smart dog and detective team up to stop a DNA enhanced killer.
Young police officer Roger is on the trail of the international master assassin, while the assassin follows his plan to murder Swedish Prime Minister Olof Palme.
A university professor is fascinated with humankind's history of violent self-destruction.
After his son dies, an elderly man comes back to Spain from the US and hopes to find out which of his granddaughters is true and which one is bastard.
A secret and deep passion marks the life of a young doctor, and threatens the existence of those around him.
A schoolboy Nicholas always worries about something. When he goes on a school skiing trip, all his visions and nightmares take him over.
At the end of WWII, Japanese doctor Akagi searches for the cure for hepatitis in the prisoner-of-war camp.

Title_x: The Man in the Iron Mask

Description_x: Seen from the eyes of Hukum Chand the District Magistrate it is an account of the turmoil faced by the inhabitants of village Mano Majra in Punjab on the Indo-Pak border during the period of partition after India attained independence.
A former policeman turns full-time criminal and goes on a downward spiral of crime in the 1990s Rome.
After her sudden death a teenage girl finds her father has uploaded her mind to computer form. With a rival corporation wishing to capture her the girl is uploaded to her boyfriend's laptop.

Albert is always getting his friend Egon into trouble. After being grounded by his parents and having a fight with Albert, Egon disappears. Albert looks for him and finds him in an imaginary world filled with crooks.
Detective Kogoro Akechi is faced with a peculiar murder case involving forgeries of classic pornographic artworks.

A woman with an abusive childhood travels back to taiwan from japan with her daughter in order to find her father's missing ashes, confronting her past along the way, discovering many secrets that were hidden from her throughout her life.
A dying seagull entrusts her egg to a cat named Zorba, who promises three things: he won't eat the egg, he'll care for the egg, and he'll teach the baby seagull to fly.
In this action-packed crime thriller, a journalist evades pursuers as he ponders a riddle disclosing the whereabouts of a spectacular diamond.

Rites of passage moral tale based on the award-winning novel by Piers Paul Read, about a Catholic priest who falls from grace and descends into a world of forbidden love and betrayal in 1970's London.
An intense psychological drama around four people in a remote country village; where a creature is killing the local animals.
A young boy grows up in a violent and dysfunctional family.
The classic story gets a new spin when a young girl is intrigued by the secret experiments of her uncle, until she's confronted by his creation.

In nineteenth century rural England, a German hussar serving with King George III's personal cavalry, Matthaus Singer, falls madly in love with the only daughter of a West Country solicitor, Frances Groves.

A prestigious sociology professor and candidate for the position of President of the University trips over a troublesomely ended affair with a student and is accused of sexual harassment and sexual assault by the university apparatus.

Title_x: Victor... pendant qu'il est trop tard
Description_x: Young Victor experiences a traumatic flight from abusive parents and discovers a new mother in the prostitute Trish.
A young woman spends an adventurous winter with a trapper on Spitsbergen.

Jose Rizal's life and works are recounted through a series of non-linear flashbacks which reflect on various aspects of his life - as writer, propagandist, lover, friend, brother, doctor, and the man that inspired a revolution.
In this black-and-white Hungarian version of James M. Cain's The Postman Always Rings Twice, a wife and her lover plot to kill her older husband.
Old friends meet after sixty years ... but everything has changed.
High school teacher falls in love with his "best" female student.

Three siblings ingeniously avoid being sent off to a children's home while their single mother serves a short sentence in a prison for shoplifting by inventing a 'never present' dad who is looking after them.
Fermín is a doctor who fall in love of Mararia in silence. Beltrahn appears and wins the love of Mararia and unleash the wrath of Fermin.

Title_x: The Sound of One Hand Clapping
Frau Rettich, die Czerni und ich

Description_x: Thrane has always had his own method of dealing with life. He tends to slip away. But when he sees beautiful Mol the same day he moves to a new apartment, he knows he'll be staying, even though she's married. Her husband is away workdays.
A cab-driver spends his days listening to his passengers' conversations. A writer faces a creativity bottleneck.

Title_x: I Wonder Who's Kissing You Now

Description_x: Two highschool girls try to find their true loves among the guys who are wooing them.

Nur is a woman who suffers from bipolar depression with psychosis. While she stays in a mental institution she confronts with her life; her childhood, her parents and her marriage...Can she ever learn to love herself?
During World War 2 four italian university students join the resistence against the fascist government.
A story about the insecurity and instability in Belgium 1980's created by extreme-right-wing politicians, gangsters and corrupt police officers.

Set in France in 1961-1962 during the Algerian War, Living In Paradise is a thought-provoking examination of the lives of North African immigrants trying to find a place in the social system of Western Europe.
Nikolai Petrovich comes to St. Petersburg to organize a revolution against the oligarchy.
In Lisbon, French author Paul meets various people from his past who uncover forgotten memories.
When a detective investigates the suicide of a man, he finds that it may be a murder, and everybody seems to be a suspect.

A young woman, while helping her father clean out his house, discovers her dead mother's intimate diary. As she transcribes the contents in order to make copies for her siblings, she discovers a shocking secret which transforms her life.
A young man gets obsessed with a mysterious older woman. After her tragic death he starts a strange sexual affair with her teenage daughter.
The drama of a Jewish immigrant who is going to study in a catholic school and falls in love with a black catholic girl.
Marthe, an aging queen of the night, roams the streets of a city haunted by the presence of an invisible murderer in search of money to pay a large gambling debt.
Can a childhood crush survive into adulthood?
Garrulous Zhang Damin is annoying and droll, lives together with his mother, two brothers and two sisters, in a orderly life.

Title_x: Dai-nana kankai hoko: Osaki Midori o sagashite
I Know What You Did Last Summer
Description_x: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.
An English professor falls for a minor, and has to face the consequences of his actions.
As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.
Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the FBI for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the drug dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.
Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.
A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.
An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.
Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.
A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.
A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.
An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.
A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.
The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.
In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.
After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...
A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

Title_x: The Man Who Knew Too Little
Description_x: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.
A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.
A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.
Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.
A psychotic criminal couple kidnaps a random teenage couple. The woman rapes the male captive, and lets him watch his lover being raped by the man. They then plan to sacrifice the couple.

A down-on-his-luck American Indian recently released from jail is offered the chance to "star" as the victim of a snuff film, the resulting pay of which could greatly help his poverty stricken family.
A sports fan's romantic courtship clashes with his obsession with his favorite football team.
1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.
A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.
A family is torn apart after a father gives his valuable farm land to his daughters.
After returning home from the Korean War, two young men search for love and fulfillment in middle America.
At the discovery of his ability to work miracles, Juvenal becomes a media sensation, but now he's prone to those who want to exploit him.
In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.
During World War II a Jewish boy is left on his own for months in a ruined house in the Warsaw Ghetto, where he must learn all the tricks of survival under constantly life-threatening conditions.
The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

Richter is a lazy son of a wealthy woman, who's put up with too much so no more money. He's about to lose his local newspaper job arranged by his mom. Richter owes money to a violent drug dealer/blackmailer but sees his wife. Death wish?

The sudden reappearance of his best friend Toni, after a ten year absence, causes Chris to remember his past, to question some of his lifestyle decisions and to re-evaluate his life and marriage to Marion.
A swinging married couple pursues erotic pleasures with a dangerous husband and wife while vacationing in Italy.
In this adaptation of the Henry James novel set in 19th-century New York City, a wealthy spinster with an overbearing father is pursued by a handsome fortune hunter who may be only after her money.

Pippi is a little girl who lives alone in her house, while her father is sailing the seas. With Pippi we meet her horse, her monkey and her two friends Tommy and Anika. Together they go on many journeys through the neighborhood.
A businessman kills his adulterous wife and is sent to prison. After the release, he opens a barbershop and meets new people, talking almost to no one except an eel he befriended while in prison.

Title_x: The Second Jungle Book: Mowgli & Baloo
Description_x: The story of Mowgli, a young boy abandoned in the wilds of India. Raised by a panther, an elephant and a bear, Mowgli must learn civilization's ways when his long-lost uncle and a circus scout from Barnum and Bailey come looking for him.

A hospital resident is put in the middle of a legal battle between two half-sisters on whether to pull their comatose dad's life support. But more seems to be at stake than dad's life - his inheritance.
Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

Based on Pat Barker's novel of the same name, "Regeneration" tells the story of soldiers of World War One sent to an asylum for emotional troubles. Two of those soldiers are England's most important WW1 poets.
A young car mechanic, while in the middle of an unlikely love affair, tries to protect the people in his poor gypsy neighborhood from a gangster who terrorizes the locals.
Little Tree is an 8-year-old Cherokee boy who loses his parents during The Great Depression and begins living with his Indian grandparents and learning the Cherokee way of life.
A pair of teenage girls, who are blind by day, but when the sun goes down, they roam the streets to quench their thirst for blood.

Brazillian urban guerrilla fighters kidnap the American Ambassador. Now, the diplomat's life hangs in the balance - helplessly caught between a government unwilling to cooperate - and his fear of the captors themselves.
A con artist escapes a deal gone wrong in New York and winds up in the Aussie outback in a strange town whose inhabitants are an oddball collection of misfits.
Russian author Fyodor Dostoyevsky (Sir Michael Gambon) must write a novel in twenty-seven days in a deal to pay off his gambling debts, and feverishly dictates the novel "The Gambler".

An ordinary foundry worker fakes a love story between him and the chambermaid from RMS Titanic. When ship sinks and chambermaid probably dies, his story gains popularity. But lie always has its price.

Title_x: Love and Death on Long Island

Description_x: Gordon Comstock quits his job at an advertising agency in order to write poetry, only to find that poets, like everyone else, need money.

In 1950s, two incestuous lovers, a depraved suave journalist and his equally depraved prostitute sister, plan to get rich through seduction and murder. Things complicate when their feeble-minded mother begins to suspect something.
In the turmoil of the Spanish Civil War, a young man comes of age sexually, through a string of relationships with a wide range of mature, older women.
Based on Primo Levi's autobiographical "The Reawakening".
Setting in a small mountain town, a man, looking for revenge because of his daughter's accidentally killing, mistakenly track out a young couple, troubling with their ordinary life problems.

A small poor boy lives with his caring grandfather in a small Flemish village in the 19th century Belgium, has a lovable pet dog, loves art and dreams of becoming a famous painter one day. Based on a famous Flemish novel.
Leary and Sanchez-Gijon play "romantically involved down-and-out lounge singers" who get involved in a caper.
In 1930s Shanghai, a young office girl falls in love with a factory worker in the same company.
Bus conductor Tomiko falls in love with driver Niitaka, even though she also suspects him of being a serial killer who killed his female conductors after tiring of them.
Pakistani taxi-driver Parvez and prostitute Bettina find themselves trapped in the middle when Islamic fundamentalists decide to clean up their local town.
A young boy, tired of his mother's abusive boyfriend, sets out on an adventure to London meeting a friendly man. But there is fear on the streets and people are missing. Will link be next?
Johanna mouths songs voiced by Jeanne & become a smashing success which gradually gnaws away at their friendship.
Three kids in a small town pursue a group of kidnappers.
A true story about a Flemish resistance warrior.
Fed up with the harsh treatment his master has given him, a brave little mouse (and later his dog, Brewster) sets off on an adventure.

An elderly German tourist is killed in Paris at the hands of Joseph Katz, an old junk dealer beloved by detective Sam Bellamy. Despite witnessing the crime, Sam covers for Joseph, upon which the latter vanishes in mysterious circumstances.
The story of an ordinary family living in Czechoslovakia from around 1963 until the Velvet Revolution. Based on the semi-autobiographical novel by Michal Wiewegh.
Spanish TV reporters covering the War in Bosnia. Based on true experience.
An old and invaluable statue is stolen from Mali in Africa.Its thief decides to go a step further and steals from other people too.

Hannibal spends most of his day watching TV as there's no other kid in his area, his parents return home at 5 pm and his grandma is nearly deaf. He gets a dog, Jerry, who can't bark but it speaks. Jerry gets dognapped.

A crime wave hits Oslo just as summer arrives. There has been found several violent blood splattered scenes with no bodies found. It's only a matter of time before the bodies has to surface, and the start of a run against the clock.
A fantasy/mystery about the disappearance of a lighthouse owner and his daughter.
Two friends from a small Greek town travel to Bulgaria and Switzerland, hoping they can gain money from the difference in foreign exchange rates.
A group of high school graduates transition into adulthood in a dangerous and violent town in Japan.

Italian man unknowingly becomes a drug mule and gets arrested in Thailand. He is sent to tough prison where he plans escape with the help of another prisoner who also has a score to settle with the drug dealer who set the Italian up.

The woman in red is Ana Cumpanas, a Romanian emigrated to the US, which facilitates the killing of her lover, the famous gangster John Dillinger in Chicago. After an adventurous life, the woman returns to die in her homeland.
A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.
A tragic story of a mother who dedicates her only child for the sake of the freedom of the country during liberation war in 1971.
In the sixties, around twenty families fled their Algerian village of el-Ouricia, driven by poverty or war. Refugees in Chaâba, a French shantytown, they face the hard learning of integration.
A man is trapped in an elevator, getting out proves to be more challenging than just asking for help.
Tolla takes out a contract on himself and then changes his mind.
A petroleum engineer from Texas travels to an oil operation in Central America where he clashes with his boss, romances two women, and finds himself caught in a guerrilla war.

The story of a thirties bank employee whose wife becomes a luxury prostitute. The same would happen with the next woman who knows. Xouan a promoter says he belongs to a particular class of people and asks him to work together.
Two young people meet by chance and fall in love but the woman is diagnosed with leprosy and sent away to a remote mountain sanitorium.

When the nazi-movement strikes during the thirties, one Swedish family, lead by the couregous "brother" - played by Superstar Fredrik Sjöblom, strives towards equality and justice through vigilantism.
The subject is widows in a traditional Indian community.
Austrian avant-garde theatre director Kurt Palm adaption of Flann O'Brien's beer-soaked, brilliantly funny, modernist masterpiece for the screen.

A French school introduces a campaign to give African refugees shelter for one month at local families. Young Tonin too wants to help but his parents disagree, so he keeps Moussa, an African boy his own age, hidden in their house.
Commissioner Diamant investigates the murder of two black girls. They were sacrificed, hanged, their faces covered with a Malian ceremony mask.
A Chinese space scientist shows his loyalty to his career and family.

In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.
This film adaptation of a Roald Dahl work tells the story of Matilda Wormwood, a gifted girl forced to put up with a crude, distant father and mother.
Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.
An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.
An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.
An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.
At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.
A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.
A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.
While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.
An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.
The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.
Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.
After being bitten by a werewolf in the jungle, Ted looks for a cure. His lawyer sister, with a son and dog, invites him to park his camper by her house in the woods and live out of her fridge.
The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.
An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.
Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.
A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.
When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.
A mother and daughter find their lives adversely affected when a new man enters the picture. Will their family ever be what they expect?
Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?
A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

Title_x: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
Description_x: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing owners, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, in search for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.
An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.
One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.
A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.
A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.
A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

A hardened New Orleans cop, Dave Robicheaux, finally tosses in the badge and settles into life on the bayou with his wife. But a bizarre plane crash draws him back into the fray when his family is viciously threatened.

Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.
Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

Joe and Betty run a fish market and have sunk into a comfortable/boring life. Enter the drifter Nick, who takes a job in the store. He awakes Joe's hope in the future and Betty's sexual passions. Until their son Danny returns home..
A young policewoman slowly goes insane while tracking down an elusive serial rapist/killer through Italy when she herself becomes a victim of the brutal man's obsession.
A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.
Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.
An American spy behind the lines during WWII serves as a Nazi propagandist, a role he cannot escape in his future life as he can never reveal his real role in the war.

Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.

The young emperor's decision to force the senators of Rome to live under a regime as cruel, moronic, meaningless and random as he believes life itself to be. His decision is prompted by the death of his sister, with whom he was in love.

In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.
A comedy about making it on Wall Street. Prejudices are hard to break and Laurel Ayres quickly learns that in order for people to take her seriously she has to work for an older white man or be one.

Title_x: The Last of the High Kings
Description_x: After finishing exams June 1977 near Dublin, Frankie spends the summer with his two friends, siblings and mom while dreaming of two cute girls and waiting for exam results. College?

A former policeman-turned college professor of forensics, is asked by a widow to solve the murder of her unfaithful husband and the disappearance of his mistress who may have been linked to some drug dealers.

A group of washed-up Canadian punk rockers get back together for a road trip in memory of a dear friend who was supposedly shot, or so rumors imply. As they travel, they ignore the underlying psychological darkness within each other.
A troubled detective befriends a single woman and her daughter with the intention of using them as bait for a serial killer.
The war exploits of French captain Conan and his men during World War I and during the Allied intervention in the Russian Civil War.

The Other Side of Sunday criticizes the small, and often tight church community. We follow the Preachers Daughter; Maria, in her journey to liberate herself from the stiff church community and her strict religious father.
The story of families living in barracks, left by the US Army in Reykjavik at the conclusion of World War II.

Finbar is an Irish youth who, late one night, leapt from a freeway overpass and was never heard from again. When he suddenly reappears three years later, his family and friend Danny attempt to rebuilt their shattered lives.
The difficult making of Roberto Rossellini's masterpiece 'Roma, città aperta (1946)' in a Rome still suffering from the wounds of just ended WWII.
A group of toys take matters into their own hands when their Christmas delivery is in jeopardy.
The investigation of an apparent suicide in post-war Spain leads Inspector Barciela to discover a story of revenge for the hatred and grudges of the past.

She was tall, dark and thin, with a proud and voluptuous bust. They called her "The she-wolf" because she seemed never to be satisfied. All the men were obsessed with her but one day the she-wolf fell madly in love with young Nanni.

Title_x: Malena es un nombre de tango
Description_x: Malena's life from adolescence to adulthood, unraveling the history of her family and her own while she is strongly influenced by her older sister.
In order to get her husband back, an architect's psycho ex-wife kills everybody she can get her hands on.

A devout Catholic peasant girl is corrupted by two new friends when her family moves to the city. An allegory of traditional Polish values under threat from materialism and decadence in the post-Communist era.
Plot is set at the end of 19th century, in the crossroad between Muslim and Christian culture, intertwine by eternal Balkan story - war and peace between members of different religions...
Morgan, a sensitive 12-year-old, growing up in richness and royalty, finds a true friend in Julien, a young man hired to tutor him.
In a forest, a man was murdered and his wife raped. The eyewitnesses make their statements, but they are very contradictory. Who is telling the truth and who is lying?

Title_x: El último viaje de Robert Rylands
Description_x: Loosely (and controversial) adaptation of the novel "All Souls" by Javier Marias. It tells the story of a Spanish professor at Oxford who witnesses the return of a very popular man there.
Julia (Marisa Ryan), a struggling actress living in San Diego, hits the road after an ex-boyfriend in Spokane, WA, sends her a postcard proposing marriage.
In a world where international terrorism knows no national borders, Wallander and his South African colleagues must prevent a crime that would change the face of history.
Passion, criminal instincts an traditions melt together in this film, that shakes our conception of crime.
After her grandmother dies, a young woman decides to find her mother who abandoned her when she was a baby.
Palmira, a woman belonging to the Sevillian aristocracy, as well known for her decrepitude and hypocrisy as the rest of her population, enters into an emotional crisis when she reaches maturity.

Sir Edward Lamb, famous publisher, delights in reading the latest novel by his old friend Nicolas Fabry. The elegant English aristocrat learns with dismay that the Frenchy is responsible for the death of the one he loved in Tunisia.
Dumitru Costa, a young trainee prosecutor is entrusted with the investigation about the suspicious death of a Jiu Valley coal miner in 1990s Romania. Accident or murder?

Follows the life of the famous German politician, writer, and communist activist, Gustav Regler, from his birth in 1898, in the Saar, through the two World Wars and his many travels, until his death in 1963 in India.

Rose Hindmarsh finds herself at the centre of a controversy when she meets author Sarah Maloney as she investigates the life of Mary Swann, an obscure poet who was brutally murdered in a small town in rural Ontario.
Tony is a homosexual law student who quits his studies. With a van and a handful of cash, he hits the road hoping to become a salesman. This, however, turns out to be harder than he expected.

Title_x: Va' dove ti porta il cuore
Description_x: A grandmother writes a diary for her nephew, her grandson finds the diary after her death and finds out the true family story.
Two separated twins, each living with a single parent and unaware from other one's existence, meet each other and switch places.
Dalva, a young hairdresser, is leaving for Miami to receive a prize. Her journey is interrupted, when her former boyfriend, Victor, makes her a captive in her own house.

Andrés and Paula are a middle-class couple who live in a terrace house in the outskirts of Madrid. Everything seems perfect in their married life until one day an apparently unimportant lie brings all their miseries to the surface.

Title_x: Jack Frusciante Has Left the Band

Description_x: Land surveyor Taavetti Rytkönen remembers the old days like they were yesterday - but he can't remember yesterday. He sets out on a journey to hunt down the past.
The forbidden love affair between Peri, an Indian, and the beautiful Ceci, a Portuguese white girl, in the 17th century Brazil.

WW1: A woman ,whose husband refused to get back on the offensive -for the eleventh time!- and then was shot as an example ,is harassed by her "patriot" neighbors and the Police:she winds up in an insane asylum.

Title_x: O Monge e a Filha do Carrasco

Description_x: A number of old family conflicts emerge when a writer returns to his hometown to attend his mother's funeral.
A man with no ambitions or scruples, upon his release from prison, meets a former classmate who has fallen on hard times and has lost his will to try to better himself and his life.
Truth and fiction collide when sexual obsession leads to betrayal. A voyage of discovery realigns subject, object and victim - things are not always as they seem.

The film is based on the novellas written by Jolita Skablauskaite, Petras and Povilas Dirgelos. Three different plays are about people who can't find their place in society and who keep living in the world of their fantasies.
Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.
When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.
Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.
A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.
Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.
A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.
A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.
A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.
Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs on a rural English farm, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.
A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.
Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.
A big city reporter travels to a small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman for whom she worked as a housekeeper.
When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.
A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.
In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.
A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love and hate.
An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.
Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.
An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.
Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.
3 women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.
Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.
A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past.
A struggling American writer (England) and a fellow American expatriate (Mandylor) begin a sordid affair among the chaos and discord of 1940 Paris, France on the brink of World War II.
A young woman's husband apparently commits suicide without warning or reason, leaving behind his wife and infant.

Title_x: How to Make an American Quilt
Description_x: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.
Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.
The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.
In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.
The exiled royal physician to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.
A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

A scientist creating perfumes inherits his great grandfather Dr. Jekyll's formula and decides to use modern technology to improve it. He ends up as an ambitious, ruthless woman. She tries to prevent returning into the spineless man.
Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?
The lives of men and women living on Callejón de los Milagros in Mexico City.
After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.
A Las Vegas cab driver discovers a stolen million dollars, and is tracked by a relentless and cold-blooded assassin sent to retrieve the money.
The convoluted continuation of the adventures of the time-traveling, now-human Monkey King, who attempts to fulfill his divine destiny.
The biological and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.
A recovering gambling addict attempts to reconcile with his family and friends but finds trouble and temptation when caught between feelings for his ex-wife and her dangerous hoodlum boyfriend.
Becoming an orphan in 1935, Collin moves to his dad's cousins Verena and Dolly. Verena is a rich, bossy businesswoman. Dolly, Collin and the maid revolt, moving to a tree house.
In 1980, USA opens to Cuban refugees. Once in Miami, Dorita tries to create a Perez "family" of 3 to get a sponsor. She wants Juan to be her "husband" - plus a "son" or "dad".
In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.
A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.
A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.
A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.
The adventures of Sarah as she stays at Miss Minchin's boarding school.
A South African preacher goes to search for his wayward son, who has committed a crime in the big city.
Orphaned at a young age, naive Fanny Hill moves to London to make her fortune but is soon lured into the seedy world of prostitution in the bawdy houses of the city.

Title_x: Institute Benjamenta, or This Dream That One Calls Human Life
Description_x: A young man goes to a school for servants run by a brother and sister. In the dreamlike and surreal world that he enters, how will his presence impact the people there and possibly even the school itself?
A police officer impersonates his murdered twin brother in order to bring his killers to justice.

In a small village on the border of Northern Ireland and The Republic of Ireland, the relationship between a short tempered policeman and his rebellious son becomes even more strenuous when the young man falls for a "wrong" girl.
A group of homosexual people try to live with dignity and self-respect while events build to the opening battle in the major gay rights movement.
After an abandoned young woman in late 19th Century England is taken in by a rural couple with three handsome sons, tragic consequences result.
A writer with dwarfism shares the story of his unconventional, though not altogether bad, upbringing as his mother struggled to raise him in the mid 20th century, with the help of a surrogate father.
A tale of power, passion, and obsession set in a politically torn Eastern European country.

A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcomer.
Madsen plays an assassin who's hired to kill the woman he loves.

Title_x: The Phoenix and the Magic Carpet

Description_x: A ten years old child, sick, comes to his grandparents house for a summer. The visitors and neighbours will make his stay very amusing.
An elite sports doctor with 2 months to live offers to help a basketball team, so as to find a healthy boy to switch bodies with. A teenager wakes up to find himself in the old doctor's dying body.
Sebastian is one of five youths who are always together. Suddenly he realizes that he is attracted to another boy (Ulf).
Melodrama about a man cursed with immortality, who tries to declare his undying love for a depressed actress.
Charlie Thorpe, a security systems expert, gets caught during a robbery. When he is released from jail he is hired by a bank owner to design a fool proof system during the refurbishing of a bank.

Title_x: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea

Description_x: When Hector and Elvira, a pair of young monkeys from two opposing families, fall in love, Elvira comes into possession of a secret weapon, war breaks out among the families and only she can choose between power and love.
Private investigator Nick Sharman accepts a case which at first seems intriguing, but ends up causing him bitter regret.

Title_x: A Young Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court

Description_x: Lt. Thomas Glahn and Edvarda fall in love, but love can turn to hate.
Mondo is a homeless young boy, with a big smile, who wanders around Nice looking for food and a place to sleep.

Title_x: No te mueras sin decirme adónde vas
Description_x: It is the fantastic story of a couple that has the chance to live for centuries loving one another because of various reincarnations.
Other Voices, Other Rooms
Two Italian-immigrant couples are part of a game that leads to treason and brings serious consequences to those who lose.
Lina Inverse and her overly-endowed associate Nagha the Serpent travel to Mipross Island, where they encounter an old sage who enlists them in his battle to defeat the demon Joyrock.
Melodrama about the life of a mentally handicapped young man and his devoted sister after their famous novelist father and housewife mother go to Australia on a business trip.
Koji Wakamatsu's biopic about a Japanese free jazz/improvisation saxophonist named Kaoru Abe.
Pekka returns to his native village to attend a wedding. The village has lost its younger generations, and the movie tells the story of the last wedding in the village.
In Paris, a small troupe is shooting the film "La Traviata". Alfredo is the actor Alberto Sanna and the dressmaker is Rosa, who years ago had a brief adventure with him.
Based on the autobiographical books by Lise Nørgaard. About her childhood in Roskilde and her struggle as a young female journalist in the 1940's.
A wronged woman takes revenge on her wheelchair bound father-in-law.
Siao Yu needs a Green Card. Mario Moretti needs his debts paid. Getting married could solve their problems, or multiply them.
An intriguing look at a sinister web of power, linking politics and the mafia in modern day Italy.
Luca could appear a regular guy interested in spacial engineering. He is not. He rapes a girl and then, without being recognized, courts her! In the mean time he tries to rape another girl.

Poland, 1939. Painter Marek Wawrowski lives in a small town with his wife and son. He meets young, beautiful Jewish girl, Deborah, immediately falls in love with her and they start a passionate affair. Then the World War II breaks out.

Based on a true story, after the US withdrawal and the fall of South Vietnam to the communist forces in 1975, many people are sent to reeducation camps. Several desperate boys in one of the camps begin planing their escape.

It is the last day of school in a run-down technical institute in the Roman suburbs: the pupils are not really diligent and the teachers give their worst both from a working and personal point of view.
Haunted by a book found in her dead brother's room, Pari wanders around to find answers for a meaningful life.
Six friends are trapped in an isolated cabin reachable only by a rugged ten-mile hike. Then they start to die one by one.
"El" re-imagined by Ruiz and Sarmiento as a portrait of a marriage characterized by shared jealousy, paranoia and lunacy.
A subtile, soft exploration of the relation between love and death.
Flat-dwelling urban family win a pig in a raffle, and decide to keep it. They lose their flat (no pets allowed) but eventually Rudi the pig makes good.
Old entertainer gets a last chance to play a serious role.
14 year old Nakamura is sexually abused by her stepfather. She invents a friend who is coming to her rescue when she really needs it.
An unemployed English teacher has private lessons with the fiancee of a mysterious American. When the foreigner suddenly disappears, the woman asks the teacher to help her find him.

Title_x: Legend of Crystania: The Motion Picture
Description_x: Dreams begin to haunt Lady Sheru -- dreams of her past life as Pirotesse. Her love, Ashram, is being tormented at the hands of the soul of Barbas posing as their former king, Beld of Marmo.

An anonymous, mysterious caller who claims to be a huge fan of Revanth, the Chess Grandmaster from India, challenges him in many ways. It results in an inner quest for him as he literally sets out to track down the elusive caller.

In spite of a longstanding tradition forbidding women from working in a sake brewery, Retsu, a young blind woman, challenges herself to overcome her disability in order to save her family's sake business.
In the autumn of 1941, the last defender of the Brest fortress continues a fight against the German invaders.

Inspired in Lygia Fagundes Telles's famous book, the film follows three very different girls (Lorena, Lia and Ana Clara) living in a boarding house during some of the most repressive moments of Brazil's military dictatorship.
The film charts the fortunes of two women who loved each other as sisters, but whose paths diverge when the Revolution brings an end to their old way of life in the brothel.
The film presents us with a reflection on the Spanish Civil War in the Portuguese society, At a time when Salazar ruled.
A cynical woman (Champa) leads exploited workers in a revolt against a cruel landowner (Mohan Agashe) in India

On the death of his mother, Martin joins a father he does not know in Africa. Received rather freshly by this father more concerned about the reserve for which he is responsible than for this new son, Martin will discover this country
Three short stories by the American expatriate, Paul Bowles, are brought to sinister life - 'Merkala Beach', 'Call at Corazon' and the haunting 'Allal'.

First Love is based on the eponymous novella by Turgenev. The main character is a 15-year old boy spending his summer in the countryside with his parents. When a family moves in next door he becomes infatuated with a beautiful neighbor.
A man tries to analyze the life of a deceased friend.

A wedding planner wants to promote outdoor wedding and honeymoon but has it's first canceled days before. One of the two women in charge decides to step in and get married instead. Things don't go as planned - primarily due to one man.

Title_x: Als werkelijkheidszin bestaat moet mogelijkheidszin ook bestaan

Description_x: A grieving man tries to find the cause of his young wife's suicide by spending the night next to her dead body and bringing back memories from their past.

The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title_x: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
Description_x: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.
The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.
When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.
CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.
A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.
A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.
Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.
While driving on a remote highway, a man is torn between choosing to reunite with his estranged wife or taking up with his lover.
A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.
Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

On the eve of a large payment, residents of a collapsing collective farm see their plans turn into desolation when they discover that Irimiás, a former co-worker who they thought was dead, is returning to the community.
A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.
A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.
A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.
Sick of the neglect he receives from his mom and dad, a young boy leaves home and travels the world in search of new parents.

Chile 1973 is ruled by the dictator Pinochet. The wealthy don't see the violence, terror, executions etc. including Irene. She's engaged to an officer in the fascist military. She meets Francisco who opens her eyes to truth and love.
A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.
A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming Gypsy.
The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.
A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.
The Earth is invaded by stingray-shaped alien "slugs" that ride on people's backs and control their minds.
A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.
After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.
An alienated and misanthropic teenager gains sudden and unwanted celebrity status after he's taken hostage by terrorists where his indifference to their threats to kill him makes news headlines.
Three children have had it with their mother, and magically make her disappear. The kids then head out to the "Mommy Market" for a replacement mom.
His life was emotionally closed off from the world, until an orphaned baby showed up at his house.
In this sequel to A Christmas Story (1983), it is now summer in the Parker family and the usual number of events is happening in their separate lives.
Two people with help of some friends explore their sexuality.
A cat must investigate brutal murders of other cats in a neighborhood he has moved into with his owner.
An ordinary man is lured into a strange puppet theatre by a map and finds himself embroiled in a production of the Faustian legend.
Desideria, a married Spanish woman who has a quite boring and hidden sex-life, goes to Istanbul where she meets Yaman, a Turkish tourist guide, who makes her discover new physical experiences.
In a West African nation, the womanizing British 1st Secretary of the High Commissioner deals with different issues.
A recently widowed, small-time hustler struggles to raise his two teenage daughters on his own, and still make a dishonest living in 1950s Indiana.

Graham, a lonely Welsh postal worker, adopts James, a troubled ten-year-old boy. Graham always wanted a son, but James loves his biological father too much to give Graham a chance. Will the two be able to accept each other as family?
Pietro is the sensitive son of Domenico, a gruff father. Pietro falls in love with a beautiful girl, Ghisola, who lives with her grandparents.

Legend has it that in a faraway place beyond the edge of the earth, there exists a broken-hearted man with infinite power. Abandoned by his loved ones, the inheritance of the old man's chi power becomes a battleground for evil outsiders.
How the life of Victor Chmara toppled during the course of a single day during the summer of 1958 ?
Professor Jean Rivière receives phone calls accusing him of murder. A teddy bear arrives by mail.
The Krunborg family has new problems: a freshly painted house that won't dry, a tent with holes and a car that won't go anywhere and much much more.
A young marchioness who loves the way of free-thinking and flatterers invites an author into her house who pretends to seduce her...
The story of Kafka's Castle.
During the long train ride from Montreal to Vancouver, a man and woman find themselves increasingly attracted to each other.

Title_x: Back to Back, Face to Face

Description_x: When a new and dangerous "Outsider" chases an intelligent golden retriever in the South American jungles, Terror grips a team of ex-Military convicts sent to capture the creature.

Title_x: Huck and the King of Hearts

Description_x: A woman psychologist, who specialises in research about twins, is haunted by her dead mothers ghost.
A hungry, homeless, socially isolated and socially alienated young man living on the streets of an anonymous Russian big city in the 19th Century is looking for answers about himself.
Torben is 14 year old teen, whose imagination often gets him in trouble. His father sends him away to a farm during a summer break, and it doesn't take long for him to get in trouble again.
Two Mexican Jewish girls of come of age in Mexico City during the 1960s.

Title_x: ...and the Earth Did Not Swallow Him

Description_x: A French football playing exchange student falls in love.
In the 1940s, young Kirghiz boy falls hopelessly for Jamilla, but their love has no future.

Title_x: Quand j'avais 5 ans je m'ai tué

Description_x: Antoine, 11, is on holiday with his grandfather. One night he catches thieves hiding their booty in a pond. Antoine seizes the 40 million. But Liza, his new friend, is the daughter of one of the criminals. Both children soon face threats.

The young teenager Otto is entering the summer holidays in 60s Oslo, without getting a real holiday, and he is not accepted in the gang or the football team. But then he meets exciting mysterious Frank, which changes everything.
The restaurateur and womanizer Jerrie meets the guest Sara. A passionate but stormy relationship begins. Sara is not like the other women Jerrie has met. Soon Sara is the boss.
Ava is a 10-year-old girl who runs away from home with her best friend, Nellie, a 2-ton circus elephant. They are pursued by everyone from the police to the circus' owner.
Dean is 36 and recently diagnosed as HIV positive. He has come home to tell his mother and his older brother Milo.
When Peter Costello is exiled to a deserted island for stealing sheep, Mary, a maid, decides to join him there.

Title_x: The Wizard of the Emerald City

Description_x: Based on the great river story, (Taebaegsanmaek) The Taebaek Mountains chronicles the lasting generational conflict between proprietors and peasants in South Korea.
A bird catcher's empathy for the birds interferes with his livelihood.
Abulah seeks revenge on Pak Daddy and Vihishnu for the death of his wife. A series of funny and mindless events ensue.

Title_x: Wonder Boy - De sueur et de sang

Description_x: Alex lost his job and home. He meets the lesbian Caroline who gives him a new start.
Individual memories of a group of teenage Holocaust survivors in Israel creates sharp conflicts among them.
Chronicle of the dramatic situation of human rights in Guatemala, narrated by a young indigenous woman who witnessed a massacre that occurred in the Central American country.
A reporter struggles to cover a Native American group's battle with the government for independence in a remote area of Canada.

Based on Dostoyevsky's 'Crime and Punishment': Ramón is a lonely laws student that lives in a rented room and thinks he has committed the perfect crime, but can't stand the consequences. A story of irrationality, anxiety and suffering.
13 year old Sixten really wants his father to meet someone he can marry. Without telling his father, he and his friends write an ad for the personal sections.

1962, in Algeria. The journalist Jérome Cartier is called into the ranks of the French army, where he meets his friend François. The latter is the victim of an attack by the OAS. Jérome tracks the culprits.
A gentleman Jiøí Oulický hires a sevant Saturnin and from that day he goes through many unusual situations...
Adaptation of the highly popular children's novel by Branko Copic, who in this book resembles his school and college days in Bihac, Bosnia, in the years before WWII.

Title_x: Zivot a neobycejna dobrodruzstvi vojaka Ivana Conkina
The Secret of Queen Anne or Musketeers Thirty Years After
Description_x: The 3rd part of the famous trilogy by Alexandre Dumas about d'Artagnan and his 3 friends Athos, Porthos and Aramis.
Arman, a truly brilliant violin player, one day decides to take a break from his career and descends into the bunkering world of tube stations.

Title_x: A Shadow You Soon Will Be

Description_x: A man and a woman meet an elf, whose name is Barnabo, and who knows the secret.
France, free zone, autumn 1940. A couple of young married women whose husband is a teacher and two teenagers who love each other secretly.
An entire village meets a bizarre fate when all of its female inhabitants become pregnant at the same time, impregnated seemingly by an unknown force.
Jack Baker arrives in Tahiti to write a new biography of Paul Gauguin. There he meets Cohn, famous for his swindling and drinking, and who claims to be the painter's heir.
A vegetarian (Jake Webber) takes a detour from a cross-country trip to promote his father's (David Huddleston) burger chain.
When a man's best friend is shot in cold blood by two corrupt policemen, he must track down the only eyewitnesses, who have deported to Mali.

Little Benjamin and Margalit are raised in the boondocks of Israel by their long-suffering mother, but they have in them something of their father, who can't stay in a place with no prospect of riches and excitement.

Title_x: Life and Death of the Hollywood Kid
Description_x: The story of film director Yun Myoggil and his best friend Lim Byoungsuk whom has obsessive with watching American film. Lim gave his playscript to Yun to make a film. Yun begins to realise that the most of script was replicated.

Title_x: How to Be Miserable and Enjoy It

Description_x: The boys Johan and Ove are best friends. When Ove's father dies, Ove gets a little "weird" and they lose contact.
A failed writer given to plagiarism gets a buzz at the door from a bright young working girl with a highly original approach to life and sex and his life and work is totally thrown off balance.

Title_x: Edogawa Rampo gekijo: Oshie to tabisuru otoko

Description_x: A boy has an unusual upbringing in a romantic setting , the household of a former film star, who reminisces about his past.
Based on a novel by Yehoshua Kenaz.
The Guidon de Repeygnac, a family of aristocrats ruined by the Stock Exchange, leave their mansion in Neuilly for two F4s in the red suburbs.

A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.
After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.
A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.
A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.
A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.
