A Denver reporter investigates the mass murder of a family of Mormons in rural Colorado.

Isolated by his strange parents, Leon finds solace in an imaginary friend, which happens to be an anatomy doll from his father's doctor office. Unfortunately, the doll begins to take over Leon's life, and his sister's life as well.
An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

A divorced executive named Marshall and his 11-year-old son, Charlie, casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers Marshall's mind to Charlie's body and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

A war photographer returns home to Montréal to discover that his two partners have left him to be together. Alone in the city, he photographs what he sees, trying to heal both his war memories and a broken heart.
A night in the life of a young woman who wishes to learn and experience more of life. The men she meets have as much to learn from her as they can offer her, or more.
A surrealistic revision of Alice in Wonderland.
An accidental breakdown of a valve on the irrigation ditch launches a hot confrontation between local farmers and corrupt authorities.
A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.
5 models board a cruise ship with a cute Indian stowaway in Emmanuelle's trunk. A 2nd officer plans a kidnap of them with jewels once they reach the Amazon jungle.
The wife's affair and a death in the family hasten the demise of an upper-class English marriage.
An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.
An Earthman returns to the planet Gor, and fights against tyranny.
A burnt-out shrink needs a temp. A charming escaped convict takes over his practice and radio show.
Robinson Crusoe is shipwrecked and he finds himself all alone on a tropical island. With a few tools he manages to rescue from the wreck he has to learn to support himself until help arrives.
A divorced mother may lose custody of her young daughter to her ex-husband after he learns that the little girl crawled into bed with the mother and her boyfriend.
A Louisiana football legend struggles to deal with life's complexities after his college career is over.
The Vigils are a gang of students at Trinity Catholic School... part of the tradition. They control the other boys by intimidation and the threat of violence.
A man's enthusiastic penis starts talking to him, getting him into awkward situations and convincing everyone he tells that he's completely insane.
A housewife in Nazi-occupied France struggles to make ends meet when her husband returns home after being wounded in the war.
A British art expert travels across America in order to purchase a rare Renoir painting in the South but comes across some crazy characters in the process.
A secret agent in Turkey is persuaded by his superiors to assist a couple of English cons in the theft of a priceless Greek statue.
Fact-based account of a secret society of murderers, and of the man who exposed them in British India 1825.
A Jamaican woman becomes the housekeeper for a rich Baltimore family and bonds with a disillusioned teenage boy.
A real estate developer who enjoyed short-lived success seeks to regain his edge by using cocaine, but takes himself to new lows as he gets lost in the downward spiral of drug addiction.

Title_x: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Description_x: Young people exploring a cave in Hawaii fall into a hole, and wind up in the lost city of Atlantis.
An alcoholic homeless man is given two hundred francs by a stranger, who requests that when he can he will return the money to Saint Therese in the cathedral.
A mad doctor puts together a new body by using body parts he steals from a mortuary at the hospital where he works.
In 1815, authors Lord Byron, Mary Shelley and Percy Shelley get together for some philosophical discussions, but the situation soon deteriorates into mind games, drugs and sex.

In medieval Paris, a young religious scholar and the beautiful niece of a local patrician fall madly in love and consummate their passion for each other. In the religious uproar that follows, they are condemned and brutally punished.

In the 19th century, a bullied, disfigured man dubbed Iguana flees from abusive locals, finds his own island and declares himself tyrant of his new domain. A man and a woman get stranded there and become victims of his new sadistic nature.
A painter becomes obsessed and begins an affair with a mysterious woman who was touched deeply by one of his works.

Renowned Russian piano teacher Irina Sousatzka gets a new student - Bengali piano prodigy Manek. They are both immigrants in the UK and bond quickly. When Manek's single mother's business fails, he must make a career decision.

After his mother dies and father goes to fight in World War II, a young boy moves in with his aunt and uncle who live in the countryside. Lonely and unhappy, he starts believing he has super powers. Then a "dead" man shows up.
In England during World War II, a repressed dressmaker and her sister struggle looking after their seventeen-year-old niece, who is having a delusional affair with an American soldier.
An I.R.A. gunman (Sir Anthony Hopkins) on the run from the government. He meets up with an idealistic young woman (Rebecca Pidgeon) and attempts to win her support for his cause.
In 1870 Russia, a group of young and idealistic anarchists plots to overthrow the established order through violent means.

A young man kills his bride on the day of his marriage and goes insane. He wakes up in an asylum with no memory, left in the hands of two mysterious doctors who relate his condition with his biological identity.
A young man joins a feisty runaway as he flees from the noblewoman who won him in a wager.

Title_x: Ne réveillez pas un flic qui dort

Description_x: A British soldier falls in love with a French woman wanted by the resistance for crimes against her country.

Based upon the novel "Jord!" by Erland Kiøsterud about Jor, living in Copenhagen, trying to make a living as an artist. Meanwhile he has to live off his girlfriend Gerda's prostitution. Then Morgan turns up, creating trouble.
A deeply-disturbed priest goes on a murderous night-time rampage across America's highways.

In a small European country, the king is scheduled to visit a small, quiet and "safe" village. It turns out that while the village may indeed be small, it's neither as quiet nor as safe as it's expected to be.
A New York playwright is summoned to Ireland to bury his father (his "Da"). While at his boyhood home, he encounters his father's spirit and relives memories both pleasant and not.
A criminal couple, hiding out in a remote property become the unwitting victims of a plot to blackmail them by the most unlikely of conspirators.
Days of Eclipse is filmed in a psychedelic manner close to stream of consciousness using unusual cinematographic techniques. The action is set in Middle Asia.

Two bank robbers hold the clerks hostage and demand 3 million German marks as ransom. What the police do not realise is that the true criminal mastermind watches them from outside the bank, anticipating every move.

Paul Duchene, owner of a thriving enterprise, works with his son Thomas and his wife Catherine. Drama begins when Paul unexpectedly catch his daughter-in-law sleeping with one of his son's colleagues.
American judge in Germany must decide if the hijacking of an East German plane into West Berlin was justified.
A coloured woman in South Africa finds a white baby on her doorstep and raises him as her own. Nine years later, he is discovered and taken away.
A demonic reincarnation of a Japanese general from the 10th century appears in the early 20th century Tokyo with a mission to destroy the blooming city.

Title_x: We Think the World of You

Description_x: When a physically and emotionally scarred soldier returns home from World War II, he mistakenly trusts a mysterious young drifter to deliver a secret love letter to his old sweetheart.
A drama following stories of characters from the Portuguese High Society.
Husnu has got issues and inabilities about the complex and expensive metropolitan life who was a successful teacher in his little town and got a promotion and appointment to Istanbul.
The story covers eighty years in the lives of a pair of Welsh identical twins with an unusual bond, as they go through war, love affairs and land disputes.
A girl from a wealthy family falls in love with a working-class boy.

Title_x: Folk og røvere i Kardemomme by
Description_x: The three robbers Kasper, Jesper and Jonathan lives together with their always hungry lion in the little town of Kardemommeby , the home to a fair but kind police officer, and the strict Aunt Sofie.
This film is adapted from the novel of Ah Cheng. During the Cultural Revolution (1966-1976), a young man is assigned to teach in village school.
A retelling of Emily Bronte's tale of vengeance and obsessive love, set in medieval Japan.
The story of two men with very different lives but united for the pleasure of killing.

Title_x: The Outside Chance of Maximilian Glick
Description_x: A young Jewish adolescent from an overbearing family likes a Christian girl and is helped by a fun-loving rabbi.

A boy reads about the attacks of a unknown animal on livestock in the town. He plans to run his own investigation. The so called beast however is also used as a metaphor for every day problems the townsfolk face.

When the man who left a package in his care is murdered, detective Tim Diamond suddenly has every major gangster in the city after him. With only the package and the help of his little brother, he sets out to unravel the mysterious plot.
A painter quits his job and looks to an old acquaintance for work and a place to stay.
A dream-like odyssey of a young man across plague-ridden 16th century Germany.
Junior-high students are restrained by their teachers and parents... One day, they plan a rebellion.
A man takes three co-workers hostage while working overtime on Thanksgiving weekend. He has no demands.
An expert magician is hired to entertain world leaders at a peace summit. Unfortunately, he finds himself hopelessly entangled in an elaborate terrorist assassination plot.
Jean Nevers is a solitary middle-aged bachelor whose apartment is next to that of Cora Elbaz, an erotic dancer who lives alone with her five year old son Antoine.
During the post-World War II occupation of Japan, a group of women forced to resort to prostitution band together in the ruins to save up for a dancehall.
A woman's fight for her identity and freedom as a woman.
A film adaptation of the Charles Dickens novel "Hard Times" set in a Portuguese industrial town of the 1980s.
A mysterious letter lures a family to Geneva in search of a treasure.
Two men pick up fourteen-year-old prostitutes girls. One of the girls begins to fight her client. A neighbor intervenes.
In La Joya, Extremadura in 1912 a local leader : Pedro Luis Jarrapellejos has the power . Two of his followers committed a horrible crime and it makes every effort to conceal the guilt of them.
A young maiden is the victim of an arranged marriage and runs away to the mountains to avoid her fate.
This is the true story about a group of Romani's (gypsy) in occupied Poland during World War II as they confront the atrocities and tragedies of a forgotten holocaust.
A young girl is raised as a man by an old cowboy. Her purpose is to kill her parents' murderers and go to the sea.

During a ceremony in an orthodox church in Paris, a 40-year-old writer and journalist is seduced by a young man, whom with she will live an extraordinary story of love and passion that will drive them to madness.
Poet Akiko Yosano is a poor woman with many children, she composes while doing the housework. Her passion flows towards Takeo Arishima, a noted novelist.

Onegin visits a friend, his fiancee and her sister Tatiana, who believes Onegin is her fated love. She writes a note telling him so, but he rejects her. Years later he returns, finding her married, but now he's smitten with her.
Jeanne Quester is a psychologist-on-the-airwaves in a radio station.She got a raw deal when she was a child.
A man buys an old, abandoned theater and puts on '50s-type rock shows. Then people start being killed in a rash of "accidents"...
A serial killing occurs at a port town brothel.
The decline of the Jia clan in imperial China.

On the beach lies the body of Claudio O'Riley, heir to a monopoly shrimp, and his voice recounts his rise to power: the incestuous relationship with his sister, the degrading treatment to their partners and so on.

Set against a political backdrop in Africa, the story spanning several years, unfolds around the powerful interaction between two women, their strong sexual allure, and their search to find meaning through it all.
The widow of a murdered yakuza boss serves jail time for attacking the man she believes killed her husband. After her release, as she is shadowed by a hitman, she returns to thoughts of revenge.
Bill, a great football talent, experiences the rise and fall of his career while being introduced to the world of Greek professional football.

Lumberjacking is a second part of saga about young author, Kalle Päätalo. It's a story about growing up and becoming a storyteller in hard times when their father was in the forced labour camp. He was a lunatic.
Three old friends living in distant cities decide to help each other get rid of people who stand in their way to achieve happiness.
Paris, 1910. On Christmas Eve, a young woman knocks on her neighbor's door to borrow some lamp oil. A touching romance is ignited even as the young woman becomes very sick.
The King of Ruritania is kidnapped by his scheming brother: can his British double save him?
A young girl emerges into womanhood and transcends the restricting emotional poverty in which she was forced to live.
Images and reality intermingle in this account of a writer's experiences under a totalitarian regime.
The story of three sisters living in slums.

The story is about CBI officer Pravallika (Sridevi) trying to expose the illegal activities of a notorious criminal Anantananda Swamy (Amrish Puri). Stage artiste Vihari (Akkineni Nagarjuna) helps Pravallika in this mission.
Romance between Imperial Japanese solider, Kobori and Thai woman, Angsumalin during the period of World War II.
A selection of seemingly unconnected scenes featuring Nick Cave, Blixa Bargeld, Nina Hagen and Lene Lovich. Losely based on Voltaire's satire "Candide".
After getting a beating from a yakuza, a record store owner decides that being a yakuza would be his dream job.
Captain Artenyev is in love with a beautiful lady-spy Klara.
The story of Austrian, Johann "Jack" Unterweger, who wrote a book about his criminal past while serving a life term in prison for assault.

Title_x: The Glory and Misery of Human Life
Description_x: Two young lovers, Anna and Martti, are split apart but are reunited many years later when their lives have changed considerably. Anna is a war widow; Martti a writer, is married, and has five children.

Title_x: Priklyucheniya Kventina Dorvarda, strelka korolevskoy gvardii

Description_x: An international group is trying to destabilize Mexico by assassinating the President.
An adolescent leaves his homeland to emigrate to Cuba in 1916. The film covers his life until the 1960s and at the same time reflects on the history of the country that becomes his second homeland.

Title_x: Deux minutes de soleil en plus
Description_x: Vic picks up his wife Cat after leaving the mental hospital. Writer ruined by the game, Vic benefits from a recent hype thanks to a book for which he owes him half of his copyrights.

Renata Fonte, council member in the town of Nardò, is assassinated. The inquiry will bring to the discovery of an involvement of the Mafia in redevelopment projects which Renata Fonte had tried to fight back.
Epic film about life of three generations in central Russia on the Volga river.
At the beginning of the eighties, Sirio, a young worker at the steelworks in Terni with a past in the student struggles, decided to abandon his job as a soldier in an extreme left-wing group.
Victor got a raw deal:his parents were victims of the Vel'D'Hiv roundup,and he had to escape from France.

After spending six years in prison Brigita returns to her hometown. Husband Induls is now married to another and their son is growing up in his new family. Meetings of former spouses go through sad memories.
Gregor Keuschning, press attaché at the Austrian Embassy, leads a normal family life, until the day - or rather, the night - when he dreams of murdering an old woman.

Title_x: Schodami w góre, schodami w dól

Description_x: A film adaptation of Ray Bradbury's book The Martian Chronicles.
Complex tale of love and revenge following the bloody adventures of bandits, communists, and the nationalist army in the 1930s.
Shi Ba is a self-employed profiteer, skilled in deceiving, bragging, speculating and playing. He deceives others, who fool him too

In a vacation spot north of Moscow where technocrats and intellectuals gather, a woman fools around with different men including a computer scientist and a screenwriter, the resulting squabbling and back stabbing end tragically.

Title_x: Tous les nuages sont des horloges

Description_x: A dramatic story of moral degradation of a former plant director, who have taken to spirits.
A terrorist defector comments on the fate of an abducted car salesman.

Based on James Oliver Curwood's adventure novel "The Country Beyond", "In the Wild, Where the Rivers Run" follows Roger McKay, a wrongly accused man hiding in the Canadian wilderness, a mixed-breed dog, Peter, and its lovely owner, Nada.

Title_x: Did You Know? Well You Should!

Description_x: While homesick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.
In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.
A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.
Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.
A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.
An ex-C.I.A. hit man running from his past (Malone) finds just how difficult it is to retire when he runs across a small town controlled by mercenaries and a family that's resisting their control.
A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.
A man and his son vacation to the quiet vampire populated town of Salem's Lot.
A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.
After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.
A New York psychiatrist finds that a brujería-inspired cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.

A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.
A dice roller falls in love with a talented dancer who happens to be the wife to a gangster.

Title_x: Mio in the Land of Faraway
Description_x: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.
American professor Tarl Cabot is transported via a magical ring to planet Gor, where he must help an oppressed country overthrow its evil king and his barbarian henchmen.
An alcoholic drifter spends Halloween in his home town of Albany, New York after returning there for the first time in decades.
An evil force from a 1000 years in the future begins to destroy an idyllic paradise, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.
A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her.
When his wife dies, Lasse takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle, from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life.
A couple of twelve-year-old Norwegian girls struggle with their intense, taboo relationship during the 1930s.
Liberal district attorney decides to seek the death penalty for a man who slaughtered a family at Christmastime, then drank their blood. He escapes, though, and starts killing again.
A fledgling actress is lured to a remote mansion for a screen-test, soon discovering she is actually a prisoner in the middle of a blackmail plot.
Hugo, a vain clothing buyer, meets Myriam on a train and pursues a relationship with her. He is delighted to learn she is a prostitute and has no idea she has more in mind than Hugo bargained for.
Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

During the 1800s, paroled Brazilian bandit Cobra Verde is sent to West Africa with a few troops to man an old Portuguese fort and to convince the local African ruler to resume the slave trade with Brazil.
An American skydiver wakes up in the middle of nowhere in Spain and must recount the last five agonizing days to figure out how she got there.
In 1940s Kenya, a married couple join other affluent British expatriates in a lifestyle of recklessness and excess, but soon find themselves in a troubling situation.

A Sergeant must deal with his desires to save the lives of young soldiers being sent to Viet Nam. Continuously denied the chance to teach the soldiers about his experiences, he settles for trying to help the son of an old Army buddy.

Professor hires a spaceship to get to the source of weird signals from deep space. The trip is cut short however when the ship's computer gets jealous because the captain is in love with one of the female passengers and it gets homicidal.
Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.
A park ranger is tasked with dealing with a killer crocodile that appears to have a spiritual connection with the local Aboriginals.
Two soldiers (Colin Firth, Kenneth Branagh) recover from World War I while spending a summer in a Yorkshire village.
A 13-year-old girl changes a pleasant life in the countryside for a troubled life in the city.
After their mother commits suicide, two sisters end up living with their kind but peculiar aunt in their grandmother's old house in a small 1950s town.

A retired cop blackmails ex burglar Bernice into paying him $20,000 - thus burgling. Paid to get a dentist's jewelry back from her ex's apartment, someone murders the ex and Bernice is a suspect. She investigates.

War story of the 27th Panzers, Hitler's heavy-duty combat regiment composed of prisoners. In 1943, this motley tank crew is sent on a suicide mission behind enemy lines to destroy a Soviet train that's carrying fuel for the Red Army.

Title_x: Pinocchio and the Emperor of the Night
Description_x: Pinocchio and his friends, a glow worm and a marionette, search for a magic music box. However, so is the evil Scalawag and the Emperor of the Night.

Arthur returns to London after working abroad for many years with his now deceased father. Almost at once he becomes involved in the problems of his mother's seamstress Amy and of her father residing in the Marshalsea debtors' prison.
A young man falls for his girlfriend's mother.

A psychological thriller based on the novel by Agatha Christie. Ten strangers are forced to come face to face with their dark pasts after receiving invitation to an isolated island off the coast of England.
A priest stuck in a rural congregation and burdened with his overwrought spirituality, finds purpose in a troubled woman accused of murder.
A priest is put in a dilemma when the serial killer who has been murdering priests and nuns confesses to him.

Title_x: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
Description_x: A middle-aged spinster falls in love with a fellow resident of her boardinghouse, who mistakenly believes she has the money to help him start a new business.
Feeling lonely and neglected by her overworked husband, Roxy, a Depression-era farm wife, is drawn into an ill-advised affair with Jack, their hired hand.

While on vacation in a fictitious African country, the young son of a US senator, his guardian and their guide must stop the corrupt local police chief and the shady owner of a local circus from capturing their new friend - a talking ape.

Title_x: Diary of a Mad Old Man

Description_x: A sociology student films sexual encounters in a motel for his thesis, and falls in love with a French girl in the process.
The lonely proprietor of a small hotel in a provincial Turkish town develops a passion for a departed guest and the reality of routine everyday-life starts crumbling into pieces.
Fane wants nothing but a quiet countryside life with the woman and the sweet, brain damaged brother he loves. Envious neighbours however have plans of their own.
To save her father, a girl who always puts others before herself promises to live her life in a lavish castle with a strange beast.
A Jewish family and a homosexual doctor suffer persecution in Fascist Italy. Based on a novel by Giorgio Bassani.

Title_x: Police des moeurs: Les filles de Saint Tropez
Description_x: A police captain's niece is trapped by white slavers.
The story of a family: Problems, marriage, taxes, revenge, friendship, army and much more.
Love, humiliation and politics play out in a distant village of China during the cultural revolution.
In the fantastic world of the "bosque animado" meet some people who have been transported to this place by a magic force. Now their histories cross one another.

After separation from his wife Robert moves to Vichy where he observes beautiful Juliette. Her fiance Patrick becomes jealous and attacks Robert. When Patrick disappears Robert is suspected to have killed him.

Title_x: Flower and Snake: Ultimate Rope Discipline

Description_x: In a small town on Quebec's Gaspé peninsula in 1936, a young man returns home after a five-year absence. A hit with the local ladies but not with the object of his heart's desire, the town is thrown into turmoil as rape and murder ensues.
On an 18th century Caribbean island run by debauched colonial plantation owners, an enslaved Scotsman joins a slave revolt.
A rich Frisian farmer is murdered in Amsterdam. Police duo Grijpstra and De Gier are assigned to the case.

At the start of the 20th century, a man lives in solitude on an island. One day on the mainland, he saves a young woman from some nasty folk and takes her with him to his island. Her former captors soon find the island as well.
Nikita, haunted by the civil war, meets Luba, who is as deeply moral and lonely as he is.

Title_x: More About the Children of Noisy Village
Description_x: There are only a handful of children living in Bullerbyn. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.
A stagecoach driver goes to work for a dying, one-armed aristocrat in 1860s Australia.
Based on the novel by Isaac Asimov.The End of Eternity is a science fiction film with mystery and thriller elements on the subjects of time travel and social engineering.
WWWA Trouble Consultants Kei and Yuri team up with a petty thief to stop a mad scientist and his legions of mutated creatures.
Abdee, the formerly enslaved Scottish nobleman living on the lush 18th century colonial Caribbean island of St. Joseph's, is framed for murder and forced to lead a new rebellion.
In 1956, with the independence of Morocco, the Fedala conference in Tangier is set in a city of turmoil.
A satire of Cold War politics, where Red bureaucrats meet U.S. corporate greed, and a witch and a dragon.
A remarkable anti-war film about a 9 year old Jewish boy who is picked up by the police and sent to a concentration camp while his parents do their best under difficult circumstances to find him.

A story about true love, set in the Berlin of the 1920s. In a shabby lodging-house inhabited by a number of faintly ludicrous characters, the young Russian exile Ganin is unexpectedly confronted with his past.
A group of Boy scouts who name themselves Black Feet learn lessons about honor and brotherhood in a camp.
1880s, Korczyn on the Nemunas. The nobility and peasants are trying to adapt to the new post-uprising reality. Justyna Orzelska meets Jan Bohatyrowicz, who shows her how valuable work is.
Meandering drama of Brothers Burke and Sacks, who rob a bank, kill a cop and kidnap Thornton, a witness to their crime.

Nicole is a rape victim. Her son, the result of this tragic event, is cut off, harassed, unloved, ostracized. He develops a neurotic personality, despite attempts to engage his hostile mother in a dialogue of affection and recognition.
A father encourages his daughter to marry a dying man in order to inherit his wealth.

In Portugal, in the 60s, the corpse of a man appears on Dog's Beach. The corpse is identified as the major Dantas, a man wanted by authorities after his escape from a military prison where he was awaiting trial for insurrection.
Deceit and treachery in the currency smugglers underworld.
It is Depression era New Zealand and school-kid Kate is missing her father badly. The temptation to seek him out leads her into diverse and intense encounters with fate.

A bombing raid makes travelling companions of a blind man, Fernand, and Antoine, a criminal. Fernand is a virgin and is depending on his new friend to find him a woman. But to Antoine, on the run, his fellow victim is more a burden than a boon.
Ellie and her father leave the city for their holiday house at the quiet seaside town of Kilkee.

Title_x: Si le soleil ne revenait pas

Description_x: A woman arrives as an acquaintance of a sister in law for a day under the bar master Tamura who had guided Yakuza's escaping.
It is a remake of an English movie, Trading Places(1983) directed by John Landis with the lead roles of Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd and Ralph Bellamy.
Asko Mertanen is a waiter who is very interested in shooting. He gets fed up how the things are run in Finland, so he thinks that the best way to change them is to shoot the Finnish president.
Set four years after the Portuguese revolution and the simultaneous loss of the Portuguese empire in Africa, the story concerns a director who sells guns to finance his play.
When Iris moves to the country to start a veterinary practice, she finds a lot of skeptical villagers as well as disapproval from her city bound boyfriend.
Despite the hostility of the mayor, the villagers of Anatolia regard as a saint the man who defends them against a creditor of the city.

In a school ruled by its violent students who regularly fight each other, attack teachers, and damage school property, the staff struggles to keep a principal before they quit, get scared off, or killed.
A young mother and upcoming academic has her life further complicated by an unexpected heritage. A sailing boat that proves to be a real challenge.
The border between collaboration and resistance may be thin ,and that's Charles's dilemma.
During the Second World War, Ahmet Kaptan was one of the prisoners living in the 72nd Ward.

Title_x: The Romance of Book and Sword

Description_x: Based on Guy Des Cars novel La Brute. A Deaf and blind young boy is accused of commiting a brutal murder.
In the 1930s in Konya, Turkey, the famous belly dancer Cemile dreams of going to the big city. Murat falls in love with her.

João is the spiritual heir (the term he prefers to bastard) of Manuel Brandão, his dying godfather, and at the same time the political leader of a small party of a disintegrating governmental coalition.

Title_x: Le testament d'un poète juif assassiné
Description_x: Paltiel Kossover leaves his home country Russia because of the Jewish persecutions. From Berlin to Paris, he will discover politics, poetry, love before coming back to his native land.

Title_x: Captured Mother and Daughter: She Beast

Description_x: Jacob and Rachel was killed on their flight to Sweden in 1942, and a year later their bodies are discovered, but after the war the case is again is opened, and the guilty is hunted.
A young man travels to various regions of South Korea to scatter the ashes of his dead wife.
Adada tells the story of a deaf-mute woman who lives in a small town in South Korea during the 1920s.
An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.
The village Lernasar is doomed to destruction. Its inhabitants, headed by the teacher Kamsaryan, come to defend their history.

Title_x: Laura, del cielo llega la noche
Never Travel on a One Way Ticket
Description_x: Among human remains, barely alive, operates the investigator. A bitter man, a mole that digs his way among the facts and fictions of life. Beaten, broke, hungry and liable to be evicted.
A director travels to the villages of mt. Helidona in Greece to interview six siblings living there, whose lives where defined by the events of the Greek Civil War.
The story takes place in the Czech-German border region in 1938. The hero Tomás Jakl marries but the marriage is not very lucky and falls apart. His German friend forced him to enter the Nazi party.

Literary adaptation: an artist returns to the stifling atmosphere of the small Dutch village where he grew up, a place marked by morbidity, suppression of emotion, Calvinist hypocrisy and a suffocating patriarchy.
A pair of lovers survive in the catacombs during the WWII and try to live on.

A middle-aged woman is abandoned by her wealthy husband and moves into a cheap, dilapidated hotel where she develops relationships with the eternally optimistic owner and her deaf and terminally ill child.
A Spanish government adviser falls in love with a young woman with militant leftist extremists accused of being a member of the KGB. He must conduct negotiations with the terrorist movement ETA.

Title_x: Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro march
Description_x: A sly prep school thug uses his girlfriend to lure Hiroshi and Toru to a fight, but the scheme escalates to an all-out war between everyone involved.

Title_x: Ossegg oder Die Wahrheit über Hänsel und Gretel

Description_x: Scientist creates a machine that is able to clone human beings. Soon the Government wants to take hold of it for military purposes.
The story of a woman living a bourgeois life and a left-wing man.
The title of the film is taken from the popular Bulgarian song. This is a film about the life of a common Bulgarian worker. The action focuses on his family, his relatives, and his friends.

In the nineteenth century, in St. Petersburg. Poprichtchine, a small official living almost in misery, decides not to go to the office. Coming from a noble family, he can not stand his condition anymore.
A famous television showman is suffering a mental and spiritual crisis. But fortunately three friends who once have all been lovers of his try to help him...

ONCE IN A RARE WHILE - YOU GER TO SEE TH KIND YOU REALLY WANT TO SEE!!. THE LOVE TRIANGLE IN THIS MELODRAMA INVOLVES A LONG-SUFFERING WIFE, A POOR CHILDHOOD SWEETHEART, AND A MENTALLY DERANGED HUSBAND.

The orderly universe of the Borejko family crackles completely when the mother of four daughters ends up in a hospital. The oldest of the four children, Gaba does her best to take over after her mother.
Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.
A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.
An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.
Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.
A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.
A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.
After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting a robotic microchip into her brain.
An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

A war veteran tries to investigate the murder of his son who was working as a Russian translator for the British intelligence service during the Cold War. He meets a web of deception and paranoia that seems to be impenetrable.
Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.
A secret fling between a man and his mistress leads to blackmail and murder.

Title_x: The Clan of the Cave Bear
Description_x: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.

Title_x: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
Description_x: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.
A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.
A former police detective, still recovering from his alcohol addiction, is seemingly drawn into L.A's criminal underworld after stumbling upon a local drug ring.
A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.
A high school majorettes are being methodically killed by a mysterious masked figure. Meanwhile, a local gang are involved in suspicious activities around the school.
In London in 1958, a young photographer seeks media stardom to keep the love of a beautiful, aspiring fashion designer.

A brilliant researcher in London who works as a high-class hooker in her spare time, becomes a pawn in a dangerous political game, when her latest client, a nobleman who is negotiating an Arab-Israeli peace treaty, falls for her.

A drifter returns to his Florida hometown only to discover that his father, the local mayor, was mysteriously murdered during his absence. Vowing to find the killer and avenge his father's death, he starts his own investigation.
Historical fiction set against the backdrop of Hong Kong in its early years of British rule.
A raped policewoman forms a vigilante group of various rape victims. They abduct and castrate men whom have committed repeated violations of women, and got away with it through legal technicalities.
Las Vegas is the backdrop for all the torrid action of heat, as Burt Reynolds plays the soft-hearted bodyguard who's out to protect his friends.
Shanghai, 1938: A missionary woman hires a fortune hunter to help her find 1100 lbs. opium lost, as wounded need the morphine. Adventure and romance follows.
A group of campers revolt against their strict camp director and take over the camp for themselves.

A salesman and his son sexually abuse the generations of women of a poor family as payment for debt. Janni must see his mother, sister, niece and wife all being exploited, and the family grow bigger with the abuser's kids.
Rise and fall of an Italian crime empire.
A Dutch doctor, haunted by grueling childhood memories of World War II, struggles to find peace as he spends his life looking for answers about the tragic night that shaped him.
Jeanne Kern is a history teacher in a private mixed class. Passionately provocative, she does not ignore the effect she has on men.

In 1940s Chicago, a young black man takes a job as a chauffeur to a white family, which takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally kills the teenage daughter of the couple and then tries to cover it up.
The story of the children who live in Bullerbyn, Sweden, through the spring and summer months.
Two children are kidnapped and held for ransom by a madman. Soon, however, the children's father begins to suspect that their mother may possibly have had something to do with the crime.

Title_x: The Princess and the Call Girl
Description_x: Two beautiful look-alike women, one a rich socialite, the other a high-end call girl, switch places to gain new experiences.

Title_x: Flower and Snake: White Uniform Rope Slave

Description_x: After a failed romance, a temperamental young biker meets a carefree rural girl while riding through her island hometown and gets her obsessed about riding a motorcycle.
A young man falls in love with extra-liberated Giulia. Their relationship becomes very passionate, but Giulia has no limits in her sexual fantasies and games.
A young pope who feels he has lost touch with the people accidentally locks himself out of the Vatican and believes it is part of God's plan for him.
A discontented Sydney teenager travels back in time to 1873, whilst watching an old fashioned children's game.
The insane Doctor Enger is obsessed with his plan to build a hospital to cure blind children, and goes on a killing and kidnapping spree with the police in pursuit.
An unemployed Indian engineer emigrates to England to find work and through a series of circumstances, ends up impersonating a doctor to win the attention of an attractive young woman.
The story of a teenager boy in times of the comunism fall in the Soviet Union.

A young architect finds himself in a situation that he never had to deal with before--now that he is successful (and married), sexy young women are throwing themselves at him. He and his wife take separate vacations to follow their urges.
A man falls in love with his new neighbor but then finds that her family life is difficult.
Raúl Ruiz's fabulist modern-day riff on Robert Louis Stevenson's classic novel.
Story of an aboriginal family who tries to move out of the fringe into the main white community.

French rocker Johnny Hallyday stars as a professional thief just released from jail. He returns to stealing to support his family. After several successful thefts, he decides to include his under-aged kid into the "family business".

A mild-mannered English conscientious objector moves to what he feels will be the relative calm of Australia after World War I, but gets caught in the middle of violent battles between the rising trade unions and fascist groups.
Downed American fliers in WWII are vivisected by Japanese surgeons in cruel medical experiments.
Trials and tribulations of a Croatian Communist intellectual in the turbulent years before, during and after WW2.
Rani, a loving wife, lives a peaceful life with her husband Trilok, a horse carriage driver. However, Rani's life takes a new turn when Trilok is killed.
The present unfolds along with scenes from the past in this intense psychological drama about Edna, a woman in the hospital who each day writes down her memories.
A Hong Kong man vacations to Nepal where a local tribe imbues him with magical powers which he must use to fight a growing evil.
Time Stranger is the story of a bunch of teenagers getting transported back in time through Japan's history, and getting mixed up with samurai shenanigans.
In the 1840s, two boys get mixed up with an Indian accused of stealing money and rescue a pretty girl who is trapped in a cave.
A mixed-up, teenage runaway becomes involved with a tough teenage street gang and its lawless activities while trying to find a way to redeem himself.
"Semper Vivax" is not just another retirement home. The guests there get their best real-life memories played out for them.
A movie based of a book, follows a young girl named Ester, and her family and friends as poor danish citizens, in a rough area of Copenhagen in the 1930's.
In 1918, a group of soldiers of various nationalities conspires to desert the imperial Austro-Hungarian army.
Miss Lotte has her residence in a big hangar near a port.She seems to be having nice time with five clients but the arrival of a policeman disturbs their lives.
It depicts the sadness of a man who tries to transform himself into a good woman and is flirted with her who has gone beyond her hopes. Generally, men are women.
Francis Massey works as a clerk in deputy commissioner's office in the colonial administration of British India. He aspires to become one of the rulers and does everything he can to impress his boss.
The life adventure and suicide of a female hero named Melek, who was forced to marry a man with a sick soul and sexual perversions.
An unusual family story about two father and son generations, beginning on a German country side and ending in the students' revolt in Berlin.

Claire Rousset visits her ex-husband Pierre who lives in the Lyon region. For some time now, Pierre's health and that of the other inhabitants of the village has deteriorated to the point of becoming worrying.
Adaptation of the novel by Martin Santos, which describes the society of the late 1940s, where humans lived like rats.

The drama of the Indians of tropical Mexico in the early twentieth century. The Rebellion of the Hanged is the intense story of the rise of the oppressed pawns and their struggle to achieve freedom and independence.
Hollywood in the 1940s. A tyrannical producer, a paranoid director, a starlet engaged twenty-four times, an actor who refuses to age - all against a backdrop of a series of murders.
University student sax player gets a lesson in the hard-boiled noir life.
The story of two brothers who are faced with great upheavals when they set up in business after years of communal farming.

Title_x: Amor a la vuelta de la esquina

Description_x: A young model runs away from the set of a commercial spot she's filming and enters the mansion of Araucaima, where its dwellers indulge in strange rites.

Jubiabá is a French-Brazilian film based on the homonym novel by Jorge Amado. The film tells the story of the interracial love between the daughter of a rich Commander and Antonio Balduíno, a rascal, fighter and famous lover from Salvador.
Murali Krishna marriages rad ha and acts as double in order to take revenge against His father in law for killing his father in his childhood which includes in hilarious conversations.

In 1938, Austria is about to become a part of the Third Reich. A theater actress and a Jewish journalist fall in love and spend time together completely ignoring the political turmoil of the time despite friendly warnings.
A curious and stubborn boy Kalle has to grow up fast in northern Finland in the 1920s. When his lumberjack father gets ill, Kalle has to take his place as a provider for the family.
A woman gets off a train by mistake and finds herself stranded alone with a peculiar man who doesn't even speak her language.
A film director, his fiancée, a scriptwriter and a student interact and discuss their emotions, at length.
A young girl from the city is sent out to work in a village of Dai people in China's cultural revolution. Here she learns to enjoy being young and gains a new outlook on life.
An alcoholic partier becomes a paranoid maniac when a manuscript that predicts real-life horrors takes possession of his mind.
A recently resurrected corpse recounts his life story, focusing on his strange relationship with a murderous alter-ego.
An old woman has died and her widower with dementia confesses to killing her. After this, the story goes back in time to show the events leading up to her death.
Adaptation of a literary work on the slow deterioration of an orthodox family, where the women are unable to achieve emancipation and the men succumb to insanity.
Zita, a young fashion designer shifts to Berlin. Casually she gets witness of a murder case and gangsters are chasing her brutally.
A married woman with problems secretly starts working as a prostitute and lives a double life.
Based on a novel by David Grossman.
A comedy about the famous (Self-proclaimed) detective - James Pond - as he tries to find the lost son of a famous industrialist
During the 1930s Great Depression, a widow begins a romance with an uneducated janitor but he is accused of murder as their story is moving forward.

A parable of man's exploitation of his fellow man. A weaver and a farmer live peacefully on the edge of a desert until, one day, a woman wanders into their world, and her presence slowly disrupts their routine existence.

A womanizing reporter investigates death of his friend in Copenhagen's sporting district and the detective finds himself caught between clunky ordeals of police and gangsters involved in drug trafficking.
A reporter becomes involved with a band of terrorists hiding in the mountains between Peru and Bolivia.
Four kids witness an arsonist start a fire, but no one believes them.
The romantic and cruel escapades of a gigolo and a mysterious woman.
In Scotland in 1751, young David Balfour is shanghaied aboard a ship where he meets Jacobite rebel Alan Breck Stewart with whom he escapes to the Scottish Highlands, dodging the redcoats.

Title_x: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
Description_x: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

Four versions of the same story, first in the perspective of a theatre play, second in the perspective of a silent film, third in the perspective of a film of the 50s and finally in a biblical philosophical perspective.
This is a film about the general collision between the generations. The film tells us the story of a 14 year old boy and his father, and the way they fight over all the problems.

Action of a picture happens in Ancient Russia (Rus) - in those days when the Slavs who have united in army under leadership of Ratibor, the son Vseslav managed to win the first victories over tribes of nomads.
SHOULD A GIRL SUFFER FOR THE THE SINS OF HER FATHER? - A YOUNG MAN AVENGES HIS MOTHER'S FATE IN THE HANDS OF HER PHILANDERING HUSBAND BY SEDUCING THE LATTER'S DAUGHTER FROM AN EARLIER MARRIAGE.
A jester's adventures in the court of Franz Joseph I.
The film tells about the organization and activities of the partisan brigade "Chavdar".
Egy vidra ilete is egy vadasz szerelme.
Moa is seven years. She lives with her confused mother and her golden hamster. They have just moved into a new house, which is barely half done. New is also the man's her mother one day drags home.
A lawyer who survives a plane crash takes the opportunity to take a new identity and begin a new life.

Title_x: The New Morning of Billy the Kid

Description_x: Coming of age story of four girls living in the same poor district of Warsaw just before the outbreak of World War One.
A life story of an unhappy woman violinist, who makes life hell for herself and those around her.
March, 1953. The Greek Civil War has ended but its marks are still there. Five soldiers will tell their stories, each one from his side, from the life in a military camp, a miniature of society.
Mike de Leon screen adaptation of John Fowles' creepy film The Collector.
The story of one man's struggle after he gets caught in a nuclear fallout and gets sick with leukemia.
A factory worker in the south of Italy, frustrated by work and marriage, withdraws into nature, but in the search for love and human warmth he ends up "on the dog" in the sense of the word.
Majid is poor and the relationship between him and his parent is not that good and they don't understand each other until Javad meet him and relationship between grows stronger as time goes on.
It's been 25 years. Unexpectedly two already grown twin brothers meet. They are united by the mystery of their mother but the desire to know the past brings them even closer together.
A woman leaves her husband after the death of their son. She becomes a well-known but unhappy courtesan.
In an outback mountain village in Bulgaria, the main character Monasi is looking for a wife. The movie evolves when he finally finds the wife of his dreams and gets married.

Jan Bard is a Polish intellectual and writer, leaves for West Berlin. He is working on another novel. In Germany, he meets his old love Iza. She is the ex-wife of the publisher of the Bard's latest novel.
The taste of adventure, the dynamic narrative, the costumes - all these make the film a real story about love and revenge, honor and justice, wealth and pure love.
Two city guys meet a strange man. He is a wizard, and he is surrounded by a talking dog and a parrot. Two boys experience unusual adventures-they turn into Indians, princes, magicians.
This is the story of a struggling women whose husband is an addict, daughter becomes widow after a few days, and with a widowed sister-in-law.
High school student Marek dreams of getting into the Legia professional football team, in spite of numerous obstacles and personal problems.

Title_x: The Lonely Passion of Brian Moore

Description_x: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.
Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.
A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.
In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

Title_x: To Live and Die in L.A.
Description_x: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.
Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.

The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.
A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

A minor league baseball player has to spend $30 million in thirty days, in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity or tell anyone about the deal.
A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

Title_x: Howling II: ... Your Sister Is a Werewolf
Description_x: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.
Two professional assassins fall in love.
A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.
A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.
An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinary unique assassin in service of the US President.
A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

Title_x: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters

Description_x: When Doris Lang is chosen as the next bride for the vampire Count Magnus Lee, she will hire a mysterious vampire hunter known only as D in an attempt to escape her ill-gotten fate.

Fortune hunter Allan Quatermain teams up with a resourceful woman to help her find her missing father lost in the wilds of 1900s Africa while being pursued by hostile tribes and a rival German explorer.
While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.
An Australian school teacher and her students are kidnapped. She and the children fight for their lives and try to escape from their captors.

Title_x: That Was Then... This Is Now
Description_x: Two juvenile delinquents find themselves growing apart, for one is growing up, and the other is staying young and reckless.
An American gymnast travels to a foreign country to compete in a deadly game not won by anyone other than a native in more than 900 years.
The film is about the teenager Hermann (Hølmebakk) who develops a relationship with the middle-aged Rosa (Fjeldstad).
When a teenager is shot at the beach, a journalist from The Miami Journal is sent to cover the story. He's called by the murderer and told there'll be four more.
The son of a German General becomes part of a mysterious conspiracy to gain hidden Nazi funds.
A bank in Montréal is held up by Grimm (dressed as clown) and Co. Escaping a bank surrounded by cops is the easy part.
An eccentric scientist teaches a student in his own manner while he looks for a way to clone his deceased wife.
The Biblical story of Israel's greatest King.

In Victorian England, two grave robbers supply a wealthy doctor with bodies to research anatomy on, but greed causes them to look for a more simple way to get the job done. Based on the horrifying Burke and Hare case.
A 1920s mail pilot and a rich man's daughter crash-land on a mountain full of hungry wolves.

An ex-newspaper woman who is now a suburban housewife can't resist getting involved in an investigation of the murder of a philandering dentist who had been having affairs with several of her neighbors.

An Irish reform school priest questions his calling as a young, epileptic runaway arrives. Each recognizes the other as kindred spirits and escape together. As police close in and money dwindles, the desperate priest makes bad decisions.

Released from prison, Stick meets up with a friend and joins him on a job delivering a bag. His friend gets killed in the setup. Stick gets away and is ready to forget all and see his daughter, but they won't forget.
A group of mercenaries is hired to spring Rudolf Hess from Spandau Prison in Berlin.

Title_x: He Died with His Eyes Open

Description_x: A tale centered on the Battle of the Golden Spurs in 1302 where the Flemish rank and file won a major victory over the glorious French knights.
Unable to gain acceptance into an American medical school, aspiring physician Jeff Marx studies abroad in a small Latin American medical program run by the country's dictator.
A 1920s flapper who haunts her old house possesses a reserved housewife who just moved in. However, she cannot leave before she receives her massive audition for a Hollywood studio.

Title_x: Kenji Miyazawa's Night on the Galactic Railroad
Description_x: Two kittens go on a metaphysical journey on a magical railroad train.

Filled with guilt over his forbidden desires, young man leaves home and his studies. He finds a new smaller place to stay, a low-paying but satisfying job and a girlfriend. Then his mother, unable to fight her forbidden desires, shows up.

Emerald is an agent the Germans "have" inside allied intelligence 1944/WWII. With "help" from Emerald, the Germans catch Wheeler, believed to know the when and where of D-Day. Emerald is sent to be Wheeler's cell mate. Let the game begin.
Earth has been ravaged by a nuclear war, and a feminist warrior is forced to join up with a soldier of fortune in her journey to find a rumored "paradise" as they battle gangs of rampaging bandits.
After a near-death experience, a man wonders if he actually did die and is now in Hell.
A simple friar and a local bishop set up a pipeline for hundreds of Jews to hide and escape the Nazis in World War II Assisi.
Ramu, a poor boy, has higher ambitions in life. He works hard and saves money to buy a book. But, situations drive him to take a hard decision when his family members suffer in cold weather.
A group of seamen from Norway find a Soviet listening station and they become targets for both America and Russia. Another cold war takes place.

In a small provincial French town, Dr Morasseau, Mr Lavoisier and butcher Filiol decide to create a significant estate business but Mrs Cuno and her son Louis do not want to sell their house. Louis presumably provokes the death of Filiol.
Russian provincial town in the middle of the 1930s Stalin's Great Purge. Ivan Lapshin, the head of the local police, does what he has to do. And he does it well.

A sexually conflicted young man is hired to take care of two orphaned siblings in a remote seaside mansion, and soon realizes that the ghosts of two former servants are trying to possess the children.
The story of a widow (in West Virginia) who takes in a drifter who she believes killed her husband. She begins to fall for him but cannot be sure if she should trust him.
The story of a Jewish writer, from his life as a young boy in Montreal to his more complicated grown-up life.
Eight women attend one of Britain's toughest survival schools to challenge themselves and conquer their fears. They learn that there is more to survival than passing the course.

Zuma is a movie remake of one of the oldest and most popular comic books in the Philippines. It stars Zuma, a creature donning a snake over his shoulder which perfectly accentuates his monster-like features.

Title_x: Flower and Snake: Sketch of Hell
Description_x: Kaori Aso lives in the wealthy family. She cheated her stepmother that she has been kidnapped by somebody. Unfortunately, Aso's accomplice really does kidnap her and her stepmother.
Sick with the system he works in, the engineer stops the train in the middle of nowhere. The passengers decide to spend time in a local café and their arguments lead to violence.
A South African spinster (Jane Birkin) murders her father (Trevor Howard) after he rapes the wife of the black foreman for his plantation.

Hugo is a writer whose one great book was based on an affair he had with Lea, a sculptor. Bereft of inspiration for a follow-up, Hugo returns years later to rekindle the flame of romance and creativity.
A writer who believes that he was reincarnated believes that his present fiancée possesses the soul of his fiancée in his previous life, a ballerina.

A rancher comes in conflict with a gang of renegade Aborigines on the run from their tribe's posse. They try to kill him, but he gets away and hides in the woods. His posh wife and her lover, a local alcoholic cop, go to rescue him.

In the turmoilous 18th century, young poor Hungarian aristocrat Jonas helps Szaffi, a young pretty gypsy Romani girl and the illegitimate daughter of a Turkish pasha, get the treasure that's owed to her by the right of inheritance.
A young geologist lands on a Greek island. He falls under the spell of a mysterious young woman.
A sensitive girl struggles with first love and bullying in a 1980's Soviet orphanage.

Gabriel makes arrangement with garage-owner Adam to pay for repairs to his grandmother's car by giving his depressed wife French lessons. But the relationship goes beyond that of teacher and pupil as a passionate love affair develops.
Mistreated foundling Heathcliff and his stepsister Catherine fall in love, but when she marries a wealthy man, he becomes obsessed with getting revenge, even well into the next generation.

Title_x: Le due vite di Mattia Pascal
Description_x: Unlike in the previous 3 adaptations of the book,here Mattia narrates in flashback,back at his library job in his village,how he changed his name when mistakenly thought dead and tried to start a new life in Rome.
A man who is jailed for murdering his family after he confessed, escapes. His only chance at freedom is his new love interest that tries to shield him from the authorities.
A down-on-his-luck P.I. is hired by a beautiful woman to find her missing husband who disappeared after receiving some tapes.

In 1866, a sea monster is hunting the depths of the oceans and rising only to attack and destroy military ships. Experts around the world are trying to discover the identity of the monster and destroy it before even more lives are lost.
After becoming separated from his platoon, a Japanese soldier dons a Buddhist monk's robe and tends to the bodies of the many war casualties strewn across the countryside.
After he kills his beloved wife, Puiu Faranga is helped by his father to fake insanity.
The story of Iwago, a troubled Japanese man who has grave personal problems and strained relationships with his wife and step children.
Paco is a young peasant who joins the Republican Party just before the start of the Spanish Civil War, only to become involved in that awful conflict.
After serving his sentence, a robber returns to his small, quiet hometown to retrieve the loot. But a ruthless Police inspector and his equally nasty young subordinate are after the criminal.
Umiemon is a naniwa-bushi singer who travels with his wife to the United States in hopes of achieving fame and fortune.
This eccentric rural New Zealand tale follows two con men as they attempt to trick a small town into their illegal gambling scheme.
Adventure film about the boy Hodja who gets a magic carpet of a wise old carpet man. A wicked and desirous of power sultan will get their hands on the carpet.
A minister, his wife and their large family are moved from Dallas to a needy rural church in 1950s Texas.

The medical sub-lieutenant Marcello Lupi, endowed with a great humanity and common sense, at the end of 1940 was assigned to a health section installed near the oasis of Sorman, Libya and commanded by Major Bellucci.
A reporter discovers a neo-fascist conspiracy.
This film tells of a woman's never-ending struggle to keep herself and her family fed and clothed.
A film about the substantial population of Koreans living in Japan, and the love affair between Kayako, a Japanese girl, and Im, a Korean.
Foster, a cynical art critic, becomes more human thanks to his relationship with the young homosexual Claude.
Set in 1904, this is an uneven tale of war and intrigue between native South Africans, German colonialists, and British colonialists, a war no one really wins.
In 1905, young composer Nikusha, travels to the villages of a post-revolutionary Georgia to collect folk songs.
Returning to Argentina, an engineer trained in Europe visiting a friend of his father and meets the teenage daughter, who begins a relationship of love and passion.
The film is set in 1947 Beskydy. It follows a 10 year old boy who regularly shepherds cows next to a destroyed German tank.

A beautiful, nameless woman is hired to spend several days and nights with a man in his apartment. Not only does he want to sleep with her, but he is obsessed with the desire to look at her naked body.
Siegfried Blum is a small scale criminal, who happens to gain possession of 2 kg Cocaine. When he tries to turn it into cash, he learns that this kind of business is much too big for him.

The fate of people in cruel conditions. A dramatic story of two poor bachelors in a Slovak village during the fight against fascism. The struggle for survival becomes the most difficult test of character and human heroism.
An insight into multi-layered relations between natives and newcomers in the town of Pula following WWII and departure of Angloamerican forces.
An alien from a long-dead planet comes to Earth to spread the message of the Seven Elements: Earth, Water, Air, Fire, Life, Intellect, and Love.

On the turn of the 20th century, in Netherlands, three socialist activists and brothers are imprisoned for a crime they didn't commit. The prosecutor tries to get to the truth, but their comrades and others betray them.
30 years after the end of World War II, a Soviet and an American journalist meet again for realizing post-war paths of their countries.
Russian spy boss in Geneva spends a night interrogating two spies to see who is a traitor.
A Soviet take of Felix Saltens classic story of Bambi.

Two orphans, a 18-year-old prostitute and her long-lost brother, go to the capital to start a new life. They fall into the hands of morality police inspector Meranzov - a cynic who knows all about the insignificance of human nature.

Famine and poverty is their every day life in the 1860s on the farm. One day their uncle from the north and tells wonderful things about their lives up there, making young Heiki go to see the Northern lights.

Title_x: Ni avec toi ni sans toi
Description_x: Pierre and Mathilde meet again after having been separated for ten years. They realize that they can not live without each other, but not under the same roof.
Sixteen-year-old An-ran gets into repeated trouble because she refuses blind obedience to authority, openly challenging and correcting a teacher who makes a mistake in class. She is different.
French poet Blaise Cendrars arrives by sea on the city of Rio de Janeiro and lives s life of bohemian parties during the celebration of carnaval.
A look back at the life of an ordinary 60-year-old woman named Andzia. Although she has faced numerous difficulties, she has always tried to do her best for the sake of her two children.

Title_x: Flores robadas en los jardines de Quilmes
Description_x: After a chance meeting, two former lovers look back on their relationship.
Soon after the end of the war, a former officer moves to a small seaside town in the Recovered Lands. The situation in this post-German territory is still unsettled.
A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

Title_x: Once Upon a Time in America
Description_x: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.
A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.
A joint USA-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H.A.L. 9000 computer.
A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.
A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.
A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.
Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner and guests (e.g. gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-30s Harlem.
After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.
The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.
Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.
As a vicious wild boar terrorizes the Australian outback, the husband of one of the victims is joined by a hunter and a farmer in a search for the beast.
A professional killer comes out of retirement to investigate and avenge the brutal murder of an old friend.
A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.
Two cousins unknowingly rob the mob and face the dangerous consequences.
A day in the life of a self-destructive British consul in Mexico on the eve of World War II.

Dr Calgary returns home from an expedition and goes looking for a hitchhiker whom he gave a lift to two years previously in order to return the man's address book. He discovers the man has been executed for his mother's murder.
In a post-apocalyptic world, She aids two brothers' quest to rescue their kidnapped sister. Along the way, they battle weird creatures before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.
Two U.S. border patrolmen find a buried 20+ year old jeep in the desert with a skeleton, riffle and $800,000. They keep the money. Suddenly, the FBI shows a lot of interest in the car.
A military weapons engineer struggles to do his job responsibly, while a hapless tank commander has to live with the consequences in combat years later.
Four college coeds, travel to Fort Lauderdale for their Easter week of Spring Break, and become involved in a series of adventures and misadventures.
An American actress with a penchant for lying is forcibly recruited by Mossad, the Israeli intelligence agency, to trap a Palestinian bomber, by pretending to be the girlfriend of his dead brother.

Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs.
A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future.
A Chicago psychoanalyst's patient and secretary are murdered and he becomes the police's prime suspect despite his claims that someone is trying to frame him.
A New York City drug dealer decides to get out of the business, but has to flee from mobsters.
While Europe stands on the brink of World War I in Autumn 1913, Sir Randolph Nettleby hosts a weekend of shooting on his estate for European aristocrats.
An American ambassador to Israel tries to bring peace to the Middle East conflict through unconventional methods, but his efforts are hampered at every turn and his personal life threatened.
A poor 11-year-old schoolboy with a heart of gold grows up in 1930s Amsterdam.
Superfecund twins Louis and Lucien, who can feel pain from each other's injuries, revolt against a tyrannical regent who holds France under his iron fist.
Five stories by Luigi Pirandello set in turn-of-the-century Italy.
An elderly painter whose son visits with his family on the weekends, is also surprised by a visit from his still-single daughter.

In 1820s Spain the soldier Don José falls in love with the fiery and charismatic factory worker Carmen. Conflicts and grievances multiply, however, as it becomes apparent their views on love and commitment are fundamentally incompatible.
George Burns returns as God, and as Satan. They battle over the soul of a young rock star who is willing to sell his soul to the devil.
In 1943 in Tunisia, a unit of the French Foreign Legion fights the Germans over possession of a bank treasure in gold bars.
Spain, 1960s. People from a very poor family work in the country, at the service of a rich family of landowners...

Busy and often absent father must take care of his two boys after his wife dies. They all live in Tunisia because of their father's job. The older boy is handling the difficult changes much better than the younger one.

A surreal, isolated village sees its inhabitants gradually leave behind their mutual traditions and superstitions as they leave for the city. Among them are two cousins who love each other and who get into a quarrel with other villagers.
Matthias Duval is in love, but he can't choose between the two twin sisters Betty and Liz Kerner. To pick up the two sisters, he invents his own twin brother and will play both characters.
Tale of erotic romance in turn of the century England.

Title_x: Conan the Future Boy: The Big Giant Robot's Resurrection

Description_x: Unpopular girl being bullied in her class.
"The Inside Man" is based on a real-life incident during the days of the Cold War when a Soviet submarine was spotted in Swedish waters.
1934 in Prague in Czechoslovakia, several children set forth to save the shipwrecked passengers who are on brash ice in the Arctic Ocean.
In 1920s Turkey, young peasant Memed elopes with beautiful Hatche, who was promised in an arranged marriage to the local potentate Abdi Aga's son, and later joins a group of bandits.
Secret Places follows the story of schoolgirls in England during WW2.

After making the domestic servant pregnant, a woman who doubles his age, a young man of only seventeen years from the German bourgeoisie is sent by his family to the United States in order to avoid a huge scandal.
A romantic thoughtful interview intended student list entirely changed the lives of two people, professors and eminent students.
A doctor falls in love with his student.
When a mother and daughter fall in love with the same man, things get out of control.
An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.
A cynical playboy pursues an introverted divorcee in the decadence of Hong Kong on the eve of the 1941 Japanese invasion.
A high school girl travels to the island of New Caledonia and has magical adventures.
A couple goes on the run after being accused for a crime they didn't commit.
Rape, murder and blackmail result when the town's most beautiful woman gets married.
A mythological children's tale about the friendship between a deaf mute boy, Jonasi, and a rare white turtle.
In Paris, a women's bag, which contains an embarrassing letter from the french president, is stolen.
Michel,a referee has to suffer the consequences of having whistled a penalty against a team which is supported by football hooligans.

Title_x: Os Trapalhões e o Mágico de Oróz
