Description_x: Catherine goes through all the travails of a young woman, who had to deal with a scheming stepfather out to dupe her of her inheritance.
A private detective ponders another profession until a mysterious woman hires him to solve her roommate's murder.
Graciliano Ramos' period he spent in prison after being considered a subversive element by the government.
A middle-class woman and Maori boy who lives on the streets meet in drug rehab and kindle a friendship.
A handsome hoodlum charms his way into the life of a pretty rich girl in 1950s Barcelona.
Max, who dreams of adventures, abandons his studies at 18 to become involved in the navy. He becomes the sailor 512.
A mahjong neophyte loses everything to game master only to hone his skills, take on all challenges and plan for an ultimate revenge match.
A disillusioned student meets a eccentric beggar and a mute prostitute he falls in love with. Together, without money, they cross South Korea to help the girl go home.
Daniel Chetman is tired of the violent neighborhood, and takes on the local gangster Mathias Hagen and his tugs.
Australia 1946. A young woman escapes from an unhappy affair to become tutor to three children who are being raised by their uncle.
A valet at a fancy nightclub hatches a plot to punish those responsible for his father's death.
De Cock & Vledder investigate the robbery of an armored truck which leads to several murders.

A stoic historian rents a lodge for the summer in the idyllic Irish countryside to finish his biography of Sir Isaac Newton, but his attention refocuses on his landlords, the dysfunctional lower-upper class Lawless family.
The story of a young un-employed youth, who instead of despairing uses his skills to earn tons of money to show to the world that anything is possible if there is will to do it.
Two men who do dirty work for a mysterious Mr. Galíndez, whom they have never seen, are asked to train a new recruit.
Tsuya Shimamura, is born in Kyoto as the second daughter of a tea trader who dies before her birth. Tsuya, who loves painting more than anything and is hopeless at housework, attends art school.
A married polish doctor has a lover who disappears at the Battle of the Dardanelles in 1915.

In the great tradition of Hsu Tseng Hung's The Silver Fox and Chang Cheh's Lengend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between all the clan leaders and certain death is one young woman.
A story of poverty and hunger.
A woman is being taken from her German hotel to be interrogated by police agents.
The life of three sisters during WW2 and after the installation of the communist regime.
The director of one of Finland's largest company, United Metal, discovers the company's Chairman dead in the office. A chain of bribes unravels.
Based on the real case of Marianna Bachmeier from 1981, the film tells the story of a mother calmly and resolutely firing seven shots at the killer of her little daughter Anna in the courtroom.

Sailor Jan/John cleans up his home town plagued by thieves and becomes known as fearless. His jealous cousin tries to scare him, but things end badly. Now an outlaw, John teams up with a local servant to slay a shapeshifting demon.
An arrogant and self-confident businessman tries to assure people of a small village that he can turn the village's economy better with planning new factories.

The dramatised story of a coal-miners' strike in 1930s Australia, in the small south Gippsland town of Korumburra. The story is told through the struggles of Agnes and Wattie Doig, two Scottish immigrants, who were real people.

Still reluctant to call it quits on her dying marriage, a conventional Athenian housewife gets caught up in a whirlwind romance with a successful man. Will this deliciously dangerous affair lead to true love or sharp disappointment?

Czar marries one of three sisters and they have a son. The other two consumed by jealousy throw the girl and the boy into the sea. They end up on an island where the boy meets a magical swan who grants wishes. The boy uses three.

Living in expeditions, a gang of friendly Malandro Lisboetas is one day contacted by mysterious Italian (from the Mafia, it is assumed) to steal part of the Lalique Collection, at the Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation Museum.
A self-proclaimed "knight" and his hapless squire travel the Spanish countryside, attacking "giants" that are really windmills in his attempt to win the love of the fair Dulcinea.

Title_x: De mica en mica s'omple la pica

Description_x: A boxer and a singer are hired by the Armed Forces to entertain the people of a small town. When their personalities and principles get them in trouble with the authorities, they support each other as they face their destiny.
A man who killed the son of the owner of the land they worked on for hanging on his wife, bury him in the barn. From this moment on, a spiritually tense process begins for the man and his wife.
The adventures of an orphan boy Huckleberry and an escaped slave together on a raft along the Mississippi.

Angela serves during Finland's Continuation War (1941-1944) as a nurse at a war hospital. There she meets Thomas Schmidt, a German officer who, in part, lost his memory due to her injuries. They fall in love.

Teen Nick is estranged from his family, and blaming himself for his Maori mate's climbing death. He runs away to his straight talking grandfather - who takes him bush - and loses his virginity to Sally.
Kanako returns from the USA to a troubled mother who witnessed a man leaving a murder scene and is consequently under persistent threat. For the time being.

Title_x: Der Mann mit dem Ring im Ohr

The years after the First World War. Captain Abarov sees that his dreams, feelings, and ideals are in ruins. His family is broken. His friends are desperate. There is only one way out for Abarov-to leave this world.

A century ago a nanny brings a 6 y.o. to his wealthy grandmother in Copenhagen. His father is too busy and his mother has just died. He loves his nanny but hates his grandmother, who cares more about appearances than for him.

Description_x: UNFAIR LABOR PRACTICES ARE EXPOSED BUT GIVEN A TRADITIONAL SOLUTION IN THIS OTHERWISE ERAP ACTION FILM.

Mixture of social satire and fantasy, in which a worker at a science research facility uses his newfound ability to transmit his dreams and sets up a business to sell them to a sleeping audience.
A story of the superstition of low cast.

In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.
A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.
Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.
Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

Hoping to achieve success in Hollywood, a young aspiring screenwriter allows others to exploit her. She goes through affair after sordid affair in her attempt to write her own screenplay and have it produced.

Title_x: Yor: The Hunter from the Future
Description_x: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.

In 1940s Venice, after twenty years of marriage, a Professor and his younger wife witness the passion wane. Now, all that remains is to confess the rousing thoughts to an elaborate diary hoping to break free from ties and inhibitions.
During W.W. II, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British P.O.W. and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid blood-shed.

A pimp on the run trusts his sex workers to a meek professor of literature, who accepts the challenge.

A beautiful and willful prostitute puts her appearance and body to use to become the toast of the town.

During Dirty War, half-English doctor in Argentina befriends the police, the rebels and the alcoholic Honorary British Consul, whose Latino wife he seduces. When the consul is mistakenly kidnapped by the rebels, he must pick a side.
In 1960s America, a black cadet is allowed acceptance into a seemingly prestigious military academy, unleashing a barrage of corruption within the system that another cadet is willing to expose.
A drunken Scottish poet, who has not written a word in years, feels compelled to regain control of his life and work after meeting a beautiful young woman.
Daniel Isaacson attempts to determine the true complicity of his parents Paul and Rochelle Isaacson, who were executed for espionage in the 1950s.

A woman reflects on her childhood relationship with her father, attempting to understand the depths of his despair and the truth of his myths.

Thieves run over a child while escaping after a robbery. A deadly hitman who likes to taunt his targets is hired to track them down. Stone moves to England, but the assassin follows. Loosely based on Donald Westlake's cult crime novel.

A teenage lad struggles to piece together his reality following a traumatic event.
A couple's seemingly "perfect" marriage is shaken when the husband is charged with rape.

To save her ranch after the accidental death of her husband, a woman marries the man responsible for the mishap.

Inspector Bertrand wants to put an end to the criminal activities of Ange Malaggione, the head of the Corsican clan.

A policeman is torn between doing his job, following his code of honor and being dedicated to his love interest.

The erratic life of Patrice who, after having murdered the pimp of his mother to avenge the death of her, goes from town to town.

Two young girls abducted by pimps to make them participate in perverse shows, testify against their captors. Following the assassination of the two girls, Commissioner Beauclair will attack a prostitution network in the Paris region.

Description_x: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.
Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.
A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.
A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.
A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.
To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.
A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.
An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.
A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.
A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

It's suspected that a peace/anti-nuke organization in UK has some extremists willing to use terrorism. The action will probably be against an embassy in London. The SAS/Special Air Service try to get the organization infiltrated.
A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.
A young woman fleeing her sexually abusive stepfather hitches a ride with two young men, but the three soon find themselves at the mercy of a backwoods Satanic cult.
A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.
Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.
After their mother dies and their father leaves them, teenage brothers Tex and Mason McCormick struggle to make it on their own.
A boy with a music talent goes on a journey with his uncle for a stage concert.
A mentally challenged man escapes from his tyrannical master and finds happiness when a poor family takes him in.

Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.
The ghost of a dead husband haunts his wife as she moves back to their house in NYC. She's about to marry an egyptologist there.
A PI investigates the murder of his one-armed friend, a PI working on a case. Clues lead to a sex clinic. Bodies pile up.
Post World War III futuristic tale of collapsed governments & bankrupt countries heralding a new lawless age.

A young American family moves to a House in Kyoto, Japan. It turns out to be haunted by the ghosts of a woman and her lover, who were killed by the woman's husband, as well as the ghost of the husband, who killed himself afterward.
A TV reporter finds himself in the middle of an Arab leader buying two portable nukes, terrorists, arms dealer, a reporter/CIA spy killed, a US president ordering a K-I-L-L etc.
An ambitious priest seduces a nun and leads the Vatican into shady business during and after World War II.
A C.I.A. Agent tries to infiltrate Soviet intelligence to stop a murderous diabolical plot.
Contaminated grain breeds overgrown, killer rats in this Golden Harvest production. Dachshunds were dressed up as rats for the special effects.
Fictional account of real-life mystery writer Dashiell Hammett, and his involvement in the investigation of a beautiful Chinese cabaret actress' mysterious disappearance in San Francisco.

Abandoned by his wife and daughter, a famous surgeon starts drinking, hurts his head and loses his memory. His medical knowledge gradually resurfaces and he becomes a village healer, not remembering who he is.
A Vietnam vet returns home from a prisoner of war camp and is greeted as a hero, but is quickly forgotten and soon discovers how tough survival is in his own country.

Title_x: If You Could See What I Hear
Description_x: A light comedy/love story based on the life of blind musician Tom Sullivan.
In 1897 Swedish engineer S. A. Andrée with 2 colleagues prepares to fly over the North Pole in his balloon "Eagle".
Tragic story of a wealthy woman whose sexual desires change her into a prostitute, working on the streets of Paris during the 1880s.
A rich, beautiful couple give birth to deformed alien twins who, when their heads are together, are the smartest kids on the planet.
A corrupt prison guard becomes involved in a plot to murder a black revolutionary serving time in his prison.
A famous opera singer, Giorgio Fini, loses his voice during an American tour. He goes to a female throat specialist, Pamela Taylor, whom he falls in love with.
The story of Jean Valjean, a Frenchman convicted of minor crimes, who is hounded for years by an unforgiving and unrelenting police inspector, Javert.
A group of vacationing waitresses visit a resort hotel on the Canary Islands, only to find that the former monastery's monks nearby have returned as living blind dead.
Bemisal is the story of a noble orphan, Sudhir who sacrifices everything he has, from the love of his life to his profession and reputation, to save his foster family.
Two old women who happen to be pickpockets stole money from Simon, the taxi driver. The police are unable to find the thieves, so Simon decides to find them himself.
A yakuza melodrama, covering decades in the lives of Boss Onimasa, his adopted daughter Matsue, and his biological daughter Hanako.
An assassin tries to retire against his bosses' will.

Labbé is a quiet hatter in a small town, living with his handicapped wife who never goes out. His neighbour, a tailor, is fascinated by him. A series of female murders shakes the town. Is Labbé involved?
Animated version of the classic story of a young farmgirl who is transported to the magic land of Oz.

Title_x: An Unsuitable Job for a Woman

Description_x: In a totalitarian society of the future, in which the government controls all facets of the press, a homicide detective investigates a string of bombings, and finds out more than he bargained for.
A musician beds down a prostitute he knows is diseased in order to gain inspiration, an act he later believes to have been a tacit pact with Satan.
Gang of bumbling crooks kidnap a bratty little kid, find out they got more than they bargained for.
Jess Franco's (loose) adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's Treasure Island, a story about a guy who looks for treasure on an island and gets seduced by the sirens.

Orphan Heidi lives with her grandpa in Swiss Alps. She brings joy to all there. However, her aunt takes her to the city to live as a servant girl to a cold rich strict family and their nice but sad handicapped daughter.
Sébastien Grenier,a secret agent eliminates all his rivals in order to decipher who has killed some of his associates.
2 boys get drunk and rape a girl.
A cellist in a small orchestra receives help from animals to help him practice his music.
Two children in wartime England find a German fighter pilot.
Seven commandos lose their captain and must begin a brutal attempt to survive.
In 1934, a mysterious Frenchman returns to Europe from Egypt.
Armenian guerrilla troops fight against the Turkish forces on the mountain of Musa Dagh.
The story follow a court case of a woman accused of having killed her husband.
Alice falls in love with a jogger called Rabbit.

North Africa in the 1930s. Julien, a young, bored diplomat meets Clothilde, whose husband is on a mission in Siberia. He becomes infatuated with her, and soon ends up spending all his time with her, longing to know everything about her.
A self-styled "urban guerrilla" in Greenwich Village is sent on various assignments across the country by a mysterious "commander."
CLOVER-LEAF LOVE CHAIN INVOLVES TWO ANTAGONISTIC SISTERS, THE MAN WHO LOVES ONE AND IGNORES THE IGNORES THE OTHER, AND A SECOND MAN WHO LOVES THE IGNORED BUT IS LOVED BY THE OTHER SISTER.
The life of a young woman in Barcelona during the Spanish Civil War and its aftermath.
A love story between a 29-year-old woman, who has once been a prostitute but is now the mistress of a wealthy jewelry merchant, and a 19-year-old college student.

A mortuary worker uncovers the identity of a serial killer after finding one of his victims in the mortuary's coffins. However, instead of turning him over to the police, he blackmails him. Complications ensue.
During a pogrom in Poland on the eve of World War I, a group of Jews seek refuge from the Cossacks. The fugitives hide out in a rural inn, terrified that they may be given away at any moment.
An eremit who has had contact to terrorists is planning to kill the pope by poisoning.
A former CIA agent is forced by crooked agents of the government to pose as a notorious smuggler.
The story of a hitman, a man who kills other people for money, and the dangers that come with the job.
A villain wants to stop the crew from getting to a gem that will bring life back to earth
A spaceship crash-lands on a planet, and the crew is astonished to find that it holds a beautiful woman who can heal the sick and injured and a race of super-intelligent beings.
The girlfriend of a man murdered for a debt falls in love with the killer.
A truck driver and his job colleagues figures out how to make the smart move, on their many trips to Finland: Tinkering with cargo pallets that can be sold illegal.

Title_x: Y a-t-il un Français dans la salle?
Description_x: Horace Tumelat,a powerful politician was raised by his uncle Eusèbe.He has to find a letter written by his uncle who committed suicide.
The same night as a girl is slain in the woods, the teenagers Sam and Les are robbed of all of their hard earned hens. In the quest for their hens they cross the murderer's path.

Title_x: Kono ko no nanatsu no oiwai ni

Description_x: Violence and intrigue ensue when a French doctor "Gérard Depardieu" kills his wife and lover and joins the Foreign Legion.
Detective Nestor Burma begins an investigation into the corrupt drug-ridden punk rock music world.
A prince comes back to his native land to take revenge on those who conspired against him. Inspired from the novel The Count of Monte Christo
Melkior Tresic is one of many intellectuals in 1941 Zagreb who is helplessly waiting for the encroaching war.

Title_x: She Kept Asking for the Moon

Description_x: Abandoned by his wife, a man meets a fashion photographer who is also suffering from loneliness.
The servant boy, a minor, engaged in a middle class family dies mysteriously locked in a kitchen.

Title_x: Que les gros salaires lèvent le doigt!
Description_x: The cynical boss of a big insurance agency invites his top-salary employees to spend a week-end in his country house. A modest clerical worker, also invited, discovers the hidden reason for this party - and decides to take advantage of it.

Director Werner Nekes has created this experimental film in the mode of James Joyce's Ulysses to the extent that human interactions are represented by poetic, symbolic images and language, with a certain amount of nudity added in.

In 1954, Go Akuzu (Ken Takakura) travels to the Tsuruga Straits that separate Japan's northernmost island of Hokkaido from the island of Honshu, to investigate the tragic loss of a passenger ship in the treacherous waters of the straits.
Juanita Narboni, a provincial spinster, remembers her memories in an extensive monologue along which all her personal and family ghosts will appear: her mother, her sister, her only boyfriend .

The 38-year-old doctor Jacob Holme lives deeply rooted in the world of normality with a medical practice, house and a marriage without excitement. He is drawn to a young schizophrenic girl and his wife leaves him.
A publisher seeks information on a writer who died long ago.
Thanks to his friendliness towards Nazis, Sarajevo businessman is more and more rich during WW2. However, his infatuation towards the Jewish girl will cause his demise.
Tessa, Debora and Roberta have a strong bond. Surrounded by perverted men whose only pleasure is sadistic sex games, far out drug fantasies and to humiliate and abuse women, they must take action.
The script of the film is based on the prose of the Bulgarian classic writer Konstantin Konstantinov.
This film shows serious moral problems in the society which become visible in an extreme situation, when happiness, trust, sense of life are so precious.
Several young women are murdered in a small community, and a detective moves in to solve the crimes.
Miller Gunnar Huttunen falls so heavily in love that he starts to howl.

News photographer Adam and journalist Kevin, two fictional estranged brothers who witnessed the real life 1975 killing of the Balibo Five in Timor, reunite after five years only for their PTSD to resurface and tear them apart.
Two childhood sweethearts departs from each other for religious prejudice and misery starts at life of the protagonist.

Title_x: Dobrodruzství Robinsona Crusoe, námorníka z Yorku

Description_x: Piyal and Nanda have now aged, and their children have left them. Priya reminisces on her life after her son sends her a letter from London accusing her and her husband of various faults.
Just before the end of an 18-month-long journey from Africa, a fishing ship is sent on another 2-month cruise. The crew members miss their loved ones a lot.
A young communist returns to a small provincial town.
The Story about Kitano Akio competing in All Japan Road Race Championship , the International Class A 500cc class.

A psychological movie set in the times of Second World War in occupied Poland. Partisans, commanded by autocratic General Boldyn who becomes unbearable during inactivity, start to submit false reports on sudden moves of German troops.
After a heavy rain storm, several vehicles get stuck on a muddy road. Soon hunger and fatigue change people's manners, making them behave in a very noncivilized way.
Mid 50s: the trials and tribulations of Shinsuke Ibuki, freshly arrived in Tokyo from Kyushu.
A young boy fantasizes his way to school into a battle between cowboys and Indians, where the bad guys want to steal some gold medals. Real events and fantasy interacts in his mind.
Based on a novel by Prezihov Voranc, it tells a story about a farmer's family who live in Northern Slovenia before WW2.

Title_x: Maria Danneels (of het leven dat we droomden)
De camisa vieja a chaqueta nueva

Description_x: A communist is released from prison in 1935 Hamburg. He tries to link up with the Party again, but is unsure as to who he can trust, and has difficulty adjusting to life in Nazi Germany.
A historical drama set in the 1930s Isan province Thailand, telling the travails of a small clan of subsistence farmers and their village as a particularly bad drought reduces them to bush living.
A man is invited to an estancia to hunt deer. As a young woman from the host family develops an interest in the guest, his hidden intentions are revealed.

A gray border, dull village. Time seems to have stopped in this place. The appearance of a beautiful woman breaks the monotonous way of life and challenges the colorless group of men and makes them come out of their shells.
Alphonse and Aldo, two soldiers during the Second World War, are responsible for transporting the body of Jules, who died in battle, to his country of origin. Nothing is going to go as planned.
A white man finds a beautiful Indian in a diamond extraction site in the State of Goiás, Brazil, and falls in love.
Based on the novel by Josip Jurcic and set in rural Yugoslavia in the 1840's. The tenth brother of a family returns to the family home to take revenge on his father who had abandoned him as a child.
After learning that her partner is terminally ill, a woman tries to make the best of the few months they have left to be together.

A government-mandated expert on dams arrives at a rain-soaked village to inspect a weather-beaten barrier, and his fears come true. Amid corruption, bureaucracy, and superstition, failure is inevitable. Will the water claim back its land?
In the last moments of his life, the writer turns over episodes from his past. He finds the cause of another death, ahead of the last breath.

Title_x: Hugh MacLennan: Portrait of a Writer

Description_x: This is a film about the collision between father and son. The cynicism and ruined moral values of the son crush the patriarchal world of the father.
After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.
James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.
The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.
A high-school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance, and accident; he burns down her family's house and is committed to a psychiatric hospital.
After her mother dies, fourteen-year-old Marion falls in love with her stepfather, Remy.
An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.
A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.
Anna and Mike portray two characters in a film set in 19th century England who fall in love despite the fact that Mike's character is engaged.

Two generations of men find themselves haunted by the presence of a spectral woman. When the son of one of the elderly men returns to his hometown after his brother's mysterious death, they attempt to unravel her story.
An immigrant housemaid seduces a 15-year-old boy and later fakes her own death as part of his chauffeur's blackmail plot. Troubles arise when the two start to fall in love.
The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.
This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.
A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence, and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.
Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.
Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

After a crippling injury leaves her husband impotent, Lady Chatterly is torn between her love for her husband and her physical desires. With her husband's consent, she seeks out other means of fulfilling her needs.
In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.
Tom Sharky is demoted to vice after a bust goes terribly wrong. He and his team stumble across a mob murder tied to prostitution and government.
A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.
Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.
A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.
Terrorists in the process of kidnapping a child get trapped in a house with an extremely deadly snake.
A small town's doctor takes matters into his own hands after a series of gruesome and bizarre rape crimes perplex the clueless authorities.
A comic book artist loses his hand, which in turn takes on a murderous life of its own.
Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.

Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.
A quiet man's peaceful suburban lifestyle is threatened by the new, obnoxious couple that moves in next door.
A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him; between each story some musicians play their songs.

In early-1930s Germany, a passionate stage actor finds himself before a dilemma: renounce his apolitical stance and comply with the Reich's doctrine, or face oblivion. But, Faustian bargains never end well. What is the price of success?
A girl loves an older man. He demands that she goes in a brothel, as evidence that she loves him.
Poet/lecturer Charles Serking awakens from his alcoholic haze long enough to take a bus back to L.A. and plunge into an orgy of drink and sexual depravity.
Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.
We follow the Danish students in a class at Århus Katedralskole late 1950s, from age 13 till 16.
A worldly ambitious monsignor clashes with his older brother, a cynical Los Angeles homicide detective who is investigating the brutal murder of a young prostitute.

Marya Zelli finds herself penniless after her art dealer husband, Stephan, is convicted of theft. Marya accepts the hospitality of a strange couple, H.J. and Lois Heidler, who lets her live in their house.
A housewife grows smaller and smaller in reaction to chemicals found in cosmetics and household products.
Douglas, a record salesman, is an obsessive fan of actress Sally Ross. When his letters are rejected, he strikes out at her and her loved ones.
A professor with the psychic ability to communicate with the dead uses his powers on his pet cat in order to take vengeance upon his enemies.
The mating rituals of two teenage surf chicks from the southern suburbs of Sydney.

Title_x: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Miss Osbourne
Description_x: In 19th century London, a sex maniac sneaks into the engagement party of Dr. Henry Jekyll and Miss Fanny Osbourne, turning the event into a nightmarish whirlpool of murder and debauchery.
A teenage delinquent schoolgirl named Izumi Hoshi inherits her father's Yakuza clan.

In 1944, in Brooklyn, two Jewish kids become friends. One is from a very conservative family, and the other is more liberal. The issues of importance of tradition, parental expectations and the formation of Israel cause constant friction.

When a pilot becomes the sole survivor of an airliner crash that kills over 300 people, he works with a psychic and a priest to determine who is responsible for the incident and pacify the vengeful souls of the victims.
Egyptologist Erica Baron finds more than she bargained for during her long-planned trip to The Land of the Pharoahs: murder, theft, betrayal, love, and a mummy's curse.

A woman researches a book that takes her to the black magic cult of Leák in Bali. She meets an evil witch who promises to train her dark arts. But she is tricked and turned into a flying vampire with internal organs hanging from her neck.
Victim of manipulation, Cop Choucas is wanted for two murders and searched for by every cop in town.
A pathetic police chief, humiliated by everyone around him, suddenly wants a clean slate in life - and resorts to drastic means to do so.

A speculation on the fate of the famous hijacker who parachuted with his ransom and disappeared in the mountains, has Cooper following a meticulous plan to disappear into anonymity despite the best efforts of a dogged cop.

In 1938, a German singer falls in love with a Jewish composer in Zurich, who helps Jews flee Nazi Germany. She wants to help but is forced back to Germany. Her song "Lili Marleen" becomes a hit with soldiers and the Nazi top.
2 buddy farmers are visited by aliens who like their domestic cabbage soup.
After the Allies liberate Naples in 1943, the life for the locals is not much easier, especially for women. Many sacrifice their dignity and morale to survive.
A literature teacher who was born in a village comes to Hababam Sinifi. However, the students in the class mock him because of his accent.
A police inspector, suspecting an attorney of two child sex murders, has him held for a questioning session that goes on for hours.
A young girl from the provinces, comes to Paris with one goal: to become a part of the rich bourgeoisie. To achieve this she will use her unique beauty and charm.
A down on his luck engineer gets involved in an adventure with a mysterious woman and an emerald magnate.
Famous, great hunters, better stay away, here comes Vuk! (They say he is cunning as a fox!)
Melanie enjoys flirting and having little affairs. Her husband Victor seems to bear her antics with utmost calm and nonchalance. This impression turns out to be wrong, very wrong indeed.
A young girl and her friends set off on an expedition into the wilderness in order to find her missing father.
A 1920s playwright meets a beautiful woman who may be the ghost of his patron's deceased wife.

When architect Stephen Booker loses his partnership, he finds jobs hard to come by, and with money in short supply, he unwittingly becomes involved in a daring scheme to rob one of London's biggest bank vaults.

A weak, dyslexic boy is bullied in school. His Tarzan obsessed dad calls him Rubber Tarzan. He makes a friend in crane driver Ole, who tells him: There's always something, you're good at. You just have to know, what it is.

Title_x: The Girl with the Red Hair
Description_x: The story of Hannie Schaft, Dutch Resistance, told in flashback as they try to bring collaborators and criminals to justice in 1945.
In post-War Japan, a boy from a noodle store-owning family befriends a neighboring boy living in poverty.

Title_x: The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians
Description_x: In 1897, in a castle near the town of Werewolfville in the Carpathians, a slightly deranged Professor Orfanik experiments with his new inventions which include, even at this early date, television and a film camera.
The villain is called Amakusa Shiro Tokaisada. He is actually based on a real christian samurai. The movie was one of the inspirations for the game called 'Samurai Shodown' (actual spelling)
A group of ordinary French survived a nuclear war and found themselves in the face of what was left of civilization.
Three men face their mother's death.
The life of a young man, son of an English officer who lets himself become a prisoner of love resulting in fatalism and disgrace.
The British dub of Peter No-Tail premiered in 1983. The American dub of Peter No-Tail premiered on September 21, 1983.
Over two decades after their affair ended, a married man is haunted by the presence of his former lover.
At the deathbed of his used-to-be militant mother an older man looks back at his childhood, when he was in love with his sensual aunt Coleta.
A German journalist, escaping from broken marriage, goes to Lebanon to cover the civil war. Soon, he realizes that he can't handle the truth.

Mick and Alan, two friends who have just left school, are full of dreams for the future. But against the background of Thatcher's Britain, the two soon wake up to reality. From acclaimed Director Ken Loach.
Set in a bleak future where roving gangs of children terrorize city streets, and reality is often an illusion.
Tells the tale of sexual encounters of one woman and several friends, family members and acquaintances, as seen (and told) from the perspective of a pair of satin blue panties.
In a small town in rural Kansas, a troubled veteran attempts to restore an old merry-go-round ride.

In the 1940s, a city girl moves from America to her husband's failing farm in Southern Rhodesia in colonial Africa. Unhappy and unhinged, she starts an affair with their black servant which leads to tragedy.

It's 1963 and teenage Barnie has problems. School bullies are after him, his family is dysfunctional and his girl Leslie screws around. On the run from bullies, he hides in the African-American part of town and meets cute Winona.
A countess and a writer are in love with the same girl.

Title_x: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
Description_x: "Godfather of the kung-fu film", Chang Cheh, made this treasured and beloved adventure featuring a sword, training manual, treasure map and a secret message. The kung-fu which ensues is as impressive as it is glorious.
In medieval Serbia, a young monk, a master of herbal medicine, attracts the attention of a warlord's wife.
Urban sprawl and corrupt materialism have a devastating effect on farming families near Tokyo.
Four British teens on vacation visit an island and discover that a terrorist group is using it as their headquarters.
A young drifter meets up with a strange old man who claims that he has been taught to fly by birds.

The daughters of a nobleman give shelter to a stranger. After that visit ends with a severed hand, the pilgrim takes on different identities to seek revenge. The nobleman goes missing and his youngest has to pose as a knight to save him.

Title_x: Your Ticket Is No Longer Valid
Description_x: An influential businessmen is stressed out by work. This leads to him being unable to perform in bed. He gets paranoid that his wife will start cheating on him. This idea, however, slowly becomes more and more appealing to him.
The lives of the average Quebecois Plouffe family during the final years of the depression and through World War II.
A story that follows the lives and interactions of two Buddhist monks living in South Korea.
Said funny events that have to be engaged to endear himself to the beloved players.
This is an animated story covering the ancient legend of Beowulf, as narrated in a Monty Pythonesque way by Grendel (Sir Peter Ustinov), the "monster" in the legend.
A patient is released from a mental hospital to help the police find a student who disappeared a few days ago.
A young cat burglar begins a love triangle with a reckless older man and her on-again-off-again bonehead biker boyfriend.
Walter Klozett is a spy arrested and imprisoned by the French Police who know him in possession of stolen booty which the French secret services would like to recover at all costs.

Anna and Tom live in a remote place while Anna suffers from depression after an abortion, and is afraid of losing Tom's affection. An admirer of Tom's writing, Ellinor, adds to the problem, when she appears with a tame wolf.
In late 19th century, a Transylvanian revolutionary fleeing the Imperial authorities goes to Italy where he meets a beautiful soprano who later disappears under mysterious circumstances.
The story of the rise and fall of a young courtesan.
The notorious and mysterious criminal Furax steals France's famous monuments, replacing them with replicas.

Life of theater artistes. The Oedipus complex. The tragic life of a quintessential movie heroine. These are some of the themes handled by ace director Puttanna Kanagal with his characteristic finesse in Ranganayaki.
The True Story of Ah Q is set during the 1911 revolution. Ah Q is a lowly peasant who wants to rise above his class, or at least get out of his grinding poverty.
In a small town, a dead dog on the middle of the main street, then a bureaucratic process begins to determine who is responsible for removing dead dog.

Title_x: El infierno de todos tan temido

Description_x: About and ex-hippies memories of the death of John Lennon and the strange encounter with the murder mystery of a woman turning schizophrenic of grief.
Filipino take on Agatha Christie's classic story about ten people stuck in a remote place, who are killed one by one by someone as punishment for their supposed crimes.
A prostitute tries to communicate with one of her lovers who died in a duel, but who appears to him is his other lover, greater than the previous one, died in the same duel.
A circus family encounters hard times and family strife, but is brought into the limelight through their chance encounter with a polar bear cub.
Set in feudal Japan, the film focuses on Yuki, an adolescent goddess whose task is to clean up the Earth, both by ridding it of oppressive authorities and by covering it with a blanket of snow.
Martin Beck has to search through the large company's director Palmgren's many enemies when the business man is shot in front of a dozen witnesses at a prestigious restaurant.
World War II is over and Heinrich, a German young boy, influenced by the Russians, starts to act according to the Communism in a small German village.
Gazija are military men who patrol the boundaries of the Ottoman Empire in mid-18th century. One such man has trouble reconciling times of peace with his Gazija standing.
A boy and a gypsy girl become friends and face prejudice in Berlin in the twenties.
A wrestler and a bookseller disgraced by life fall in love with each other.
An idealistic young architect moves from the big city to a small town intended to become an industrial center. Her ambitions meet the realities of socialist economics, bureaucracy, and indifference.
Four friends, one of them dies, and another, who discovers that he was killed, gets involved in a crime network.
Based on a TV sit-com series and set in World War II, about how an ordinary woodcutter develops into an active partisan fighter.

Title_x: The Hidden Trail of the Beasts

Description_x: This is a film about the moral and philosophical sides of the life and the art, about the complex relations between the artist and the rough rules of the time in which he lives.
Two young people fell in love and it became a tragedy after they got married, a story written by Xun Lu, which took place after the May 4th Movement.
A dwarf and his poor, but loving, family who are forced out of their house by a real estate agent.

In high hopes of getting a loan to update his antiquated machinery, a financially hard-pressed owner of an old tannery turns to a well-to-do migrant who wants to marry his young daughter. Could he be the solution to the family's problems?

Title_x: Otec ma zderie tak ci tak

Description_x: The action takes place at the beginning of the 20th century in the provincial Bulgarian town, Turnovo. A rich young doctor suffers because of his love to his housemaid. Meanwhile the First World War is beginning.

A beautiful middle-aged French woman comes to Bulgaria for a vacation. In a village by the sea, she meets a local fisherman. He likes to draw. The Frenchwoman likes his paintings. They fall in love with each other.
A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.
The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.
A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.
A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.
When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.
A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.
Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

With the outbreak of WWII, the sudden call to arms will send the men of a family's estate to the front, leaving a curious adolescent alone with the remaining women of the house, in need of a warm embrace and, possibly, a daring kiss.
A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.
Bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson is receiving death threats from a criminal he helped put away. This while his girlfriend is about to give birth, an event he isn't looking forward to.
Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.
A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.
Miss Jane Marple comes to solve the mystery when a local woman is poisoned and a visiting movie star seems to have been the intended victim.
Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.

In 19th-century Oklahoma, two teen girls who love stories about outlaws, are on a quest to meet and join up with them. They find a shadow of a former gang and although disappointed, still try to help them escape from a vigorous Marshal.

Once they said God himself couldn't sink her. Then they said no man on Earth could reach her. But an underwater research agency, headed by Admiral James Sandecker, is assigned the job of finding the doomed ship in her North Atlantic grave.
A journalist takes his son with him to investigate pirate activity off the coast of Florida. But he gets stranded on a mysterious island--where he might not be alone.
An archeologist discovers his daughter is possessed by the spirit of an Egyptian queen. To save mankind he must destroy her.
When terrorists take over two oil rigs, and threaten to blow them up if their demands are not met, an eccentric anti-terrorism expert volunteers his unique commando unit to stop them.
Frau Oberst has 2 young nieces who are very open with their sexuality. She hopes to find adequate lovers for her nieces and along the way finds herself in some precarious sexual situations.
An English girl and an Indian elephant, born on the same day, share a common destiny.
Handicapped after an unsuccessful suicide attempt, a man finds common ground in the troubled souls at a local dive bar.
In a future where dying of illness is exceedingly rare, a terminally ill woman becomes a celebrity and a man with camera implants goes to secretly record her for a morbid TV show.
Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.
An active volcano threatens a south Pacific island resort and its guests as a power struggle ensues between the property's developer and a drilling foreman.
After a virus devastates the global human population, survivors in Antarctica desperately try to find a cure and save the human race.
The synthetic fuel production formula, invented by the Nazis at the end of World War II, is sought after by some who aim to sell it, and by others who wish to destroy it.
A police inspector, nearing retirement, tracks a serial killer who is terrorizing New York.

Title_x: The Fiendish Plot of Dr. Fu Manchu
Description_x: When Fu's age-regressing elixir vitae is spilled by a hapless flunky, Fu Manchu sends his lackeys to round up supplies for a fresh batch of elixir, including a precious jewel, which prompts a team of agents to track him down.
A romantic comedy which explores the pressures on police officers.

Title_x: Just Tell Me What You Want
Description_x: A married, egotistical, middle-aged head of a corporate empire man and his mistress and protegee, who wants a more serious commitment and ends up dating a younger man, are in a casual love/hate relationship and engage in a battle of wits.
Two sophisticated jewel thieves join forces to steal $30 million in uncut jewels. Despite a continuous exchange of quips they eventually become romantically involved.
In 1797 Utah, an aged Cheyenne patriarch helps his kin to fight off a raiding party of rival Crow warriors and he tells his grandchildren the story of their family.
The story of the impossible love between a schoolgirl and a sixty-year-old painter.
A surreal period film following an university professor and his eerie nomad friend as they go through loose romantic triangles and face death in peculiar ways.
A tough, New York City ex-cop relentlessly searches for his kidnapped teenage daughter whom is held by a twisted psycho after mistaking her for the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

In contemporary Hollywood, private investigator Sam Marlow gets plastic surgery to look like Humphrey Bogart and solves various cases just like Bogart's silver-screen detective characters from the 1940s.

When a strange woman has her baby at the Marlowe's house, then disappears, Kate Marlowe is forced to keep the baby, Bonnie. She loves the child, but when her own children are systematically killed, suspicion turns to Bonnie.
God asks a young girl to help spread his word and influence with a slogan.
Mentally tortured photojournalist attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Title_x: A Few Days from the Life of I.I. Oblomov
Description_x: St. Petersburg, mid 19th century: the indolent, middle-aged Oblomov. He sleeps much of the day. His boyhood companion, Stoltz, now an energetic and successful businessman, adds Oblomov to his circle and introduces him to Olga.
A millionaire is suspected of buying an ad agency to use it as a way of brainwashing the public for his political ends.
Gunfighter Josey Wales travels to Mexico to get a friend out of jail.
Novel-based story of Jacob Fabian, a somewhat liberal Berlin advertising copywriter who witnesses the collapse of the prewar German society during the 1930s.
A New York City waitress decides to become a professional wrestler.

Mike Hagan is a pilot in passenger service and candidate for the honor "Best Pilot of the Year". Nobody knows that he's got private sorrows - he's an alcoholic. A stewardess notices his regular visits of the toilet and reports it.
In AD 33, a fake magician from Galilee shares his fate with Jesus Christ, whom he mistakes for a rival swindler.

Luis, an aging Falangist author with guilty conscious, is writing fake memoirs. Two reporters, his niece Mariana and her lesbian friend Elmyr, arrive to do a piece on him. While fact-checking his memoirs Mariana becomes attracted to him.
A man is pursued by killers after helping someone at a car crash.
Madicken never means for anything to go wrong, but somehow it gets that way. Neither this time, when her little sister got a concussion, and it's not her fault that she puts a pea up her own nose.
Based on the novel by Charles Templeton, a secret service chief leads a game of cat and mouse when a gang of third-world terrorists kidnap the President.
This movie chronicled Jack London's epic journey from San Francisco to the Klondike gold fields in 1898.

A young woman has a perfect love affair with a zealous writer. When she finds out that he's also a highly manipulative womanizer, it's too late - she's already too much in love to quit him. Things start to get really complicated.

Title_x: See You in the Next War
Description_x: The two enemies from war, Slovenian partisan Berk and German soldier Bitter, meet each other during holidays in Spain. Recalling the war through conversation, Berk remembers Anton, his fellow comrade he had spend the most time with.
A journalist steals a gun from a cop after killing him and goes on a spree of robbery and murder.
Set in the 1910's Transylvanian countryside, a poor but industrious peasant must choose between his obsessive lust for riches and his desire for true love.
Kao is given a mission by his elderly master to take a cursed sword and solve petty squabbles between skilled martial masters.

Title_x: The Man Who Went Up in Smoke
Description_x: A Swedish journalist disappears in Budapest and Martin Beck takes the case.

Title_x: I Sent a Letter to My Love

Description_x: A group of young surfers try to foil a gang of drug-smugglers.
Aboriginal woman Manganinnie survives a Black Line raid which claims the life of her husband, Meenopeekameena.
The funeral in his native village evokes the main character's reminiscences from the childhood, but the bygone time exist only in his memories.
For inspector Baroni,Monsieur Morlaix is the main suspect who might have killed his wife.
An unhappy married woman has an affair with a violent criminal. She gets pregnant with his baby, but he gets arrested and goes to prison. Now what?
Teng Piao went to jail for fifteen years on a frame up for drug smuggling. Now that he's out, along with his iron chain and hungry for revenge.

The small town of Vavilon hears of the recent Russian Revolution, but attempts to communize it are met with resistance from the rich people living in the town. The Red Army finally puts down the resistance.
In 1916 Romanian Army lieutenant Tudor Gheorghiu jealously obsesses over his wife Lena's apparent infidelity and contests against gigolo lawyer Nicolau for Lena's love.

An Icelandic farmer's son has to move from his farm during the depression. He leaves everything to start a new life elsewhere. Set in the crisis years, it describes tension between the farms and cities.
In Eastern Finland, in Liperi to be exact, Anna-Liisa Ihalainen asks her husband Antti to get some matches from the Ihalainen household. Unfortunately that trip takes a little longer than expected.

Title_x: From the Apennines to the Andes: The Movie

Description_x: Koto is a 1980 film directed by Kon Ichikawa starring Momoe Yamaguchi and Tomokazu Miura in an adaptation of Yasunari Kawabata's story The Old Capital.
Chin Siu Ho plays a young man who believes himself to be an orphan. Until one rainy night when he and three different men find themselves taking shelter from the storm in the same place.

Indirect satire dramatization on the differences between social classes features a lazy but handsome underdog and a high-class society girl who falls in love with him just because he looks like "Jean-Paul Belmondo" in her starry dreams.

An obscure collection of examples of today's problems, featuring tornadoes, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, tidal waves, locust swarms, fires, floods, plane crashes, racing accidents, assassinations, riots and animal killing.
An actor blurs reality and fiction with the character he plays in a soap opera.

Two little criminals without major, dream of adventure and easy life. They agree to go to work in the Poitou as representatives of musical encyclopedias luxury. But their friend Valerie arrive from Paris and just changes their life.

Title_x: La verdad sobre el caso Savolta

Description_x: A waitress is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by five men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.
A selfish playboy uses rich women to pay off his debts. Divorcing his wife and marrying the woman he loves throws him into a spiral of destruction.
The life of workers and their families in a construction site of a highway in 1965.
A man is released from prison. He returns to the small community he used to live in.
Part one of a pair of historical films about the life of Peter the Great.
On November 20, 1978 a truck driver picks up a man on the road, that tells him to take him to Pardo's Palace. Soon, the truck driver begins to realize who this person is.

Lin plays a young woman with difficult family obligations, who falls in love with the father of a girl she is tutoring. Jealous ex-lovers are thrown into the mix, and love must venture to conquer all.
A parliamentary debate on nuclear power is ongoing. Suddenly a shot is fired, aimed at the Minister of Energy. Is the act political, an act of terrorism or an ordinary murder?
The adaptation of a lesser known novel by Nobelist Ivo Andric, which describes the life of a spinster who was overwhelmed by a single passion: avarice.

A remake of the 1948 atomic-age film, "Krakatit", by the same director. A scrupulous scientist is in the throes of a serious ethical dilemma after creating a highly-efficient explosive which may bring immeasurable suffering to mankind.
The discovery of a drowned young girl's body makes the local authorities start an investigation.
A YOUNG GIRL HAS A TREASURE TO GET OR TO FORGET.
A young, beautiful woman with a colorful, eventful life but she is doomed only by its gray side. So tempting are the opportunities that are attributed to the cream of society.
In a near future the sea is almost drained for it's resources, due to big trawlers from UniFish emptying the sea for anything alive., ruining the lives of the small fisher men.
A single mother descends into alcoholism. At an AA meeting, she tells the story of how the habit destroyed her personal and professional life.
Peter L. Gan presents a stirring love drama that sets the pace for 1980.
Detective Kostenko is trying to find a group of criminals responsible for killing a policeman.
After a bet on a fight is made and an attempted assassination is thwarted, a man recently returned to town finds himself on the trail of a skilled killer leaving only a Mark of Blood on his victims.

Title_x: Jian qi xiao xiao kong que ling

Description_x: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.
A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.
H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.
In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.
The Wanderers is a teenage, Italian gang in Bronx, NYC, 1963. They have their confrontations with other gangs. Drugs and weapons are uncool. Adult life awaits them.
A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.
After being shipwrecked with a magnificent horse off the coast of Africa in the 1940s, a boy bonds with the stallion, and trains him to race after their rescue.

Title_x: Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro
Description_x: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

A supersonic airborne disaster. In order to survive a flight headed for the Moscow Olympics, passengers of the Concorde must endure aerial acrobatics to dodge missiles and survive a device that decompresses the plane.

A government health inspector is dispatched to assess the damage a logging company is causing to a patch of forest claimed by Native Americans, and comes face to face with true terror wrecking havoc in the woods.
As he approaches manhood, Ben Meechum struggles to win the approval of his demanding alpha male father, an aggressively competitive, but frustrated Marine pilot.
The owner of a trendy disco starts having problems with the men in her life and the Mafia, which is trying to move in on her place.
A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family is bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.
11-year-old Maria is forced to stay with her relatives in a small town. She becomes friends with a quirky, drunken painter.
A proud young woman in early 20th century Australia must choose between marriage and independence.
An American teenager living in Paris meets and falls in love with a local.
Fresh out of the army, Hazel Motes attempts to open the first Church Without Christ in the small town of Taulkinham.
Chronological exploits of Iwao Enokizu, a murderous thief on the run.
A divorced man falls in love, but somehow he can't get over his ex-wife. This affects his love life in comic ways. Based on Dan Wakefield's novel.
When her father is murdered, a pharmaceutical heiress becomes the next target of an unknown killer amid the international jet set.
An abusive sexual relationship between a white spinster schoolteacher and an young black janitor in 1956 Kansas complicates her struggle to come to grips with her sexuality and emotions.
The younger brother of an assassinated US President is led down a rabbit hole of conspiracies and dead ends after learning of a man claiming to be the real shooter.
An extension of the previous film, wherein a cache of adventurers return to the overturned ship to seek several fortunes.

After a rich old man dies in a suspicious car accident in Acapulco, Mexico, his widow wants his insurance company to pony up five million dollars. Hotshot investigator Jake Decker (Charles Grodin) and charming model Ellie (Farrah Fawcett-Majors) come in to check it out.

A somewhat mentally handicapped 20-year-old man works as a laborer, but everyone abuses his naiveté. A nice 40-year-old American woman hires him one day and they become close. However, the town and his family see her as predatory.
Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early 1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to lead a life of luxury.

Dr. Anansa Linderby (Beverly Johnson) is kidnapped in a medical mission in Africa by a slave trader. From this moment, her husband will do anything to recover her and to punish the bad guys, but that will be not an easy task.
Soviet KGB General Marenkov defects to the Americans and together with his CIA handler Harry Wargrave they plan an operation meant to reveal the KGB agents in Europe.
When a museum directer, who has long been divorced, takes a young girl as a lover things quickly become more complicated when her ex-husband also engages in a relationship with the girl.
Harry breaks down and loses his job after his wife is assassinated - could it be his turn next ?
Killer bats plague an Indian reservation in New Mexico.
A millionaire, who drove his wife to commit suicide, starts believing that he is being haunted by her spirit.
In between drinking cans of Fosters beer, Australian soldiers tread on a few landmines, and generally experience the war in Vietnam.
An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.

On the remote Norwegian Bear Island, used as a submarine base by the Germans during World War II, U.N. scientist Larsen sends a distress signal using an emergency N.A.T.O. frequency, and is received by scientific vessel Morning Rose.
When a leak of information in the African section of British Intelligence is discovered, security man Daintry is brought in to investigate.
During World War II, a Basque shepherd is approached by the underground, who wants him to lead a scientist and his family across the Pyrenees while being pursued by a sadistic German.
A doctor in Fascist Italy is exiled to a remote village for his political views.
In order to save King Rudolph of Ruritania from assassins and murderous usurpers, the kingdom hires a look-a-like London cabby to impersonate the Monarch.

When French King Louis XIV (Beau Bridges) learns that his twin brother, Philippe (Beau Bridges), could usurp his crown, he sets out to imprison him in the Bastille prison but four loyal musketeers are protecting Philippe.
Commissaire Stanislas Borowitz is going undercover as gangster Antonio Cerutti in order to expose corrupted policemen.
While travelling in pre-war Nazi Germany, a young couple realize a passenger seems to have been kidnapped off of their train, but, no other passenger aside from themselves, recalls her.
Two strangers help each other survive a night of great loss.
In 1901, two British yachtsmen visiting Germany's Frisian Islands accidentally discover a German plot to invade England.

Madicken is a Swedish girl from the upper level family, growing up during the time of first world war which did not include Sweden. She lives happily with her family, experiencing the world and making brave and crazy things.

Title_x: Confessions from the David Galaxy Affair
Description_x: Playboy David Galaxy is a suspect in a robbery case and needs an alibi, and the only credible witness to his innocence won't help. He also has to prove his mettle with "the only woman in the world who's never had an orgasm."

Title_x: The Shape of Things to Come
Description_x: Some time in the future, man has set up colonies on the Moon, when Earth becomes uninhabitable. A madman decides to destroy the Moon colonies with his robots and automated ships, and only three people and their robot can stop him.
As the horrors beneath the idealized 1950's come about, a successful young woman finds herself having a serious mental breakdown when she returns to New England.

The desperate love affair between a young Samoan chief and an American painter, against the will of her father. Amid this man-made tension comes a hurricane so devastating, the lives of the lovers and the entire island are imperiled.
While a small film crew are shooting a low budget horror movie in a house in the woods, the lines between reality and fiction start to blur, and the movie slowly starts to turn into a "snuff" film.

Yasha is a Jewish stage magician who tours through eastern Europe while destroying his career through personal problems. He has one more chance at theatrical success, but he needs to do a brand new trick in a Warsaw theater.
A young American man joins the IRA in Ireland but soon finds out that he is being used for political purposes and propaganda.

Police gets a call-out to a lonely hotel in the Alps. When an officer gets to the hotel everything seems to be alright. Suddenly an avalanche cuts them out from the rest of the world and strange things are going to happen.

Title_x: The World Is Full of Married Men
Description_x: David Cooper works in advertising but spends more time on his love life despite the fact that he is married. When his wife Linda discovers his girlfriends, she decides to find get revenge by having an affair.
A lusty young woman decides to use her sexual powers to "tame" the evil and murderous Dr. Jekyll.
After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelganger.
Based on the 1945 Memorias de Leticia Valle Memoirs of Leticia Valle is the fictionalized diary of an eleven-year-old girl who records an "inconceivable" seduction.

Title_x: Joi Baba Felunath: The Elephant God

Description_x: When honest young Tolly is forced on the run with 'Black Jack' adventure and mishap are never far away. Based on Leon Garfield's popular novel, Ken Loach's Black Jack is a dark and complex adventure film set in the 18th Century.
The life and times of a sensitive, poetic Polish boy who watches his country strive towards the liberation movement.
Sergeant Boyd's police search to find a sniper who has been shooting hookers.
The South African businessman David Swansey (Richard Harris) is delivering illegal German helicopters to Rhodesia. That makes patriot Gideon Marunga (Richard Roundtree) an angry man.
A young lieutenant Kiekeritz wants to give some meaning to his life. He starts to collect works of art.
Mexican adaptation of the Emile Zola novel.

In a post-apocalyptic world divided between two groups called the Flockers and the Ravagers, an adventurer and his "pleasure girl" try to find their way to a rumored safe haven called the Land of Genesis.

A family moves to a border town near the Rio Grande and opens up a store. Unfortunately, Pancho Villa and his man storm the town and rob the place. The wife is left to fend for herself, so she gets in touch with the man who works for Villa.
A man hires hires five hookers to fulfill a final fantasy before killing himself and his family.
The story is set in June 1983. Famous surgeon Jean-Marie Desprée was left by his wife 1 month ago and now he works in a modern movable hospital, where the 3rd world war is taking place.
A young boy has to make a voyage to a distant lake to save his mother, who has been turned into a dragon.
Sequel to Pilgrim's Progress. Christiana decides to follow in her husband's footsteps and make a pilgrimage to the Celestial City with her children and a friend.
A family movie which follows the life of a real otter and its adventures in the wild.

This vast musical fresco covers hundreds of years of history from enslavement to 20th-century immigration. Set on an enormous slave ship and boasts a dazzling array of brilliant choreography, wide-ranging musical styles and sharp satire.
A former felon is blackmailed by a corrupt policeman and forced to commit a crime.
Bertin is a wealthy and respected man in his town. His power is put in jeopardy when he accidentally kills his wife in a domestic argument.
A World War II-style "war game" setting the wealthy customers against skilled mercenaries goes awry when the simulated war gets too real.
While a train takes a woman to her destination, accompanied by her only daughter, she remembers the events that marked the life of her dead son and that led her to such a tragic outcome.
The tragic romance between the son of a miller and a landlord's daughter.

Title_x: From the Cloud to the Resistance

Description_x: Inspired from a famous martial arts tale, a young swordsman becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and challenges another kung fu master, where everything begins.
A poor family returns to their village from Dhaka after The Great Bengal Femine 1943. This movie centers on their struggling life during the World War II period.
Girl and her boyfriend are kidnapped. She develops a strange attraction to her kidnapper and the two get involved.
Two scientists use their inherited fortune differently. One designs a beautiful town called Fortuna, while the second builds huge factories to make munitions known as Steel City.

Kei and Atsuo were both enrolled in summer school. After school, the two head to the beach, they find another student against a local gang member, to see who is able to hold his breath longer under water. They decide to try too.

Title_x: Iracema, a Virgem dos Lábios de Mel
Description_x: The loves and life of a beautiful Brazilian Indian woman.
Irén and Attila, a not-so-young couple, are in love. All they want is a flat of their own where they could live together. Unfortunately, Hungary in the 70s is no place for dreams.

Title_x: Les fabuleuses aventures du légendaire Baron de Munchausen
Description_x: 1979 animated cartoon of legendary Baron of Münchausen, including stories like hunting wild ducks with bacon or his escape from inside a whale.
Kosuke visits a photo studio to take photo for his passport. There he happens to meet a daughter who came to request a wedding anniversary photo shoot.
An 18 y.o. Danish man is arrested after barking and biting a policeman. He ends up in a mental hospital where the comedy continues.
Famous detective Kindaichi investigates a series of mysterious murders revolving around a wealthy family.

This is a National award winning and critically acclaimed film by P Padmarajan, based on his novel of the same name. The film explores the angst of a teenage mind remorseful of murder and the changes life brings in the aftermath.
The evolution of Jesuit priest Juan Camí, from his early years of great faith and Falange-supporting patriotism, to the moment he loses his faith, becomes a Communist and marries a stripper.
Erik is avoiding the Nazi occupants and stay out of the hands of the Germans, and instead in Elly's arms.
A father kidnaps his three-year-old daughter and goes to Greece. The mother comes in contact with a journalist who helps her to get her daughter back.

Pauline, Cécile, Claire and Bernadette, young adolescent girls are gradually discovering the adult world and its disappointments. Between an impossible love, running away and multiple arguments, parents no longer know where to turn.
The daily life of two young women in Montreal.
The Viennese vegetable merchant Karl Kassbach becomes a member of the right-wing extremist organization "Initiative", which plans numerous attacks and assassinations in the Vienna.

A literature teacher in Mexico City decides to move back to his hometown. Even before reaching his destination, complications arise. Once in Cuévano he gets quickly enmeshed by the social climate of the town.

Paul Narboni remembers his happy childhood in Algeria before leaving the country in 1954. With his family, he then arrives in Marseille before reaching Paris. His father Albert, a grocer, will have to adapt to this new country.

A young Japanese-American man arrives at his grandmother's old hometown in Yamaguchi, begins to stay at her family's elite but dysfunctional household, and gets entangled in a sinister plot of murder.
The role played by the regular army in the Turkish War of Independence. This film's footage was burned by the military junta in 1983.
The daughter of an economically middle-class family fails to return home one night.
The story of an Spanish immigrant. His misfortune, success and return to his beloved Asturias is displayed in this movie.

Yanagimachi's first feature film is about a young man who makes a map of a neighborhood in which he delivers newspapers. He keeps a dossier on each family, recording their habits and rating how much he dislikes them.
The coming of age of a young man in the 1950s.
The middle-aged married scientist David falls in love head over heels with the teenage girl Eva.

In 20's Spain, young low-class women want to be hired as nannies by rich families. To get milk, these women ask help to young worker Paco to be pregnant. Paco, whose wife is sterile, accepts and earns money that way.
Kung Fu knight Shen Lang stumbles across grave robbers while on the trail of a martial arts mass murderer.

A translator at the conference of communist parties witnessed the biggest break between the two communist parties. The dramatic events in the military conflict take place on a naval base in Albania, which the Soviets did not dare to adopt.
This story of the everyday life of a couple living together is made all the more powerful by the lead's real off-screen romance.

Riccardo Finzi is a private investigator On his first night in town he meets a mysterious girl named Susy, who is later found dead. Convinced of foul play, he and his assistant Giuseppe decide to investigate.
While on vacation, a pair of married couples decide to trade spouses.
The love affair between Ceci, a white woman and a handsome Indian, Peri, in Brazil.

Fresh out of prison after four hard years of incarceration, a criminal mastermind and respected ringleader reunites with his old gang, only to relapse into his old habits. However, is everything as it seems?
A crime story about a sociopath businessman and his associates who cheat small businesses out of their money with shady contracts in the early 50s.
Elje, a mentally handicapped and bullied young man, is longing for his mother. He acquaints the local whore, a polish woman, who resembles his mother.
A week after a fight with her husband of 20 years, a woman's naked body is found in a lake. Was it an accident, suicide or - murder?

After a long decade of separation, a rising politician accompanies his ex-wife to the airport, thirsting for closure. As both fight with their inner demons, a suicide bomber threatens them. Will they find redemption this smiling afternoon?
