Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.
A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.
The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.
A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.
At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
Following the death of his father, an orphan is sent to live with his free-spirited aunt.
Two thugs harass assault, steal, murder, Marie-Ange, a jaded, passive hairdresser, joins them as lover, cook, and mother confessor, on her own search for seemingly unattainable sexual pleasure.

Title_x: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
Description_x: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

In ancient Arabia, a beautiful slave girl chooses a youth to be her new master, then she is kidnapped and they must search for each other. Stories are told within stories: love, travel and the whims of destiny.
A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, a journalist in possession of the man's diary investigates the alleged sighting of a former S.S. Captain, who commanded a concentration camp during World War II.

During World War I, a German U-boat sinks a British ship and takes the survivors on board. After it takes a wrong turn, the submarine takes them to the unknown land of Caprona, where they find dinosaurs and neanderthals.
A melon farmer battles organized crime and a hit man who wants to kill him.

An optimistic and inept window cleaner fully 'satisfies' his customers, bed hopping from one unsatisfied housewife to another, until he meets a successful female police officer, who will have none of his sexual advances.
Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.
A horror movie star returns to his famous role after years in a mental institution. But the character seems to be committing murders independent of his will.

A South African gold mine manager discovers a plot hatched by the mine owners and London bankers to flood the mine in order to curb gold production and consequently manipulate its price on the stock markets.
A pilot, stranded in the desert, meets a little boy who is a prince on a planet.
During a Caribbean vacation, a British civil servant finds herself falling in love with a Russian Agent.
The Four Musketeers defend the queen and her dressmaker from Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter.

After her recent release from a deep psychiatric care institution, a Libertine-styled countess goes back to her very evil ways and fixes her eyes on a pretty girl with the intention to destroy her after fully corrupting her body and soul.
When two men break out of prison, they join up with another and restart their criminal ways, robbing banks across the South.
An ex-con, once a cop, now working as security in a college, decides to investigate the murder of one of the students, a daughter of a senator.
Ten people are invited to a hotel in the Iranian desert, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?
A local Sheriff tries to keep the peace as racial strife hits his small Alabama town as tensions boil over when a black man is accused of raping a white woman.

Hoping to cure his violent seizures, a man agrees to a series of experimental microcomputers inserted into his brain but inadvertently discovers that violence now triggers a pleasurable response his brain.
A British Agent's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

During the 1655 war between Protestant Sweden and Catholic Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth some Polish-Lithuanian nobles side with Swedish king Charles X Gustav while others side with the Polish king Jan Kazimierz.
Three young men take a young woman and a middleaged man to an isolated cabin, where they are terrorized in different ways.
A retired intelligence agent devises a cunning plan to eliminate those who know too much about his past.
In this comedy of manners, Frederick Winterbourne tries to figure out the bright and bubbly Daisy Miller, only to be helped and hindered by false judgments from their fellow friends.
In a bid to gain respect, the neglected younger son of a working class Jewish family in Montréal embarks on a series of get-rich-quick schemes to buy land surrounding a lake.
A marriage counselor becomes possessed by the demon of sexuality, when her father in law, an exorcist, freed it while in Africa.
Three farm boys in the Old West help a wounded bank robber, who teaches them the trade.

On a beach in Nice, François meets the mysterious Peggy and falls in love with her. Following her to a villa, he meets Marc, a lawyer who has a strange relationship with the girl. Marc tells François that Peggy is a drug addict: she kills men who approach her.
A mentally-disturbed spinster experiences a series of bizarre encounters in Rome as she searches for someone to murder her.
A frontier family crosses the U.S. by wagon train, hoping for a better life in the Oregon Territory.
Acclaimed director Sidney Lumet brings this marvelous adaptation of a Larry McMurtry novel to life. Blythe Danner and Susasn Sarandon star in this complex yet disarmingly fresh look at love
A trainer of fighting cocks takes a vow of silence and gambles his loves and possessions in a bid to win a championship.
In the 1840s Missouri, young boy Huckleberry Finn, wanting to escape his drunkard violent father, joins black runaway slave Jim on a quest for freedom down the Mississippi River on a raft.

After an American scientist is severely injured and scarred in a car crash along the border with East Germany, he is captured by East German military. The scientists use metal implants to save him. Once he's back in the States, no one can tell if it's really him, so an intelligence specialist must determine who is under the "mask".
In 1896, three survivors of a whaling ship-wreck in the Canadian Arctic are saved and adopted by an Eskimo tribe but frictions arise when the three start misbehaving.
Detectives investigate the murder of an old man found in a Tokyo rail yard.
A Watchmaker finds out one day that his son has become a murderer. He tries to understand for whom and why.
A nutty antiques dealer starts to sacrifice women to an African idol.
A family of Appalachian children live together in the backwoods so that they can stay together after the death of their widower father.

In the 17th century, a pirate captain is murdered by his cook after he buries his treasure and marks it on a map but the poor-memory cook must rely on the captain's ghost to re-track the loot, since the map was drawn in disappearing ink.
An American settler marries an European mail-order bride and together they learn how to thrive in the harsh wilderness while working on their relationship too.

The elderly Senzô Tôyama (Nagatoshi Sakamoto) orders his employee, Makoto Katagiri (Yasunori Ishizu), to kidnap and train his wife Shizuko (Naomi Tani) in order to break her pride so that she will submit to his desires.
Independent diamond broker and his girlfriend attempt a heist at a major Diamond Exchange house in London.
A cunning French legal adviser teams up with an unemployed German girl and her sister to commit murders in Marseille.

Title_x: Vincent, François, Paul and the Others

Description_x: While at a bullfight Simona begins flashing back to a torrid sexual relationship she had with George (Maurizio Degli Esposti). Her relationship with George was one of open sexual discoveries which eventually led to revenge and murder.
An unusually nasty butler takes over the possessions of his degenerate master by means of witchcraft.

The police raid a brothel and a prostitute (Lina Romay) escapes into the countryside. The woman, Celestine, ends up at a rich folks house where she ends up sleeping with two of the servants who then get her a job as a maid.
A man seeking peace and quiet finds himself father to three bears.
What started as a simple blackmail quickly devolves into a downward spiral of psychological and physical violence.
A motley crew of criminals plans to rob a Los Angeles bank that's temporarily located in a mobile home during renovations.
The charming Adriana gets sick after her husband's death. Her brother-in-law takes her on a journey to meet a doctor, while love overwhelms them.
Private detective investigated a series of murders connected with a drug ring in Venice, California.
A murder of a man in an airport restroom leads to a series of mysterious killings in London.
Overnight, Paris is invaded - although peacefully - but the Chinese Army, and millions of Chinese people... It's the Nazi occupation all over again, with modern - funny - twists.
A man has to come to terms with his wasted youth, estranged family and grim prospects for the future.
An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

A castaway arrives on an island. He thinks it's uninhabited, but he sees a palace with also a hidden room. Soon he sees some people walking, dressed with old-fashioned clothes. He is afraid because people don't see him, like a ghost.
A suspense filled adventure-drama about the search for a treasure-laden Spanish Galleon that sank over 200 years ago.
Crime fighter Terry Sneed arrives in New Mexico to help out a local police chief - but he's already taking money from the underworld.

Title_x: Les Charlots en folie: À nous quatre Cardinal!
Description_x: The Queen of France finds herself in a state of embarrassment, when the king asked her to wear the special necklace for the forthcoming appearance in public.
D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.

"The Izu dancer" describes Young solo to Izu peninsula, and close to an entertainer troupe, in particular with the dancer named Kaoru,but to that brief love is just a featuring lyrical and pale memories by their sad waves farewell.
A bad ESP syndicate is planning to kill world leaders through mental telepathy. The good guys are a top secret group called ESPY and they're in charge of stopping the killer psychics.
A rookie cop on the undercover narcotic squad falls for the junkie who can help him nab a ruthless pusher/killer.
A detailed look at a Tokyo business tycoon (played by Shin Saburi) given a diagnosis of terminal cancer who must now re-assess his life and values.

In 1920, some workers of Patagonia, grouped in anarchist and socialist societies, decide to make a strike demanding better working conditions. The situation becomes unsustainable and the government sends the order is restored.
Three thieves, Henri-Pierre, Bob and Dimitri decide to take on Frankie Strong, a wealthy businessman.
Ramachandra Rao, a college professor, is newly married but is unable to come to terms with his previously failed relationship. This sours his relationship with his wife.
In a small French village, an angel appears disguised as a beautiful young blond.

A man returns to Spain after getting rich in America. He falls in love with a woman who works as a servant in his cousin's home. Before marrying her, he finds out that she's had a torrid affair with a priest.

Title_x: Un linceul n'a pas de poches
Description_x: Michel Dolannes resigns from a major newspaper as a journalist to launch a new journal 'Le Cosmopolite' which reveals all kinds of shady deals.One day, he is killed but who is the killer ?

Small town doctor Angelino falls in love at first sight with schoolteacher Irene. Bram the Builder is in love with gypsy girl Katja. Neither of the two men know how to convey their feelings to the objects of their affection.
Brock Peters (To Kill a Mockingbird) is Stephen Kumalo, a black South African minister searching the unfamiliar back alleys and shantytowns of Johannesburg for his son, Absalom.
The widow of a French mafia boss decides to find a successor for him.
This is the story about the great man of Olderdalen which starts as a simple shop-owner in the country and ends up as a tycoon in the capital (right after WW1.)
The story of two elderly sisters who exchange letters, and through brief flashbacks we see glimpses of their younger years.
D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.
A banker troubled by both business and personal problems is transferred to a small town. There he meets and seduces an older woman. Together, they decide to pull off a payroll holdup together.
The Countess Clara is in love with Andrea Valverde but agrees to marry the Count Guido when he learns that Andrew is his brother from his mother's side.

A Danish man's girlfriend is killed by a drunk driver. After a stay at a mental hospital he decides to kill someone dear to each of the 4 men in the car. 3 police detectives try to solve the "random" murders.

Title_x: Il romanzo di un giovane povero
Description_x: The turbulent vicissitudes of the young protagonist perpetually torn between a Volterrian candor and a legitimate desire for revenge.

Title_x: The Fish with the Eyes of Gold
Description_x: A ruthless killer is spreading terror in a beach town.
On a small green island out in the sea, they live in harmony - until a stranger comes. Like a hurricane this rocks the small society, and a killing lets all hidden forces loose.
A middle-aged man becomes deeply involved with the affairs and criminal connections of a mysterious girl.

An American gangster (Gulager) arrives in a small town in the south of Sweden. He establishes himself as a kind of politician/preacher, promising great changes in the community. Only a few people suspect that his intentions are evil.

Title_x: Il était une fois dans l'est
Description_x: Criss-cross stories adapted by author Michel Tremblay's popular plays from the Plateau borough in Montreal.

A love story between a "demi-mondaine" kept by various lovers, suffering from tuberculosis, and a young provincial bourgeois. Adaptation from the novel by Alexandre Dumas, fils, "The Lady of the Camellias".
The film takes on the story of two men who are in love with the same woman.

Title_x: Shoot It Black, Shoot It Blue
Description_x: A young black student accidentally films a crooked cop committing a murder. He then follows the cop around, filming more of his illegal activities.

Title_x: Wer stirbt schon gerne unter Palmen?

Description_x: The film version of Jose Leon Sanchez's best-selling novel about the author's 20 years of imprisonment on an island ruled by brutality.

3 brothers studying at Copenhagen University are invited to Nøddebo vicarage for Christmas. A steam engine and later a sleigh get them there. The vicar has 2 daughters of 18 and 21. They all sing, ice-skate, dance and have fun.
A young woman inherits a massive industrial empire that starts a feud with her relatives.
Mr. Basse wants his employee Mr. Bumbach married to his daughter. To make Bumbach more interesting, he invents an affair Bumbach must have had with movie star Rya Rya.
The life and the lovers of a few young women in a provincial town.
A historical tale from the 15th century about a young man that falls in love with the same woman that the son of the ruler of Moldavia loves.
When Clementine Kemper, the mother of three children, is once again prevented from playing the piano and singing by her husband Harry, she packs her things and leaves.
A young naive reporter romances a female reporter who is quietly organizing a journalist union and joins her cause.

Title_x: Deixem-me ao Menos Subir às Palmeiras
Description_x: Rape by an African foreman leads to the the mounting revolt of the labour force in an African colony. While some are forced to accept their condition of slaves, others prepare themselves to fight back at the armed repression.
A Hungarian scholar enters a strange world of animal experimentation and murder, after he is invited to visit Pendragon Castle, belonging to an eccentric reclusive earl.
A man and a woman begin an affair. The film explores different attitudes towards infidelity, and the reasons why couples stay together or separate.
Bernard, a journalist, and his friend Jules, a butcher by trade, are both passionate about horse racing.

While nursing her "auntie", Tine dreams of staying at the nearby castle. The criminal Bruno drops by. When Tine goes to the castle to phone the hospital, Karsten asks her to stay. Tine likes him but he still broods over a dead girlfriend.
Adaptation of Papadiamantis' novel Fonissa about a woman who murders little girls.
In Northeast Brazil, after carrying out some comissioned killing, hitman returns home to find his wife involved with a man who is a hitman hunter. A conflict ensues.
Hassan, a man raised in a traditional environment, resorts to murder when his wife has an affair.

Title_x: Die Antwort kennt nur der Wind

Description_x: The Camerons
A young filmmaker becomes involved with a gangster in Berlin.

A choking cry before a man carries his wife down in their basement freezer. Alex has killed off his wife on his remote farm. Then Helen turns up fleeing from her silver wedding celebrations. All alone.
A boy raised in a temple by monks must resist the test of temptation before he can become an abbot of his order.
The film shows Bulgaria after the First World War - different destinies, different turns on both sides of the political barricade. A life full of contradictions and passion.

Title_x: Theater of Life: Youth, Lust and Spirit

Description_x: An engineer returns to his hometown to demolish an old fort. In the return he is confronted with his past and his love of youth.
When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.
A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl whom the locals claim never existed.
James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.
A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.
San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.
Two people, a Frenchman Julien Maroyeur and a Jewish German woman (Anna Kupfer) met on a train while escaping the German army entering France.
A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.
During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.
Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.
On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.
In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

A physicist, his wife and two mediums are hired to investigate the Belasco House, where 27 guests had inexplicably died in 1927, along with most of a team of paranormal investigators that was sent in the early 1950s.
While escaping war-torn China, a group of Europeans crash in the Himalayas, where they are rescued and taken to the mysterious Valley of the Blue Moon, Shangri-La.
After his last crime has him looking at a long prison sentence for repeat offenses, a low level Boston gangster decides to snitch on his friends to avoid jail time.
Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.
After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.

Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.
A young love faces with old problems.
A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.
Baron Frankenstein creates two "zombies" - one male, one female - planning to mate them in order to create a master race.
The story of the friendship between a worldly-wise star pitcher and a half-wit catcher as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.
In the early 1970s, a young woman passing through rural Tennessee unintentionally gets caught in a feud between two local neighboring clans, the Feathers and the Gutshalls.
An ambitious coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.
A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.
A runaway teenager and a mixed-race horse breeder strike an unlikely friendship in the context of common hardships.

England, 1795: the young Catherine has just married Charles Fengriffen and moves into his castle. She becomes the victim of an old curse that lays on the family. On her wedding night she is raped by a ghost and gets pregnant.
A top New York detective is sent to Los Angeles where he must solve a case involving an old Sicilian Mafia family feud.
A marine biologist teaches his dolphins to communicate in English but shady characters plan to kidnap the trained mammals for a more sinister purpose.
A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost.
A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.
Three rich trustees are murdered - appearing as suicides. When a bus filled with orphans and three other rich trustees has an "accident," Colonel Bingham investigates.
Earl Macklin robs a bank owned by the mob, serves his prison time and is released, only to start a private war against the crime outfit that owned the bank.
Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.
In San Francisco, California, one victim in a mass murder is a police detective. His partner and a new partner investigate in the city's seamy side.

Title_x: The Earth Is a Sinful Song
The Man Who Loved Cat Dancing
Description_x: Western story about a defiant wife who leaves her husband to take up riding with outlaws.
A skilled flyer but very rebellious young seagull is kicked out of his clan. However, instead of being sad or lonely, he decides to enjoy and explore his newfound freedom.

Title_x: The Spook Who Sat by the Door
Description_x: A black man plays Uncle Tom in order to gain access to CIA training, then uses that knowledge to plot a new American Revolution.
An adaptation of a classic tale about a boy raised in jungle by animals.
After his mistress is savagely beaten up a Mafia leader goes after the killer with a bloody vengeance. Soon after the hunt begins, a gang war ensues.

Title_x: From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler
Description_x: Precocious Claudia and her brother run away from home and hide in the Metropolitan Museum in New York.
A police detective uncovers a sinister occult explanation behind the mysterious death of a heroin-addicted prostitute.

Title_x: Seven Deaths in the Cat's Eyes
Description_x: In a small Scottish village, horribly murdered bodies keep turning up. Suspicion falls upon the residents of a nearby castle that is haunted by a curse involving a killer cat.

Charley is a workaholic family man that finds out from an angel that his "number's up" and he will be dying soon so he tries to change his ways and be a better husband and father with the time he has left.
The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.
An amnesiac gunfighter, aided by a sympathetic outlaw, tries to discover his own identity and past.

Title_x: The Thief Who Came to Dinner
Description_x: A computer programmer decides to become a thief. And when he starts making waves an insurance investigator hounds him. He also meets a woman who becomes his accomplice.
Britt, deluxe call-girl, is punished by the brothel owner because she was not accomodating enough to a customer. From now on, she must obey to all customers sadistic wishes, or else.
A hitman finds himself embroiled in the middle of a Mafia war between the Sicilians and the Calabrians.
Loosely bases on Samuel Richardson's novel Pamela or Virtue Rewarded, this is the story of Pamela who goes to work in the kitchen of Lord Devenish who is determined to rape her.
A gang of wealthy ne'er do wells rape and terrorize women for fun and force their husbands to watch. A police detective tries to catch them, but can he break their twisted loyalty to one another?

During D-day several people become trapped while hiding in a bunker, when heavy shelling collapses it. They have plenty of food and water so they decide to wait for rescuers. And so they wait year, after year, after year.
A young British woman suffering from depression over the loss of her husband develops an unusual relationship with her chauffeur.
Two disillusioned New York City policemen plan a ten million dollar robbery to fuel their low pensions, only to run into one debacle after another in the process.
The shorted re-edited American version of Submersion of Japan, in which Japan slowly sinks into the sea as the US and Japan work together to stop it.
Based on the novel "The Ballad of the Belstone Fox", this heartwarming film chronicles the life of a fox much smarter than the dogs that hunt him. In fact, they never could catch him!

Title_x: Digby: The Biggest Dog in the World
Description_x: Digby consumes a bowl of Project X, a liquid growth formula. Soon, he becomes a sheepdog of gigantic size!
Teresa Numa in Nardecchia, motherless daughter of a heartless Lazio peasant, becomes a war widow and single mother constantly looking for new jobs--and often forced to steal in order to live.
A retired entertainer makes his living as a street musician on the streets of London. Two young children befriend the old musician, brightening his otherwise colorless life.

Based on Lermontov's novel Vadim, this costume drama, set in Russia during the 1700s, chronicles the battle between a vengeful, anarchic peasant and the tyrannical landowner who killed his mother and father.
Set in Ireland where the Catholic Church has been superseded by a repressive order with new ideas. When a group of Irish monks rebel, a Vatican official is sent to bring order once more.
A 1973 Bangladeshi film it describes the life of the fishermen on the bank of the Titas River in Brahmanbaria, Bangladesh.
A married couple of artists move to a utopian town known for its absolute freedom, but behind the surface perversion and violence are spreading.
Emil visit a country auction, help Lina pull out a tooth and raise his pig to do tricks.

Title_x: Elle court, elle court la banlieue

Description_x: Young Jim Hawkins, a pirate mouse named Hiccup, Dr. Livesey and Squire Trelawney hire a ship to find the legendary treasure of notorious late pirate Captain Flint. However, Flint's former crewmates plan to take over the ship.

The exiled settler Alexander Ilyin persuades the goldmines owner Trifon Perfilyev to sponsor the expedition dedicated to the searches of "Sannikov Land", a legendary warm land behind the Polar circle.

A story about an English businessman in 1930s Germany who encounters a financier who has forged his career on greed, corruption, and opportunism, rather than the traditional British principles of decency and fair play.
In the late-19th century, mule-driver Juan Moreira is a good gaucho and worker who, like many others, is subjected to abuse and humiliation by those in power: landowners of the police.
The story is about a rich spoiled girl who does not want to get married and hires a husband.

Title_x: Il tuo piacere è il mio
Description_x: In the 16th century a Tuscany nobleman gives a banquet in which immoral stories were told.
Four soldiers and a beautiful Greek nurse, thrown together in North Africa during World War II, team up to pull off a heist of two-million pounds in boxes marked "plasma."
Having escaped from prison, Ristack contacts his partner to organize an attack on a van full of gold.
Two waiters in Depression-era Arkansas get involved in the numbers racket.
Sailor is stranded on a desert island.
A film adaptation of the Ludwig Minkus ballet, completely re-orchestrated and with additional music by John Lanchbery.
The engineer Paul Holland proposes to his girlfriend Sybille shortly before a business trip, which she accepts. When Paul returns to Berlin, Sybille has disappeared without a trace.
Medical student Himoto Haruo makes no compromises in resolving issues with his mother, his authoritarian department boss, and his girlfriend's abusive employer.
Ruiz deconstructs, satirizes and politicizes a rich-boy/poor-girl romance bestseller which had been dubbed 'the Chilean "Love Story"'.
In 1930s, a doctor has an affair with the wife of a wealthy industrialist in Poland.

Title_x: I Could Never Have Sex with Any Man Who Has So Little Regard for My Husband
Description_x: In this sex farce, two middle-aged pairs of aspiring swingers rent a summer cottage in Martha's Vineyard. There they sit around discussing the pros and cons of having affairs.

Title_x: Une saison dans la vie d'Emmanuel
Description_x: A Season in the Life of Emmanuel, a newborn who witnesses the drastic changes a French family experiences in a brief period of time.
In Romania, the idealistic Istanbul teacher, Aliye, communicate activities to a town in Anatolia supporting the idea of National Struggle in the region.

A man who has been mutilated in boyhood encounters numerous difficulties because of it. His frustration at being unable to culminate his relationships with women eventually drives him to drastic actions.
Turin, late 19th century. The young Simone Celzani is hopelessly in love with the gym teacher Maria Pedani.

Beginning in 1943. year. The tragic story of the prisoners... partisans and others who were found in a prison in Montenegro at the time when the Chetniks and the occupiers at all costs they want to crush the uprising in Yugoslavia.

Frank Boyd comes to Hong Kong to visit a friend, but unfortunately he was murdered a few days ago. The father of his fiancee puts $ 10,000 reward for the capture of the murderer and Frank wants to earn this money.
Don Quixote is obsessed with knighthood and its honor codes. Together with his singular squire Sancho Panza, Don Quixote remembers the adventures they have shared.
The kid Anderssonskans Kalle is a menace to his surroundings and this time he uses nails, fireworks and sneezing powder.
Based on Nobel Prize-winner Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn's novel, this is the story of life as a political prisoner behind the walls of a Stalinist labor camp.

Title_x: Happy as the Grass Was Green
Description_x: A Mennonite boy is beaten to death at an unnamed NY university protesting the Vietnam War. His best friend and another college student, Eric Mills, attends his funeral in the Mennonite country in Pennsylvania.

Title_x: El amor tiene cara de mujer

Description_x: Henry is a young Englishman who decides to abandon the chaotic city life, but his journey into the Pacific Ocean ends with a shipwreck as a result of which he finds himself on a lost island.
A baron is blinded by an eagle when he withdraws from his children to a mountain retreat.Now without sight, he becomes more accommodating to them.
After committing a fraud in the company where he works, a man meets a strange character who will introduce you to a group a terrorist attack plot.

Widower Rainier has returned to his estate after WWI. His family wants him to marry Emily, his sister-in-law. Meanwhile Rolande a woman he met in Paris during the war persuades him to invest a lot of money in the 'Académie de Beauté'.
Our hero is Glista - a young Zagreb punk whose (sub)urban adventures depict his world and philosophy.
The complicated love affair of 2 women and 2 men.
Writer Veera Saar' s book Ukuaru based movie. Estonian womans drams in their life.

Lina is strong willed and self confident due to her life without a man on her farm. Still she longs for the man in her life, but have never seen the opportunity to live out her longing. But then Gilbert is back after 20 years in America.
In rural France, an undernourished and unloved young boy attempts suicide. Based on the classic by Jules Renard.
In 1948 Venezuela three children are born on the same day, all named Victorino were born.
Rascal Dik Trom gathers money for a poor and sick acquaintance. When this money gets stolen, Dik and his friends chase the thief.
A woman has got a sugar-daddy paying her bills, and while she's stringing him along, she meets somebody her own age that she truly falls in love. And it turns out he's the son of her rich dude.
A boy born in a poor village in Tokushima spends his days idly until a chance meeting sets him on the road to becoming boss of Japan's largest gang.

In 1956 a military civic coup against self-appointed Liberating Revolution fails, and in Jose Leon Suarez, Argentina, are killed several suspected to be part of the civil uprising. However survive seven people manage to tell the story.
The eccentric musical film tale of the amazing country where there live vegetables and fruit, and about adventures of the brave cheerful and naughty boy Chipollino from onions family.

Bullied Jotia throws heavy stone to an incredibly long distance and attracts the interest of the world records committee. But, the only motivation for wannabe record-holder is to be told swear-word again.

A young boy lives alone in a small room in a block of flats, with a phone ringing constantly, without anyone at the other end. He runs away, soon to follow everyone telling him to, until he gets involved in a search for a missing girl.

Jewish fighters and their non violent religious neighbors, deal with the Nazis in Poland. The Jewish fighters finally connect with the Polish underground, hopeful about joining them and receiving arms, but the Poles refuse to arm them.
An innocent Roja gets into trouble when she decides to help an irresponsible Ananth. However, the latter's stepbrother Vijay comes to her rescue.
A gay film director questions homosexuality in the contemporary world : is it the ultimate "solution" to love, and can it find its philosophical Greek roots back ?
Depicts the lives of children of the coastal hills and pastures who work as shepherds from an early age to earn a living.

Title_x: Mit der Liebe spielt man nicht...

Description_x: Determined to become a professional stage actor, ambitious Tadeusz takes entrance exams to an acting school. Even failure does not deter him from keeping on trying.
In order to become an actress, young woman tries many jobs, but in all those places she finds a man trying to have sex with her.

Title_x: Un amore così fragile, così violento

Description_x: The self-discovery and awakening of a young man, who has been exposed and fallen for the lucrative powers of wealth.
A journalist has to interview a blind photographer.

Title_x: O Detetive Bolacha Contra o Gênio do Crime

Description_x: A woman trapped in a marriage with aging husband she doesn't love, fatally falls in love with another man and gets pregnant.

Jan and Gertrud have a sexual relationship, even though they are half siblings. Jan is an air traffic controller, while Gertrude is writing a dissertation on ferns. Jan falls in love with another woman, Jenny.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
A recently-released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.
A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.
Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.
Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.
A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.
Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.
A lonely boy befriends Ben, the leader of a violent pack of killer rats.
Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

Billy Pilgrim has mysteriously become unstuck in time. He goes on an uncontrollable trip back and forth from his birth in New York to life on a distant planet and back again to the horrors of the 1945 fire-bombing of Dresden.
Gangster Joe Valachi is a marked man in the same joint where mob boss Don Vito Genovese is imprisoned and he's forced to co-operate with the DA in exchange for protection.
A series of gruesome accidents plague a small American farming community in the summer of 1935, encircling two identical twin brothers and their family.
A working-class young Englishman marries an affable American heiress, but their marital bliss is soon interrupted when they begin constructing a home on land alleged to be cursed.
A wealthy author's second wife begins to suspect that her 12 year old stepson may have murdered his mother, who mysteriously died in a bathtub accident.

Title_x: What Have You Done to Solange?
Description_x: A teacher who is having an affair with one of his students is reluctant to present an alibi when his lover witnesses the first in a series of murders connected to their school.
Two men, working as professional boxers, come to blows when their careers each begin to take opposite momentum.
A schizophrenic housewife kills off each of her terrorizing apparitions, unsure if these demons are merely figments of her imagination or part of reality.
A pair of miniskirted birds who travel to a remote castle in order to land a contract in the modeling agency of the mysterious lesbian Sybil Waite (In HD).
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.
Two New York City cops go after amateur crooks who are trying to rip off the Mafia and start a gang war.

The funny story of mad but kind and chivalrous elderly nobleman Don Quixote who, aided by his squire Sancho Panza, fights windmills that are seen as dragons to save prostitute Dulcinea who is seen as a noblewoman.
A group of experienced archeologists are searching for an old and mystic Phoenician treasure when they are surprised by a series of mysterious murders...
Newlywed Susan is haunted by visions of Mircalla Karnstein, a centuries-old bride who murdered her husband on their wedding night.
Police in Boston search for a mad bomber trying to extort money from the city.
Dortmunder and his pals plan to steal a huge diamond from a museum. But this turns out to be only the first time they have to steal it...

An idealistic rookie cop joins the L.A.P.D. to make ends meet while finishing law school, and is indoctrinated by a seasoned veteran. As time goes on, he loses his ambitions and family as police work becomes his entire life.
A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.
An upper-class Manhattan divorcee comes to believe that her brother is possessed by the spirit of a serial killer who beheaded young women in Spanish Harlem.
A Hollywood actress undergoes a psychic breakdown and recalls the traumatic events which led to her stay at a sanitarium.
A disturbed young girl starts believing that there is something very sinister at work after her estranged father visits her at her mother and grandmother's house with the woman he plans to marry.
Set in the 1920s, several foreigners held by a South American military group are offered possible freedom if they accept to topple a local crazed military leader.
Two roomates at a prep school in New England during World War II come to grips with the war, jealousy and betrayal. Based on a novel by John Knowles.
Klara and Viktoria are sisters. Their father dies, leaving most of his property to Klara. When Klara becomes involved with a man that her sister loves, Viktoria begins to plot her murder.
A husband and wife in a loveless marriage struggle to remain ignorant to their failed relationship.
The patriarch of a wealthy family fears that he will show up one day in vampire form. Should this happen, he warns his family to not let him back into his house, no matter how much he begs them.
The movie chronicles a young man's love and passion in his own kinky way.
A crazed Vietnam vet bomber hijacks a Boeing 707 in this disaster film filled with the usual early '70s stereotypes, and demands to be taken to Russia.

The venomous and amoral wife of a wealthy architect tries, any way she can, to break up the blossoming romance between her husband and his new mistress; a good-natured young widow who holds a dark past.
A former gangster is forced to resume his old lifestyle when his violent, jealous ex-colleagues and the police believe that he knows the location of a stolen cache of $300,000.
Broke and in debt, an otherwise honest cowboy gets mixed up in some shady dealings with a crooked rancher.
A bored housewife takes refuge in a fantasy world.

Title_x: The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick
Description_x: A goalkeeper Josef Bloch is ejected during a game for foul play. He leaves the field and goes to spend the night with a cinema cashier.
Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.
Justine is a poor serving girl who tries to maintain her virtue and her standards. Unfortunately, she is victimized by everyone she encounters.
A man is in radio contact with his family when their airplane is shot down. He wants those responsible and becomes a criminal to get a job as deep sea diver with those salvaging the plane's cargo.
Liza slowly replaces Melampo, Giorgio's dog. While she accepts it, Giorgio forces her to wear collars and leashes.
A kidnapped diver is taken to an island inhabited by a mad scientist and his half-animal, half-human creations.

Imprisoned Harry Lomart is a vicious, brute of a man and yet he is prepared to do his long jail term as he is confident that on his release his beautiful wife Pat will be waiting for him, but a visit from Pat brings him his worst nightmare.
A crook on the run hooks up with a criminal gang to commit a kidnapping. However, things don't go quite as planned.
Thalmus is the leader for a group of criminals who gather in L.A. to rob a bank. Their goal is to find a new bank.

Bob Hope is a stressed out talk show host who is sent on a vacation to Arizona on doctor's orders and has to play Sherlock Holmes with his wife, the lovely Eva Marie Saint, to solve a series of murders that has Bob as the prime suspect.
A lawyer whose brother was murdered winds up getting involved with gangsters and the world of porno movies.

Adopted by his rich uncle from Germany, British teenager Frank falls in-love with his uncle's Italian wife Martha, and has conflicting feelings when she suggests he should kill his uncle in order to have her and the family fortune.
A 20-something son of a military officer feels like a woman trapped in a man's body. When he can't hide it anymore he has a fallout with his ladies man father and leaves home. Now what?
A list of agents and collaborators, hidden by the Nazis in an Austrian lake in 1945, is sought after by various interested parties during the Cold War.
A house dog is abducted and brought to the north as a sled dog.
At a Boston hospital, Dr. Carey becomes an amateur sleuth to help clear a colleague who's accused of botching an illegal abortion that kills a 15 year old girl.

Title_x: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
Description_x: A cocky Harvard graduate transports a load of marijuana from Berkeley to Boston. His girlfriend gets busted with the second load. He and a friend go against a dirty cop and a Cuban gangster to get the load and the girl back.
Tells the story of the 108 Heroes who stood up against a corrupt government. Each hero has his own unique fighting skill, but they are all willing to die to uphold justice.

Title_x: The Adult Version of Jekyll & Hide
Description_x: A crazed doctor, who has already murdered a man, finds Dr. Jekyll's diary and mixes up Jekyll's formula. He mixes up a batch of the potion, turns into the Jekyll monster and begins to stalk, rape and murder women.
Deserting soldier dresses as a woman to escape detection; liking the female role he goes to a dance with another soldier and is exposed.
A man having marital problems with his shrewish wife picks up a young, pretty and pregnant hitchhiker. Before he knows it, he's in over his head and mixed up in violence and murder.
Horror remake of "Dr. Jekyll And Mr. Hyde".
A government investigator tries to find out the truth behind the break-in at a top secret research facility.

A writer and his assistant are working on a biblical story about Pontius Pilate who convicted Jesus of Nazereth, while the Satan (here called Woland) and his lieutenants are harassing the writer duo in various ways.
A young, rebellious Ute Indian joins the rodeo circuit and falls in with a drunken mentor who teaches him the ways of the ring and the world.
A corrupt hospital administrator decides to get as much money as possible from the patients by any means necessary - lie, cheat or steal.
Two Phildelphia con men try to evade gangsters they have conned and cops who are trying to put them in jail.

An African-American senator becomes the designated survivor of a tragic accident that kills the President of the United States. Now the first black President, he attempts to end the bigotry and divide standing in his way.

Title_x: Under the Flag of the Rising Sun
Description_x: One woman's search to find the truth about her husband's death in World War II.
Ambrosio is a monk who is sexually tempted by an emissary of the Devil, a young girl in monk's robes.
The story of a young Indian who embarks upon a journey to find the meaning of existence. Based on the novel by Hermann Hesse.
The circumstances that lead to the origination of the first American Bred Horse, the Morgan Horse.
The story is set in the Middle Ages. The youngsters Folcacchio and Guffardo must bring an embassy to the Bishop of Volterra, and during the trip, the two boys meet the beautiful Gemmata.

For a special mission to destroy drug dealers in Nice, hardcore bachelor inspector Campana has to don the role of a married man with a child. He adjusts himself well but will have to fight a lot before being able to achieve final victory.
A Russian spy penetrates into the U.S. Embassy in Beirut, Lebanon to try to kill a Soviet defector under asylum there.

Title_x: What Became of Jack and Jill?
Description_x: In order to collect inheritance money, a slacker tries to induce a heart attack in his invalid grandmother by convincing her that she's become the target of youth supremacists who want to enact a genocide on the elderly.

When an undergraduate commits suicide, his best friend Tom Betancourt is sent down from university because he did nothing to prevent the death, which he felt was a choice his friend had a right to make.
A traveling salesman gives a pretty hitchhiker a ride home, who then injures him to keep him captured in her run-down shack.
A London slasher pack the suitcases of his victims before stabbing them to death in this adaptation of Edgar Wallace's 'Secret of the Black Suitcases.'
An adventurous couple of hitchhikers decides to accept every ride that is offered to them. no matter how odd the driver might be. They'll get more than they bargained for.

Title_x: Don Camillo e i giovani d'oggi

Description_x: A group of young people - Enzo and Leila (formerly a porn hero and unsuccessful singer) and Eddy and Tea (struggling with an unwanted pregnancy) - take refuge in the home of Renato, a suicidal musician.

The story of Paulo Honório, a poor kid who becomes a rich farmer. Obsessed by his desire to get even richer, he doesn't pay much attention to his wife, Madalena, a teacher who reacts against his tyrannical ways.
A young woman, Louise, is a lecturer in a provincial town where she meets an Italian immigrant. The film retraces their relationship.
Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.
Based on the book of the same name, Maria by Colombian writer Jorge Isaac's, is a tragic love story. The movie reflects a lot of the beautiful prose found in the book.
The endless search for pleasure and love by African men and women.

Title_x: Then I Sentenced Them All to Death
Description_x: In order to avoid reprisals from the Wehrmacht for the murder of a soldier, intellectuals from a Romanian village try to convince Ipu, the village idiot, to take the blame for the murder and save everybody.

The owner of a circus decides to swap his trained bears for trained pigs, and fires clown Cibulka. The clown gets a job at a local school, bears escape and seek him out and a school inspector comes into town.
A young woman undergoes psychiatric treatment after she no longer hears music and develops sexual hang-ups.
Shinobugawa depicts the emerging love of a student, identified only as "I", for a young waitress named Shino.

As the Revolution against the tyrannical Ottoman Empire rages on, the Souliotes fight tooth and nail to stand their ground. But, disgraceful treason will bring Ali Pasha and his multitudes of soldiers at the gates. Do heroes fear death?
Federico is married to Giovanna, a rich and attractive woman who has guaranteed him an excellent social position. His father Giuseppe, on the other hand, was an anti-fascist and works as a craftsman.

A large family and it's many generations vie for advantage, seeking to win the inheritance sure to be left behind by a wealthy older man of the clan. Along the way, stories of friendship, love and rivalry emerge.

Title_x: John, the Knife and the River
Description_x: An older man consumed by jealousy over his much younger wife decides to venture into the jungle in search of riches without her. When he returns 4 years later, he finds that his mistrust in her may have been well-founded.
The amorous and warlike adventures of Franz, a young hussar officer, at the beginning of the First World War.
The story teller Cecco Angiolieri manages to conquer women with his tricks.
This is the tale of an angry young man with flavours of Teacher-student relationship, the stubbornness of Ramachari(protagonist) and his attempts at having a romantic relationship.
A married couple of rich and depressed noblemen destroy the lives of their servants out of spite.
Young Jim Hawkins is torn between his loyalty to his benefactors and his affection for lovable rogue Long John Silver in their struggle to recover a buried pirate treasure.
Two children are trapped in the tower of a church during a flood. Local fishermen attempt to rescue them.

Title_x: Der Stoff aus dem die Träume sind

Description_x: The story tells of the adoration of Sasuke for his mistress, the blind Shamisen teacher Shunkin, who treats him imperiously and subjects him to cruel beatings.
The story of Karaoglan, who first found out the treasure that Genghis Khan had left before his death, took revenge for his murdered mother.

In 1880's Italy, young Paulina must join a monastery to escape a doomed relationship with a married count. However, neither she, nor the count can just move on and all elements for a tragedy are there.
A 16-year-old girl grows into maturity while hiking the 88-temple pilgrimage around Shikoku.
Ali gets out from prison more recently. He needs money to go to Germany. Therefore, he accepts the offer to kill a businessman. When he completes mission there is a huge trickery: money is fake.

Title_x: Come fu che Masuccio Salernitano, fuggendo con le brache in mano, riuscì a conservarlo sano
Description_x: The main characters are two ruffians in various disguises as false priests.
Epic about Cossacks in the Siberian province of Dauria. Cossacks are living in their village like one big family under the guidance of a strong leader - Ataman.
An old lady is far from suspecting everything that is going on behind her back, in particular what her servants are up to.

In the early 70s in the quiet calm of the Welsh foothills, Danny Jones reaches the age of 17 with a desire to break away from the strict influence of his father, encouraged by his girlfriend who shakes up his small world for the better.
Thia and Murelli, who live from car stunt shows, make ends meet by carrying out small burglaries.

Ture is born Sture but due to a speech problem, he has changed his name, but is still, in his own eyes, Scandinavias' best private dick. Still he rarely has any cases to solve, but has some rather strange clients.
The (french-)canadian first-rate spy have to fight with a chinese woman spy working for the nazis and in love with him.
A young student takes part in the resistance, is arrested by the Germans and with his confessions tries to deceive them and guide them to wrong decisions.

Henrik used to spend summers on Svanegården as kid. He's back on his own airplane after working in Australia, to meet cute Lisbeth and just in time to help save his vacation "dad's" farm from an evil criminal.

Title_x: Und der Regen verwischt jede Spur

Description_x: The story of Hadjis, a former professor of philosophy, who came to live in the midst of a poor community in the Tunisian suburbs, far from Western civilization.
A woman who has been traumatized by her brother's accidental death from electrocution in the subways of Buenos Aires learns to readjust.
It is loosely based on the novel Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck and is the story of Topoli a young retarded guy who lives by his nephew Essi and their life.
A story of a young singer Zhenya Prokhorov, a soloist of the Moscow boys chorus, losing voice and becoming a composer.
Dangerous spies act as representatives of an international recording company to get important plans from the father of an aspiring composer.
This is a film about two irreconcilable outlooks on the world, about the need for political struggle in the cause of humanism and social progress.
A father says that whoever wants to marry his daughter must first beat his daughter in a fight.

Title_x: Der Mann, der nach der Oma kam
Description_x: After grandma remarries and moves out, the overworked Piesold family hires domestic helper Erwin to take care of children and household. But is a man up to the job?

Title_x: I Know You Are a Murderer...

Description_x: Stelios travels to Stockholm from Greece. He lives with a relative in an abandoned house with several other Greeks. At first he distributes newspapers, but Stelios quickly gets a job at a restaurant.
Dürrin Arbel is a famous actress and there are many men who fall in love with her.
The happiness of a woman who marries her ex-husband's uncle will not last long.
In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.
A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.
A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.
While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.
In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.
A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.
When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.
Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.
While imprisoned in a Confederate girls' boarding school, an injured Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.
A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.
Biological war has decimated life on Earth. Los Angeles is a windswept ghost town where Robert Neville tools his convertible through sunlit streets foraging for supplies.
A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.
After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.
An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.
A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.
A social misfit uses his only friends, his pet rats, to exact revenge on his tormentors.
An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".
Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

Hoping for positive publicity, a tobacco company offers $25 million to any American town that quits smoking for 30 days. Amidst a media frenzy, Eagle Rock, Iowa accepts the challenge while the company's PR man tries to sabotage the effort.

During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Title_x: Pretty Maids All in a Row
Description_x: California State Police Captain Sam Surcher investigates a string of teenage girl murders at Oceanfront High School.
An archaeological expedition brings back to London the coffin of an Egyptian queen known for her magical powers. Her spirit returns in the form of a young girl and strange things start to happen.
A Victorian scientist tests a serum that transforms him into a sensuous murderess.
Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

What happened to the women at 10 Rillington Place? The story of British serial killer John Christie, who committed most or all of his crimes in the titular terraced house, and the miscarriage of justice involving Timothy Evans.
After Duke Anderson is released from prison after ten years for taking the rap for a scion of a Mafia family, he cashes in a debt of honor with the mob to bankroll a caper.
An old, dying satanist arranges to transfer his soul into the body of a young concert pianist.
A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.
An outlaw tries to avoid interference as he journeys to Mexico to pull off a $2,000,000 gold robbery.
In a vein similar to the James Bond movies, British Agent Philip Calvert (Sir Anthony Hopkins) is on a mission to determine the whereabouts of a ship that disappeared near the coast of Scotland.
A Mexican-American sheriff must resort to violence against a powerful rancher in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

In eighteenth century Scotland, during the Jacobite Rebellion, David Balfour claims his inheritance from his uncle who has him shanghaied on a ship where David meets fugitive Jacobite rebel Alan Breck.
A journalist finds himself on the trail of a murderer who's been targeting people around him, while the police are considering him a suspect in their investigation.
During the Thirty Years' War of 1600s, a band of Protestant mercenaries peacefully coexist with German Catholic villagers in a hidden idyllic mountain valley untouched by war.
A former bank robber searches for his double-crossing partner who left him for dead, while having to look after an six-year-old girl.
A lone survivor from a British naval ship is obsessed with getting revenge on a German U-boat crew that massacred his shipmates in the water.

In 1935, after forty years in a West Virginia prison, three released convicts wish to open a legitimate business using the $25,000 earned in prison, but a crooked prison guard in cahoots with the town banker plans to defraud them.
In 1970s Athens a group of professional burglars plan an emerald heist from the home of a gem collector but the corrupt Greek police inspector Abel Zacharia is on their trail.
The star player of a college basketball team starts to go off the rails with an illicit love affair and his roommate going crazy to avoid the war draft.
In 1970s London, Scotland Yard orchestrates the downfall of mob boss Vic Dakin after he crosses the line by blackmailing Members of Parliament.
Dyanne Thorne stars as the fairy godmother in this innocently-sleazy take on the story of Pinocchio.
An ambitious TV newscaster has an affair with the wife of a network executive to get a promotion.
Blanche is the young, pure, beautiful wife of the Master of the castle, in a secluded land. Every man is in love with her, including the King and his servant Bartolomeo, visiting the Master.
A young sailor finds himself trapped in the labyrinthine mansion of his occultist uncle, along with a number of eccentric and mysterious relatives who all seem to be harboring a dark secret.
A group of social misfits at a summer camp for boys run away to save penned-in buffaloes from a rifle club's slaughter.
A neurosurgeon with a cheating wife takes an amnesiac into his home and conditions him to believe that the cheating wife is his own and to take the "appropriate" action.
Private detective takes on a case and gets mixed up in murder, sex and blackmail.
Piano teacher Peter Ilych Tchaikovsky struggles against his homosexuality by marrying, but unfortunately he chooses a nymphomaniac whom he cannot satisfy.

Title_x: The Light at the Edge of the World
Description_x: A ruthless pirate captures the keeper of a lighthouse, in the most southern city in Argentina. His goal is obvious and horrific. He plans to control the lighthouses signals in a way that the passing ships will be crushed on the rocks.

Title_x: The Gang That Couldn't Shoot Straight
Description_x: This is the funny story about two warring Mafia gangs in New York City. The weaker gang uses a lion to blackmail the opposite gang's "clients". The police succeed in stopping one of the gangs, while the other remains without the boss.
In Amsterdam, two prostitutes make a choice between love and work.
Following the May 1968 civil unrest in France, a deaf-mute and a con artist simultaneously stumble upon the remnants of a secret society.
The story of a small and conservative West-Flemish village opposing the construction of a bridge over the Scheldt.
A detective decides to go undercover and set up a group of robbers, but he may be getting too caught up in the task at hand.
A mineral is discovered which can turn metal to gold or humans into zombies. When the mineral is stolen, secret agents are sent in to get the mineral back!
Drama depicting rural life in contemporary Afghanistan and the Afghani people's love for an ancient traditional sport similar to horseback polo.
A doctor investigates the murders of several women at a lakeside resort. His investigation leads him to believe that a vampire is responsible for the murders. He sets out to track the vampire down.
Two gentlemen of fortune from the times of Imperial Russia are looking for an uncountable treasure at the dawn of the Soviet Union age.
Two gunfighters separate and experience surreal visions on their journey through the west.
Phil, a 17-year-old cocky high school student thinks nothing of using the people around him to satisfy his self-centered needs, until someone in his life gets pregnant.
The dreary existence of middle-aged spinster Maura Prince takes an unexpected turn with the arrival of young handyman Billy Jarvis, but there is more to Billy than meets the eye.

Title_x: The Marriage of a Young Stockbroker
Description_x: A stock-broker is stuck in a dreary job and a marriage that's become a dull routine. To cope with the boredom and frustration, he resorts to voyeurism and extramarital love affairs.
A Native American born US Army officer, Captain Apache, investigating a murder, uncovers a presidential assassination plot.

Dysfunctional marriages of several unhappy rich doctors who work at a private clinic and their neglected wives who deal with their own unhappiness in various ways enter crisis mode when one of them murders his cheating wife.

An 8 y.o. Swedish boy always gets into trouble despite good intentions and afterwards ends locked up in a shed. He lives on a farm (before electricity and cars) with his mom, dad, sister, maid, best friend the farmhand and an old woman.
The wife of a political prisoner tends to her mother-in-law and keeps from the old woman the truth about her son, whom she believes is in New York making a film.
A fairly faithful adaptation of Carlo Collodi's classic novel about an animated puppet that desires to become a real boy.

Marriage of a midlife, middle-class, childless couple is in a rut. Sophie has become depressed, frigid and slightly paranoid and Otto is stuck in optimistic denial. Things escalate at their summer cottage, but no one dares call it quits.

A widowed New Jerseyan woman volunteers for spy duty at the CIA, being in her own opinion, expendable now that the children are grown, and is assigned to pick up a book in Mexico City, while finding out that it is easier said than done.
Two wealthy, independent young people meet in Venice and fall in love; their affair takes a tragic turn as the young woman becomes hooked on heroin.
A small-time criminal wants to give up his life of crime. He performs a robbery with a friend, with similar feelings, and things go sour.

In 1905, Polish horse thieves living near the Russian border find their livelihoods threatened by the new Russo-Japanese conflict because the Russian army requisitions all horses and forcibly conscripts all men for the war.

Two daughters of a sexually liberated countess, a mother and daughter who've befriended them after a car accident and live with them, and a S&M-prone daughter of their butch neighbor all fall for the same men - a doctor and a local boy.
Niklas, 9, lives with his parents and his grandfather in the country in a yellow house. He longs for a dog and this summer, father, mother and grandfather has decided to get him one.
Two Jesuit priests encounter persecution when they travel to Japan in the 17th century to spread Christianity and to locate their mentor.
John, an escaped convict, takes refuge on the farm of Widow Couderc. He becomes the older woman's lover and admits that he's on the run. The widow's in-laws, who despise her,
A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.
This is the story of Okonkwo, an Ibo man who lives in the village of Umoufia, in Nigeria. It shows the traditions and culture of the Ibo people, while also telling Okonkwo's story.

Title_x: Been Down So Long It Looks Like Up to Me
Description_x: Free-thinking student tries to put up with life at a straight-laced college in 1958.
Sheila, an affluent black teenager, begins dating working class white teen Wayne, and asks him for help to sell a kilo of marijuana.
Set in the 1880's, a rich young man from the middle class falls in love with the daughter of a local count and sets in motion a series of conflicts with the aristocrats of Zante.
Andrej (Kirk Douglas), a smuggler of microfilmed Russian manuscripts, uses the luggage of unsuspecting travellers to transport the contraband out of the country.
A crotchety old ranch owner fights to be able to live his life the way he wants to, and not the way other people--and the law--tell him he has to.
A young hockey player becomes an overnight star of the Toronto Maple Leafs and falls in love with a beautiful young singer. Their relationship is plagued by his "jock" nature and decadent lifestyle.
The new groundskeeper at the Centennial Sporting Club decides to do something about the very odd goings-on there.
Chatterji is an ambitious and self-made young man who becomes the director of the company he works for.
A man commits a series of murders due to his dual personalities and his zodiac birth sign.
A man is shot in an underground car-park by a mysterious bearded man. As he dies he recollects the events that led him to this situation, including adulterous liaisons and jealous envy.
Nathalie Silvener, a married woman, falls for Gilles, a depressed and brilliant Parisian journalist who is already in a relationship with a model.
A womanizing biologist studies life in a colony of penguins.
While fleeing across the Irish countryside, two orphans are pursued by their villainous uncle, a master of disguises.
A tricotage worker Nese who becomes very popular singer and Anatolian woman, Fatma. The story of them and their daughters.

Title_x: Goya - oder Der arge Weg der Erkenntnis

Description_x: Set against the backdrop of the 1967 Six-Day War, the movie adaptation of Naguib Mahfouz's novel follows the escapist, drug-fuelled riverboat meetings of a group of frustrated Egyptians from various walks of life.
A young girl meet a young guy that want to be a gangster. They fall in love and you follows his minds struggle what to do.
A boy keeps his spiritedness and optimism in spite of polio.
Sagamore lives in the countryside on a farm where he secretly distills whiskey. A young stranger and her companion who is a gangster come to disturb their peace.

Title_x: Kommissar X jagt die roten Tiger

Description_x: In the midst of the Cuban missile crisis, a mild-mannered professor decides to live out all of his daydreams, travelling across the country and adopting a different persona in each city.

When his top client, popular singer Rex Maynard, runs away to South Africa with his daughter, powerful producer, Arnold Tiller, stages Maynard's fake kidnapping out of revenge. Maynard escapes only to be pursued by actual kidnappers.
In 1945 Hiroshima an American Quaker tries to introduce a black singing duo into the all-white quarters of an officer's club, with farcical results.
Two men disappear at the same time, one of them commits suicide with dynamite. The police try to figure out who it was and what happened to the other.

Title_x: Le drapeau noir flotte sur la marmite
Le cri du cormoran, le soir au-dessus des jonques
Description_x: Alfred Mullanet, an unlucky player who lives on his wife's income, becomes in a few moments the object of interest of two thugs, Kruger and Mister K.

Group of men fishing in the icy Baltic sea find themselves trapped when the ice breaks away carrying them with it. As the ice breaks into smaller and smaller pieces the behavior of the men gets more desperate and class driven.
Young girl Vanina and her friend, Juliette go to Sardinia on vacation. Arriving there, she attracts the attention of a young village man.

Title_x: Little Ayse and the Magic Dwarfs in the Land of Dreams

Description_x: Turkish Pollyanna's story.
A gang holds up a tax shipment of gold. That night, when celebrating, Farley steals the gold, but is found dead the next morning.

Nina lives with her family in a superb property in the French region of Landes. She loves her cousin Jean who is overprotected by his possessive mother, Eva. There is war and, after the French defeat, Jean wants to join London.
Mario is a millionaire who is diagnosed with a deadly disease. His doctor advises him to commit suicide, what Mario doesn't know is that the doctor is planning to kill him.
A policeman invents a Machiavellian plan to force a criminal to confess his misdeeds.
A group of young people gathered on the countryside to celebrate midsummer. On the journey home the car some of the youngsters are traveling in collides with a bus.
A group of kids compete with a team of bumbling pirates to find buried treasure.
An amoral, hypocritical worker with Communist leanings learns the consequences of his callousness and redeems himself.
After his imprisonment during the Great War, a young soldier returns to Vienna only to realize that everything has changed.

A young hapless couple's devotion for each other is tested through harsh times of war as they are forced to negate patriotism and dependability to their families and nations, for a length of a lifetime before during and after the war.
After Wilhelm Ebbs promotes to a cruise captain his longed for dream turns into a nightmare.
In an island town, a professor pensioned before his time, together with his wife, takes care of the hundred year old Maddona Makantuna, a dispossessed land owner.

Title_x: On est toujours trop bon avec les femmes
Nyama nishto po-hubavo ot loshoto vreme

Description_x: Decades after the murder of his wife, a lonesome composer receives a letter from a boarding schoolmistress requesting a family home for an orphan girl who queerly turns an identical reminiscence of his late wife when she's grown up.
Psychiatrist takes young man to castle owned by strange woman, where the latter discovers he's the incarnation of a dead man.

Title_x: The Song of the Blood-Red Flower
Description_x: A glib log driver, Olavi, keeps sowing his wild oats. When the time comes for him to settle down he finds it difficult to trust anyone in view of his fickle past.
Paul lives in Africa. He leads an honest and calm existence. Until the day when he found his friend Frankovich dead.
Some events take place in a small hamlet of the mountains of Asturias, following the arrival of Abel, a young doctor, shortly before the outbreak of the Spanish Civil War.
Trials and tribulations of a woman in prewar Yugoslavia who after being seduced by a rich man, marries a poor one and struggles on. Based on a novel by Ivan Cankar.

Lale is the young governess of Gül, daughter of the famous composer Emin. The girls get along very well, while the father Emin shows emotional interest in Lale. But Gül is suffering from a mysterious illness.
A study of the political and religious fanaticism in Malta in the 60s.
In a small town in the State of Minas Gerais, Brazil, a woman rebels against local morality after her child dies, with tragic results.
Love test for two students in USSR's Moscow: 23-year old ambitious straightforward builder Alexei, and 20-year old Zhenya, the daughter of prosperous parents that already have a fiance for her.
Fearless bohemian enters quiet city and wins the hearts of women and admiration of men while causing many conflicts.
On moving to a new flat in London Ben meets neighborhood kids Lil and Thomas. But when they uncover a plot to kidnap Thomas the three decide to run away instead.
A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.
An extremely honest forest ranger fights for the trust to the very end.
Under an oppressive sun on the Xingu River, in the Brazilian Amazon, Frei Abóbora, feverish and delirious, recalls events from his life.
A poor and beautiful young woman living in the backwoods of the State of Minas Gerais, Brazil, is protected by a peasant.

August 24, 1937: a day in the life of expressionist sculptor/author Ernst Barlach.He lives in the small town of Güstrow, keeping to himself, not interested in politics. This day he learns that his sculptor in the Cathedral is gone.
Undercover agent working for the State Security infiltrates the guerrilla fighters, who continue the struggle against communist authorities after the end of the war.

In Sandemose's psychological drama, Audun Hamre is a respectable tar trader to the public eye. Behind the scenes he earns his living from deceiving women who wants to marry, stealing their fortune and committing crimes even more severe.

Depicts the ensuing discussion of world reform, revolution, pacifism and society on the spot. This engaging and well-argumented manifesto - a philosophical battle of words which deals mercilessly with modern consumer society.
The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.
A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.
A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.
A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

Title_x: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
Description_x: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder that is connected to an ongoing killing spree in the city, and despite himself and his girlfriend being targeted by the killer, he conducts his own investigation.
Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.
