Title_x: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
Description_x: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.
After undergoing gender reassignment surgery, an aspiring actress travels to Hollywood, where she also wants to make a claim on her wealthy uncle's estate.
The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.
A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.
After a cavalry patrol is ambushed by the Cheyenne, the two survivors, a soldier and a woman, must reach the safety of the nearest fort.
After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

Count Dracula, a gray-haired vampire who regains his youth by dining on the blood of maidens, is pursued in London and Transylvania by Professor Van Helsing, Jonathan Harker and Quincey Morris after he victimizes them and their loved ones.
A housewife with an abusive husband has an affair with a writer.
A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.
Shortly after her mother's death, an innocent and youthful woman will find refuge into the household of her middle-aged aristocratic guardian, who will submit her to his sexual advances.
Scientist Victor Frankenstein builds a man from spare body parts; the monster comes alive and wreaks havoc.
In 1920s Soviet Russia, a fallen aristocrat, a priest and a con artist search for a treasure of jewels hidden inside one of twelve dining chairs, lost during the revolution.

A wealthy, fatherless British clan kidnaps bums and hippies and forces them to participate in an elaborate role-playing game in which they are the perfect family; those who refuse or attempt escape are ritualistically murdered.
A Vietnam veteran returns to his Texas home but feels restless and decides to become a radio singer. Based on the novel by Charles Portis.
With his wife and daughter being held hostage, a seasoned ex-military man is involved in a shady smuggling operation to save his family.

Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

An environmental catastrophe destroys civilization. Led by father John and mother Ann, the Custance clan sets out on a quest for safety in a savage world that may just end up turning them into the very thing they are fleeing.
Hal Ashby makes his directing debut with this acclaimed social satire starring Beau Bridges as a wealthy young man who leaves his family's estate in Long Island to pursue love in a Brooklyn ghetto.

Henry Tawes, a middle-aged sheriff in a rural Tennessee town, is usually the first man to criticize others for their bad behavior. Miserable in his marriage, Henry falls in love with teenage Alma, who is the daughter of local criminal.
A highway engineer is involved in a car crash, after which, near death, he remembers his life leading up to the accident.
A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.
When an attorney meets the girl of his dreams, he fears that his batty mother will scare her off, so he schemes to eliminate the senile old woman.
During the Cold War a Naval Intelligence officer endowed with a powerful photographic memory is transferred to the CIA to participate in a covert operation in Moscow.
Two Harlem cops investigate a robbery, believing that a reverend has staged it in order to steal the money he's collected for a local fundraiser.
Various tales in the lives of Tokyo slum dwellers, including a mentally deficient young man obsessed with driving his own commuter trolley.
A radio station in the Deep South becomes the focal point of a right-wing conspiracy.
An aging cowboy realizes that the West he knew and loved will soon be no more--and that there will be no room for him, either.

Title_x: The Lady in the Car with Glasses and a Gun
Description_x: A secretary takes her boss's car for the holiday in the Mediterranean, oddly retracing a journey she has not taken, and is recognized by people she has not met before. Soon, things get serious.
A Vietnam vet and former social radical is conflicted by his desire to become a teacher and his sympathy with anti-establishment student protests.
The story of the Finzi-Continis, a noble family of Ferrara, during the Jewish persecution in Italy's 1930s.
A very popular movie on the medieval persecution of witches (inquisition).
Doomed lovers Catherine and Heathcliff are torn apart by their own selfishness and hate.
From the John le Carré novel about a British spy, who sends a Polish defector to East Germany, to verify missile sites.
Long before faith-based films became a regular feature of mainstream movie theaters, there was The Cross and The Switchblade. The story of Pastor David Wilkerson and gang member, Nicki Cruz.
With the help of her friends Tommy and Annika, Pippi Longstocking ventures to the South Pacific island Porto Piluse to rescue her father, who was captured by ruthless pirates.
The missing-link is found on a safari in New Guinea. Is it human or animal?

Captain Whip returns to Hawaii. He's inherited "worthless" land. He starts a plantation, staffed with a Chinese couple from his ship. Drilling thru lava for water and stealing/smuggling pineapple from French Guyana, things look brighter.
The film depicts the adventures of expatriate American writer Henry Miller and his friends, as they pursue art, money, food, and sex in Paris.

A young woman's odyssey from innocence to decadence. Hopeful for a career in show business, Christine Adams leaves British Columbia with her boyfriend at age 19. But a detour to Las Vegas leads her into a life that no one would envy.
An apolitical college student joins a group of campus protesters to meet girls but gets swept up in their cause and involved in a violent confrontation with police.
As strikes upset Italy, the Califfa's husband is killed and she becomes a passionate militant of the strikers. She opposes the factory manager Doverdo who used to be himself a worker.

Professional beach bum and 'knight errant' Travis McGee goes up against psychotic body-builder Terry Bartell. McGee pulls out all the stops when he joins a Carribean cruise to bring the killer to justice.
Barnero is a bitter cop working in a city he considers rotten.
Fed up with their strict parents, Tommy and Annika run away from home, with their friend Pippi Longstocking to look after them in their long trek.
Dirty Dingus Magee and his old rival Hoke Birdsill take turns at being either lawman or outlaw and being rivals or partners in crime, depending of the circumstances.

Title_x: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
Description_x: The story of three wildly neurotic characters: A facially disfigured girl, a homosexual paraplegic and an introvert epileptic who, after leaving the hospital, set up housekeeping together in a cottage where they support each other.
Two escapees are on the run in the wilderness of an unspecified country. Wherever they go, they are followed by a menacing black helicopter.
A businessman blackmails his attractive young secretary into spending a weekend with him. Though he's a creep throughout, he gradually emerges as a sympathetic character.
A couple's honeymoon trip aboard a yacht leads to a claustrophobic drama when another vessel runs into their voyage, apparently drifting.

Title_x: The Magic Garden of Stanley Sweetheart

Description_x: A young playwright who writes porno novels to overcome writer's block, lives the fantasies of one of his books while trying to move with his wife into a larger apartment.
A federal agent attempts to make some real money before the alcohol ban is lifted so he sets his sights on the whiskey cache of an old army buddy.

Four marathon runners (one from England, one from the U.S., a Czechoslovakian, and an Australian Aborigine) prepare to run in the Olympic games. The film follows each one and shows what their motivations are for running in the games.
During WW2, German POWs in Britain plot to escape from their prison camp in Scotland.

A crude man is stuck in a loveless marriage. One day he decides to run away from his life and family. First he finds a mistress, but just because a man runs away from one disappointment, doesn't mean he won't run into another one.

A group of Calcutta city slickers, including the well-off Asim (Soumitra Chatterjee), the meek Sanjoy (Subhendu Chatterjee) and the brutish Hari (Samit Bhanja), head out for a weekend in the wilderness.
In 1970s Iran, a motley group of international thieves saves an Iranian village from murderous local bandits.
A married theatre lighting technician with two small children has an affair with a teenage actress.

Title_x: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich

Description_x: Josefine is a young streetwalker in Vienna at the turn of the 20th century. She manages to sleep her way to the top by marrying a British aristocrat, and she delights in telling ribald stories of her sordid past to moralistic prudes.

Title_x: A Walk in the Spring Rain
Description_x: The Merediths move to an isolated farm. Mrs. Meredith and the neighbour Will Cade become friends and anticipate becoming lovers.
On the Italian/Austrian front during World War I, a disastrous Italian attack upon the Austrian positions leads to a mutiny among the Italian troops.
A witch's daughter take revenge on a vicar and bewitches him so that he suffers constant erection.
Reformed drug addict Tim Brett (David Hemmings) is vacationing in Italy with his aunt. When she is murdered, he tries to investigate, and soon his whole life is out of control.

In this romantic comedy/drama, George Segal stars as a freelance artist who's attempting to revitalize his career just as his marriage to Eva Marie Saint begins to fall apart. Co-starring David Doyle, Sterling Hayden and Kennan Wynn.

A young college graduate is struggling to find a job. He lives in a flat with his younger, employed sister, revolutionary brother and widowed mother. The strain of the situation ultimately causes him to hallucinate.

The story, adapted from a novella by D.H. Lawrence, tells how the daughter of a staid Rector in the north of England, rebels against her family by having a relationship with a gypsy, and how "the voice of the water" triumphs in the end.
A man who has been in a coma since infancy is awakened.
A runaway bride promises her dying widowed friend that she will assume her identity and look after her infant child.
A scientist becomes invisible after he swallows an Indian potion.

Title_x: The Sidelong Glances of a Pigeon Kicker

Description_x: Controversial tragicomedy about a brother's obsessive love for his sister. Having left her husband, Hilary moves in with her unbalanced brother, Pink, who uses wit and humor to hide his amorous yearnings.
An American commander, serving under the British Royal Navy in 1942, is assigned to blockade the island of Malta and told to formulate a plan to destroy the Nazi arsenal in Sicily.

This adaptation of Emile Zola's novel "NANA," is about the sexual liaisons of a woman who through her relationships with different men, enjoys a life of pleasure and luxury. However, her lavish life-style does not always bring happiness.
Unnaturally close, jet-setting twins become enmeshed in the Swinging London scene, where their relationship is strained after they befriend a predatory hustler and his girlfriend.

Title_x: Mir hat es immer Spaß gemacht
Description_x: West German comedy film directed by Will Tremper and starring Barbi Benton.
A Soviet silent-film actress (Melina Mercouri) raises her illegitimate son, who becomes the writer Romain Gary (Assaf Dayan).
Struggling with life in 18th-century Italy, young Metello Salani is determined to change his situation for the better - but love, marriage and politics complicate things considerably...

Emerenziano, a middle-aged tax inspector, is in search of a wealthy wife. He travels to Italy where he meets three sisters, who, though wealthy, are not by any stretch of the imagination young or beautiful. He decides to marry one of them.

In a apocalyptic 19th century landscape where wealthy vampires have taken over the world, a group of humans prepare an uprising, and select an adventurous young man to track down the leader of the undead and destroy him.

Title_x: Elle boit pas, elle fume pas, elle drague pas, mais... elle cause!
Description_x: Housemaid Georgette (Girardot) loves to gossip and this causes major trouble to people around her.
A group of village children decide to secretly renovate the old mill, in order to have fun and a place to spend the summer vacation.
Comedy based on the plight of modern aboriginal Americans living on reservations.
A radical student feels that he has been betrayed by the college association to which he belongs, and thinks more violent actions must be taken in order to alter the existing system.
Teen girl Jules must deal with her budding sexuality, and the fact that some men and women want her adds to her confusion.
Bernie, a self-destructive alcoholic, is given watch over his niece Winnie. He tests the patience of the various people he knows and Winnie is often left on her own.
A student poet seduces his college President's wife, daughter, and girlfriend over lost financial aid.
A captain in the Czar's army encounters danger and romance while carrying a secret message across 19th-century Russia.

Eitan is yesterday's football star waiting for a tomorrow. He is a man who has nothing left but guts consulting the prospects of having to find a new profession and having to face a loving woman who doesn't understand his problems.

Joyce is alone in her luxurious apartment in Morocco, trying to cool down during a heat wave but also suffering from anxiety and sexual frustration. She holds a party, goes to the beach, and meets her physician. But where's her husband?
A small Vietnamese boy grows up during the horrors and hardships of The Vietnam War era.
A man struggles to survive after being shipwrecked on a deserted island.
A disabled young woman is tormented by two female cousins who play sexual games while she's unable to escape from them.
Stanley Waltz (Jackie Gleason) is seeking forgiveness in Lourdes, France, after a good deed had backfired at him, regarding a poem "How do I love thee?".
Kim Stacy and Morgan are two CIA Agents on a secret mission to rescue a scientist imprisoned by terrorists on a remote island.
Poor boy treats a sweet lemon tree as his only friend, talking to it, and learning important values in the process. But one day the tree must be cut.
Five persons, all on their own are having a holiday at a summer pension get to know each other, without telling to much about themselves.

During the civil war in Cyprus, an island nation split between the Greeks and the Turks, a British peacekeeping officer is trying to prevent a Greek guerrilla fighter from escalating the violent situation even further.
Ticky Edriss, a dwarf, develops a scheme to avenge him on society and extort a bank.
How do you choose a new lieutenant for the cavalry in 1893? Send them riding all night, during which they must drink 3 litres of champagne and have 2 love affairs.
A doctor struck off the order for euthanasia is called by a man to help his depressed son since the suicide of his companion.
Paul Lawrence is a working class man who dates Cara, sells shirts at a Sydney department store, and dreams of attending art school.
A network of spies affects the lives of people in and out of the organization in this routine espionage drama.

Title_x: La vida inútil de Pito Pérez

Description_x: An exploitation sex drama just this side of pinku-eiga with yakuza elements.

Title_x: L'asino d'oro: processo per fatti strani contro Lucius Apuleius cittadino romano
Description_x: In ancient Mauretania, the young Roman Lucius Apuleius and his friend Aristomene run into a series of misadventures.
Two platonic lovers in the sunny landscapes of south France.

A vet meets a mysterious woman through a dating agency and moves into her large apartment. As the apartment fills with animals and insects, strange goings on and suspicions between the couple increase.
The story involves a soldier, Georges Dormond, who seduces Germaine de Boismesnil and is subsequently driven out of the army by one of Germaine's friends who is a colonel.

During World War II, Germany aims to conquer Turkey with an operation which is Ankara Express. German spy Hilda and Turkish major Seyfi engage in a dangerous relationship while they work for Ankara Express operation.

A blind masseur sleeps with the wife of a samurai, who catches them in the act and kills them. The murdered couple return as vengeful ghosts. This film is a remake of a 1957 film. It was the final picture made by Daiei Studios.
The life story of Argentine independence hero Jose de San Martin.

Title_x: La banda de los tres crisantemos

Description_x: A couple of leaders and thirteen kids arrive on the island Bjurra, and when the woman breaks her leg the kids are told to go back home. In stead they take over the island.
A former Red Rebellion leader returns home after being imprisoned for his participation in the Finnish Civil War, but soon finds out that wartime mindsets still linger in the heads of people.
A man, torn inside by two passions, falls for the woman against whom he sought revenge, believing her to be responsible for the death of his brother.
Discovering that a woman from their small town in Sicily cheated on her husband, a group of upper class men investigate and try to identify her.
OSS 177 goes on holiday to Brazil, but is called into action when he finds himself being stalked by a double.
A young painter becomes increasingly hostile and confrontational after the death of his father. He eventually finds a friend in an aging scientist who is working on a strange experiment.
Man raised in a brothel tries to earn his living as a pimp, but gets in trouble when his girlfriend cheats him with an older man.

Bernard, an entomologist, moves to the country with his wife to write in peace and quiet. When he brings home a water spider their lives change irrevocably as the insect transforms into a beautiful young woman.
The daily routine of a falconry shows the newcomer how order through dictatorship can and cannot work.

In this sequel to THE TREASURE OF THE SIERRA MADRE, John Huston portrays a tequila-swigging crocodile hunter who heads into the jungles of Mexico. He has been warned that only native Indians can survive there...
A story about young orphan girl who was rejected by her mother.

Murase is a bodyguard in a yakuza group. Ochiai is a police officer who once was a student activist. When they meet, they are surprised how identical they look. They decide to trade places with each other.
Ten young boys are shipwrecked somewhere in Oceania.
In a noble villa of Bagheria, near Palermo, two spouses, Silvio and Leda Pataneo, spend their days devoting themselves mainly to the care of a citrus grove.
Based on the autobiographical novel by Frigyes Karinthy in which the author shares his experiences on finding out having a brain tumor and undergoing brain surgery in the 1930s.

In their wintry snowy resort, the financially notoriously clammy girlfriends Cecily and Laura see from their hotel window the established Munich businessman Karl Engelmann, a middle-aged man, with his BMW ancestor.

Title_x: La larga agonía de los peces fuera del agua

Description_x: While on a train to Rome, Léon muses about his love life after leaving his wife.
NOTHING SHORT OF BRILLIANT. MINDBLOWING.
The paths of Feyza and Bilal, who are from different worlds, cross again after years.

Title_x: Der Bettenstudent oder Was mach' ich mit den Mädchen?

Description_x: Two identical sisters vying for the attention of one man they both love.
A deserter who has lost all hope meets with a little girl in a ruined city.

Title_x: El hombre que se quiso matar

Description_x: A young and sensitive couple's impossible love affair.

Dr. Unan is asked to treat a young girl with A-bomb disease symptoms but her mother denies being in Nagasaki at the time of the bombing. Another young girl, Tokuko, asks Unan to write her a "Proof of Rape".
Douglas is a slippery stuck-up policeman, working in the intelligence services, who thinks his status makes it ok to make other people's life miserable.
In March 1792 the Swedish King Gustav III is murdered at a masked ball. Five young people are involved in the murder story, including Tintomara, a 17 year old inter-sex who dominates over the others.
A communist woman bursts naked into a bank accusing bankers of being capitalist manipulators.
A young woman abandoned by her husband starts a new life and re-creating herself.

In 1913, in the state of Santa Catarina, Brazil, the Government gives some lands to a foreign railway company, giving rise to revolt by the former owners of the land. The episode became known as Guerra dos Pelados.
A prostitute, a criminal and his passionate love - loyal to the end.

Title_x: Little Remi and Famous Dog Capi
Description_x: Japanese animation adaptation of a 19th century French novel: A boy is given up by his foster parents to a traveling performer.
Existential drama involving two men (Portho, Di Pietro) and two young women (Prieto, Knaut) who experiment in breaking social, sexual and psychological barriers in a weekend at a beach house.
In 1945 about 3 000 German soldiers and a 167 Baltic legionaries came as refugees to Sweden. Those who came via the island Gotland were first detained there, in a camp next to Havdhem.
A film that questions the right of parents to force their children into the adult world's rational behavior. A 6-year-old revolt by going to a lawyer and ask for a divorce from their parents.
While Dona Betina, owner of a very famous bordello in Rio de Janeiro, was being buried, an old scoundrel remembers his own past.

Title_x: Favorite Children's Books: The Wizard of Oz

Description_x: The film depicts the arrival of immigrants in the city of Espírito Santo following the history of Carlos, an Italian who struggles for his place against Hermann Gunter, a German colonist who rules the region.
Jeanette is an inmate at a juvenile prison. She contemplates her life which has been miserable ever since birth.
Feridun begins to live in the same house with Hatice and her daughter, who are distant relatives, in order to fulfill his father's will.

Only a field of roses, lovers of which meet to leave behind a deceased family father's oath to take revenge from a loan shark whose traumatized wife falls in love with his innocent orphan, can ever end this forbidden love affair.

Inger gets pregnant with an American man who abandons her. Maskot moves in with Inger. She wants them to start a relationship, but the Maskot has other plans. He performs several thefts and uses Ingers apartment as a hub.
